verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वादि॑ष्ठया॒ मदि॑ष्ठया॒ पव॑स्व सोम॒ धार॑या इन्द्रा॑य॒ पात॑वे सु॒तः
verses.transliteration: svā́diṣṭhayā mádiṣṭhayā  pávasva soma dhā́rayā  índrāya pā́tave sutáḥ

translation.text: In sweetest and most gladdening stream flow pure, O Soma, on thy way, Pressed out for Indra, for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: र॒क्षो॒हा वि॒श्वच॑र्षणिर॒भि योनि॒मयो॑हतम् द्रुणा॑ स॒धस्थ॒मास॑दत्
verses.transliteration: rakṣohā́ viśvácarṣaṇir  abhí yónim áyohatam  drúṇā sadhástham ā́sadat

translation.text: Fiend-queller, Friend of all men, he hath with the wood attained unto His place, his iron-fashioned home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒रि॒वो॒धात॑मो भव॒ मंहि॑ष्ठो वृत्र॒हन्त॑मः पर्षि॒ राधो॑ म॒घोना॑म्
verses.transliteration: varivodhā́tamo bhava  máṃhiṣṭho vr̥trahántamaḥ  párṣi rā́dho maghónām

translation.text: Be thou best Vr̥itra-slayer, best granter of bliss, most liberal: Promote our wealthy princes' gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑र्ष म॒हानां॑ दे॒वानां॑ वी॒तिमन्ध॑सा अ॒भि वाज॑मु॒त श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: abhy àrṣa mahā́nāṃ  devā́nāṃ vītím ándhasā  abhí vā́jam utá śrávaḥ

translation.text: Flow onward with thy juice unto the banquet of the Mighty Gods: Flow bither for our strength and fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वामच्छा॑ चरामसि॒ तदिदर्थं॑ दि॒वेदि॑वे इन्दो॒ त्वे न॑ आ॒शसः॑
verses.transliteration: tvā́m áchā carāmasi  tád íd árthaṃ divé-dive  índo tvé na āśásaḥ

translation.text: O Indu, we draw nigh to thee, with this one object day by day: To thee alone our prayers are said

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒नाति॑ ते परि॒स्रुतं॒ सोमं॒ सूर्य॑स्य दुहि॒ता वारे॑ण॒ शश्व॑ता॒ तना॑
verses.transliteration: punā́ti te parisrútaṃ  sómaṃ sū́ryasya duhitā́  vā́reṇa śáśvatā tánā

translation.text: By means of this eternal fleece may Sûrya's Daughter purify Thy Soma that is foaming forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमी॒मण्वीः॑ सम॒र्य आ गृ॒भ्णन्ति॒ योष॑णो॒ दश॑ स्वसा॑रः॒ पार्ये॑ दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: tám īm áṇvīḥ samaryá~ā́  gr̥bhṇánti yóṣaṇo dáśa  svásāraḥ pā́rye diví

translation.text: Ten sister maids of slender form seize him within the press and hold Him firmly on the final day.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमीं॑ हिन्वन्त्य॒ग्रुवो॒ धम॑न्ति बाकु॒रं दृति॑म् त्रि॒धातु॑ वार॒णं मधु॑
verses.transliteration: tám īṃ hinvanty agrúvo  dhámanti bākuráṃ dŕ̥tim  tridhā́tu vāraṇám mádhu

translation.text: The virgins send him forth: they blow the the skin musician-like and fuse The triple foe-repelling meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भी॒३॒॑ममघ्न्या॑ उ॒त श्री॒णन्ति॑ धे॒नवः॒ शिशु॑म् सोम॒मिन्द्रा॑य॒ पात॑वे
verses.transliteration: abhī̀mám ághnyā utá  śrīṇánti dhenávaḥ śíśum  sómam índrāya pā́tave

translation.text: Inviolable milch-kine round about him blend for Indra's drink, The fresh young Soma with their milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्येदिन्द्रो॒ मदे॒ष्वा विश्वा॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ जिघ्नते शूरो॑ म॒घा च॑ मंहते
verses.transliteration: asyéd índro mádeṣv ā́  víśvā vr̥trā́ṇi jighnate  śū́ro maghā́ ca maṃhate

translation.text: In the wild raptures of this draught, Indra slays all the Vr̥itras: he, The Hero, pours his wealth on us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व देव॒वीरति॑ प॒वित्रं॑ सोम॒ रंह्या॑ इन्द्र॑मिन्दो॒ वृषा वि॑श
verses.transliteration: pávasva devavī́r áti  pavítraṃ soma ráṃhyā  índram indo vŕ̥ṣā́ viśa

translation.text: Soma, flow on, inviting Gods, speed to the purifying cloth: Pass into Indra, as a Bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ व॑च्यस्व॒ महि॒ प्सरो॒ वृषे॑न्दो द्यु॒म्नव॑त्तमः आ योनिं॑ धर्ण॒सिः स॑दः
verses.transliteration: ā́ vacyasva máhi psáro  vŕ̥ṣendo dyumnávattamaḥ  ā́ yóniṃ dharṇasíḥ sadaḥ

translation.text: As mighty food speed hitherward, Indu, as a most splendid Steer: Sit in thy place as one with strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधु॑क्षत प्रि॒यं मधु॒ धारा॑ सु॒तस्य॑ वे॒धसः॑ अ॒पो व॑सिष्ट सु॒क्रतुः॑
verses.transliteration: ádhukṣata priyám mádhu  dhā́rā sutásya vedhásaḥ  apó vasiṣṭa sukrátuḥ

translation.text: The well-loved meath was made to flow, the stream of the creative juice ne Sage drew waters to himself.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हान्तं॑ त्वा म॒हीरन्वापो॑ अर्षन्ति॒ सिन्ध॑वः यद्गोभि॑र्वासयि॒ष्यसे॑
verses.transliteration: mahā́ntaṃ tvā mahī́r ánu-  ā́po arṣanti síndhavaḥ  yád góbhir vāsayiṣyáse

translation.text: The mighty waters, yea, the floods accompany thee Mighty One, When thou wilt clothe thee with the milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मु॒द्रो अ॒प्सु मा॑मृजे विष्ट॒म्भो ध॒रुणो॑ दि॒वः सोमः॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अस्म॒युः
verses.transliteration: samudró apsú māmr̥je  viṣṭambhó dharúṇo diváḥ  sómaḥ pavítre asmayúḥ

translation.text: The lake is brightened in the floods. Soma, our Friend, heaven's prop and stay, Falls on the purifying cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अचि॑क्रद॒द्वृषा॒ हरि॑र्म॒हान्मि॒त्रो न द॑र्श॒तः सं सूर्ये॑ण रोचते
verses.transliteration: ácikradad vŕ̥ṣā hárir  mahā́n mitró ná darśatáḥ  sáṃ sū́ryeṇa rocate

translation.text: The tawny Bull hath bellowed, fair as mighty Mitra to behold: He shines together with the Sun.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गिर॑स्त इन्द॒ ओज॑सा मर्मृ॒ज्यन्ते॑ अप॒स्युवः॑ याभि॒र्मदा॑य॒ शुम्भ॑से
verses.transliteration: gíras ta inda ójasā  marmr̥jyánte apasyúvaḥ  yā́bhir mádāya śúmbhase

translation.text: Songs, Indu, active in their might are beautified for thee, wherewith Thou deckest thee for our delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॒ मदा॑य॒ घृष्व॑य उ लोककृ॒त्नुमी॑महे तव॒ प्रश॑स्तयो म॒हीः
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā mádāya ghŕ̥ṣvaye-  ulokakr̥tnúm īmahe  táva práśastayo mahī́ḥ

translation.text: To thee who givest ample room we pray, to win the joyous draught: Great are the praises due to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मभ्य॑मिन्दविन्द्र॒युर्मध्वः॑ पवस्व॒ धार॑या प॒र्जन्यो॑ वृष्टि॒माँ इ॑व
verses.transliteration: asmábhyam indav indrayúr  mádhvaḥ pavasva dhā́rayā  parjányo vr̥ṣṭimā́m̐ iva

translation.text: Indu as, Indra's Friend, on us pour with a stream of sweetness, like Parjanya sender of the rain.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गो॒षा इ॑न्दो नृ॒षा अ॑स्यश्व॒सा वा॑ज॒सा उ॒त आ॒त्मा य॒ज्ञस्य॑ पू॒र्व्यः
verses.transliteration: góṣā́ indo nr̥ṣā́ asi-  aśvasā́ vājasā́ utá  ātmā́ yajñásya pūrvyáḥ

translation.text: Winner of kine, Indu, art thou, winner of heroes, steeds, and strength Primeval Soul of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दे॒वो अम॑र्त्यः पर्ण॒वीरि॑व दीयति अ॒भि द्रोणा॑न्या॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: eṣá devó ámartyaḥ  parṇavī́r iva dīyati  abhí dróṇāny āsádam

translation.text: HERE present this Immortal God flies, like a bird upon her wings, To settle in the vats of wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दे॒वो वि॒पा कृ॒तोऽति॒ ह्वरां॑सि धावति पव॑मानो॒ अदा॑भ्यः
verses.transliteration: eṣá devó vipā́ kr̥tó  -áti hvárāṃsi dhāvati  pávamāno ádābhyaḥ

translation.text: This God, made ready with the hymn, runs swiftly through the winding ways, Inviolable as he flows.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दे॒वो वि॑प॒न्युभिः॒ पव॑मान ऋता॒युभिः॑ हरि॒र्वाजा॑य मृज्यते
verses.transliteration: eṣá devó vipanyúbhiḥ  pávamāna r̥tāyúbhiḥ  hárir vā́jāya mr̥jyate

translation.text: This God while flowing is adorned, like a bay steed for war, by men Devout and skilled in holy songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष विश्वा॑नि॒ वार्या॒ शूरो॒ यन्नि॑व॒ सत्व॑भिः पव॑मानः सिषासति
verses.transliteration: eṣá víśvāni vā́ryā  śū́ro yánn iva sátvabhiḥ  pávamānaḥ siṣāsati

translation.text: He, like a warrior going forth with heroes, as he flows along Is fain to win all precious boons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दे॒वो र॑थर्यति॒ पव॑मानो दशस्यति आ॒विष्कृ॑णोति वग्व॒नुम्
verses.transliteration: eṣá devó ratharyati  pávamāno daśasyati  āvíṣ kr̥ṇoti vagvanúm

translation.text: This God, as he is flowing on, speeds like a car and gives his gifts: He lets his voice be heard of all

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष विप्रै॑र॒भिष्टु॑तो॒ऽपो दे॒वो वि गा॑हते दध॒द्रत्ना॑नि दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: eṣá víprair abhíṣṭuto  -apó devó ví gāhate  dádhad rátnāni dāśúṣe

translation.text: Praised by the sacred bards, this God dives into waters, and bestows Rich gifts upon the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दिवं॒ वि धा॑वति ति॒रो रजां॑सि॒ धार॑या पव॑मानः॒ कनि॑क्रदत्
verses.transliteration: eṣá dívaṃ ví dhāvati  tiró rájāṃsi dhā́rayā  pávamānaḥ kánikradat

translation.text: Away he rushes with his stream, across the regions, into heaven, And roars as he is flowing on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दिवं॒ व्यास॑रत्ति॒रो रजां॒स्यस्पृ॑तः पव॑मानः स्वध्व॒रः
verses.transliteration: eṣá dívaṃ vy ā́sarat  tiró rájāṃsy áspr̥taḥ  pávamānaḥ svadhvaráḥ

translation.text: While flowing, meet for sacrifice, he hath gone up to heaven across The regions, irresistible.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष प्र॒त्नेन॒ जन्म॑ना दे॒वो दे॒वेभ्यः॑ सु॒तः हरिः॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अर्षति
verses.transliteration: eṣá pratnéna jánmanā  devó devébhyaḥ sutáḥ  háriḥ pavítre arṣati

translation.text: After the 'way of ancient time, this God, pressed out for Deities, Flows tawny to the straining-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष उ॒ स्य पु॑रुव्र॒तो ज॑ज्ञा॒नो ज॒नय॒न्निषः॑ धार॑या पवते सु॒तः
verses.transliteration: eṣá u syá puruvrató  jajñānó janáyann íṣaḥ  dhā́rayā pavate sutáḥ

translation.text: This Lord of many Holy Laws, even at his birth engendering strength, Effused, flows onward in a stream.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सना॑ च सोम॒ जेषि॑ च॒ पव॑मान॒ महि॒ श्रवः॑ अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: sánā ca soma jéṣi ca  pávamāna máhi śrávaḥ  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: O Soma flowing on thy way, win thou and conquer high renown; And make us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सना॒ ज्योतिः॒ सना॒ स्व१॒॑र्विश्वा॑ च सोम॒ सौभ॑गा अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: sánā jyótiḥ sánā svàr  víśvā ca soma saúbhagā  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Win thou the light, win heavenly light, and, Soma, all felicities; And make us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सना॒ दक्ष॑मु॒त क्रतु॒मप॑ सोम॒ मृधो॑ जहि अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: sánā dákṣam utá krátum  ápa soma mŕ̥dho jahi  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Win skilful strength and mental power. O Soma, drive away our foes; And make us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पवी॑तारः पुनी॒तन॒ सोम॒मिन्द्रा॑य॒ पात॑वे अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: pávītāraḥ punītána  sómam índrāya pā́tave  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Ye purifiers, purify Soma for Indra, for his drink: Make thou us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सूर्ये॑ न॒ आ भ॑ज॒ तव॒ क्रत्वा॒ तवो॒तिभिः॑ अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: tváṃ sū́rye na ā́ bhaja  táva krátvā távotíbhiḥ  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Give us our portion in the Sun through thine own mental power and aids; And make us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ क्रत्वा॒ तवो॒तिभि॒र्ज्योक्प॑श्येम॒ सूर्य॑म् अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: táva krátvā távotíbhiḥ  jyók paśyema sū́ryam  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Through thine own mental power and aid long may we look upon the Sun; Make thou us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑र्ष स्वायुध॒ सोम॑ द्वि॒बर्ह॑सं र॒यिम् अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: abhy àrṣa svāyudha  sóma dvibárhasaṃ rayím  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Well-weaponed Soma, pour to usa stream of riches doubly great; And make us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य१॒॑र्षान॑पच्युतो र॒यिं स॒मत्सु॑ सास॒हिः अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: abhy àrṣā́napacyuto  rayíṃ samátsu sāsahíḥ  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: As one victorious unsubdued in battle pour forth wealth to us; And make us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां य॒ज्ञैर॑वीवृध॒न्पव॑मान॒ विध॑र्मणि अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ yajñaír avīvr̥dhan  pávamāna vídharmaṇi  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: By worship, Pavamâna! men have strengthened thee to prop the Law: Make thou us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: र॒यिं न॑श्चि॒त्रम॒श्विन॒मिन्दो॑ वि॒श्वायु॒मा भ॑र अथा॑ नो॒ वस्य॑सस्कृधि
verses.transliteration: rayíṃ naś citrám aśvínam  índo viśvā́yum ā́ bhara  áthā no vásyasas kr̥dhi

translation.text: O Indu, bring us wealth in steeds, manifold. quickening all life; And mate us better than we are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समि॑द्धो वि॒श्वत॒स्पतिः॒ पव॑मानो॒ वि रा॑जति प्री॒णन्वृषा॒ कनि॑क्रदत्
verses.transliteration: sámiddho viśvátas pátiḥ  pávamāno ví rājati  prīṇán vŕ̥ṣā kánikradat

translation.text: ENKINDLED, Pavamâna, Lord, sends forth his light on, every side In friendly show, the bellowing Bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तनू॒नपा॒त्पव॑मानः॒ शृङ्गे॒ शिशा॑नो अर्षति अ॒न्तरि॑क्षेण॒ रार॑जत्
verses.transliteration: tánūnápāt pávamānaḥ  śŕ̥ṅge śíśāno arṣati  antárikṣeṇa rā́rajat

translation.text: He, Pavamâna, Self-produced, speeds onward sharpening his horns: He glitters through the firmament.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ई॒ळेन्यः॒ पव॑मानो र॒यिर्वि रा॑जति द्यु॒मान् मधो॒र्धारा॑भि॒रोज॑सा
verses.transliteration: īḷényaḥ pávamāno  rayír ví rājati dyumā́n  mádhor dhā́rābhir ójasā

translation.text: Brilliant like wealth, adorable, with splendour Pavamâna shines, Mightily with the streams of meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब॒र्हिः प्रा॒चीन॒मोज॑सा॒ पव॑मानः स्तृ॒णन्हरिः॑ दे॒वेषु॑ दे॒व ई॑यते
verses.transliteration: barhíḥ prācī́nam ójasā  pávamāna str̥ṇán háriḥ  devéṣu devá īyate

translation.text: The tawny Pavamâna, who strews from of old the grass with might, Is worshipped, God amid the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उदातै॑र्जिहते बृ॒हद्द्वारो॑ दे॒वीर्हि॑र॒ण्ययीः॑ पव॑मानेन॒ सुष्टु॑ताः
verses.transliteration: úd ā́tair jihate br̥hád  dvā́ro devī́r hiraṇyáyīḥ  pávamānena súṣṭutāḥ

translation.text: The golden, the Celestial Doors are lifted with their frames on high, By Pavamâna glorified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒शि॒ल्पे बृ॑ह॒ती म॒ही पव॑मानो वृषण्यति नक्तो॒षासा॒ न द॑र्श॒ते
verses.transliteration: suśilpé br̥hatī́ mahī́  pávamāno vr̥ṣaṇyati  náktoṣā́sā ná darśaté

translation.text: With passion Pavamâna longs for the great lofty pair, well-formed Like beauteous maidens, Night and Dawn

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒भा दे॒वा नृ॒चक्ष॑सा॒ होता॑रा॒ दैव्या॑ हुवे पव॑मान॒ इन्द्रो॒ वृषा॑
verses.transliteration: ubhā́ devā́ nr̥cákṣasā  hótārā daívyā huve  pávamāna índro vŕ̥ṣā

translation.text: Both Gods who look on men I call, Celestial Heralds: Indra's Self Is Pavamâna, yea, the Bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: भार॑ती॒ पव॑मानस्य॒ सर॑स्व॒तीळा॑ म॒ही इ॒मं नो॑ य॒ज्ञमा ग॑मन्ति॒स्रो दे॒वीः सु॒पेश॑सः
verses.transliteration: bhā́ratī pávamānasya  sárasvatī́ḷā mahī́  imáṃ no yajñám ā́ gaman  tisró devī́ḥ supéśasaḥ

translation.text: This, Pavamâna's sacrifice, shall the three beauteous Goddesses, Sarasvatî and Bhâratî and Iḷâ, Mighty One, attend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वष्टा॑रमग्र॒जां गो॒पां पु॑रो॒यावा॑न॒मा हु॑वे इन्दु॒रिन्द्रो॒ वृषा॒ हरिः॒ पव॑मानः प्र॒जाप॑तिः
verses.transliteration: tváṣṭāram agrajā́ṃ gopā́m  puroyā́vānam ā́ huve  índur índro vŕ̥ṣā háriḥ  pávamānaḥ prajā́patiḥ

translation.text: I summon Tvashṭar hither, our protector, champion, earliest-born, Indu is Indra, tawny Steer; Pavamâna is Prajâpati.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वन॒स्पतिं॑ पवमान॒ मध्वा॒ सम॑ङ्ग्धि॒ धार॑या स॒हस्र॑वल्शं॒ हरि॑तं॒ भ्राज॑मानं हिर॒ण्यय॑म्
verses.transliteration: vánaspátim pavamāna  mádhvā sám aṅgdhi dhā́rayā  sahásravalśaṃ háritam  bhrā́jamānaṃ hiraṇyáyam

translation.text: O Pavamâna, with the meath in streams anoint Vanaspati, The ever-green. the golden-hued, refulgent, with a thousand boughs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑ देवाः॒ स्वाहा॑कृतिं॒ पव॑मान॒स्या ग॑त वा॒युर्बृह॒स्पतिः॒ सूर्यो॒ऽग्निरिन्द्रः॑ स॒जोष॑सः
verses.transliteration: víśve devāḥ svā́hākr̥tim  pávamānasyā́ gata  vāyúr bŕ̥haspátiḥ sū́ryo  -agnír índraḥ sajóṣasaḥ

translation.text: Come to the consecrating rite of Pavamâna, all ye Gods,– Vâyu, Sûrya, Br̥ihaspati, Indra, and Agni, in accord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒न्द्रया॑ सोम॒ धार॑या॒ वृषा॑ पवस्व देव॒युः अव्यो॒ वारे॑ष्वस्म॒युः
verses.transliteration: mandráyā soma dhā́rayā  vŕ̥ṣā pavasva devayúḥ  ávyo vā́reṣv asmayúḥ

translation.text: SOMA, flow on with pleasant stream, a Bull devoted to the Gods, Our Friend, unto the woollen sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि त्यं मद्यं॒ मद॒मिन्द॒विन्द्र॒ इति॑ क्षर अ॒भि वा॒जिनो॒ अर्व॑तः
verses.transliteration: abhí tyám mádyam mádam  índav índra íti kṣara  abhí vājíno árvataḥ

translation.text: Pour hitherward, as Indra's Self, Indu, that gladdening stream of thine, And send us coursers full of strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि त्यं पू॒र्व्यं मदं॑ सुवा॒नो अ॑र्ष प॒वित्र॒ आ अ॒भि वाज॑मु॒त श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: abhí tyám pūrvyám mádaṃ  suvānó arṣa pavítra ā́  abhí vā́jam utá śrávaḥ

translation.text: Flow to the filter hitherward, pouring that ancient gladdening juice, Streaming forth power and high renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अनु॑ द्र॒प्सास॒ इन्द॑व॒ आपो॒ न प्र॒वता॑सरन् पु॒ना॒ना इन्द्र॑माशत
verses.transliteration: ánu drapsā́sa índavaḥ-  ā́po ná pravátāsaran  punānā́ índram āśata

translation.text: Hither the sparkling drops have flowed, like waters down a steep descent They have reached Indra purified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यमत्य॑मिव वा॒जिनं॑ मृ॒जन्ति॒ योष॑णो॒ दश॑ वने॒ क्रीळ॑न्त॒मत्य॑विम्
verses.transliteration: yám átyam iva vājínam  mr̥jánti yóṣaṇo dáśa  váne krī́ḷantam átyavim

translation.text: Whom, having passed the filter, ten dames cleanse, as 'twere a vigorous steed, While he disports him in the wood,–

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं गोभि॒र्वृष॑णं॒ रसं॒ मदा॑य दे॒ववी॑तये सु॒तं भरा॑य॒ सं सृ॑ज
verses.transliteration: táṃ góbhir vŕ̥ṣaṇaṃ rásam  mádāya devávītaye  sutám bhárāya sáṃ sr̥ja

translation.text: The steer-strong juice with milk pour forth, for feast and service of the Gods, To him who bears away the draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वो दे॒वाय॒ धार॒येन्द्रा॑य पवते सु॒तः पयो॒ यद॑स्य पी॒पय॑त्
verses.transliteration: devó devā́ya dhā́rayā-  -índrāya pavate sutáḥ  páyo yád asya pīpáyat

translation.text: Effused, the God flows onward with his stream to Indra, to the God, So that his milk may strengthen him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒त्मा य॒ज्ञस्य॒ रंह्या॑ सुष्वा॒णः प॑वते सु॒तः प्र॒त्नं नि पा॑ति॒ काव्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: ātmā́ yajñásya ráṃhyā  suṣvāṇáḥ pavate sutáḥ  pratnáṃ ní pāti kā́vyam

translation.text: Soul of the sacrifice, the juice effused flows quickly on: he keeps His ancient wisdom of a Sage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा पु॑ना॒न इ॑न्द्र॒युर्मदं॑ मदिष्ठ वी॒तये॑ गुहा॑ चिद्दधिषे॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: evā́ punāná indrayúr  mádam madiṣṭha vītáye  gúhā cid dadhiṣe gíraḥ

translation.text: So pouring forth, as Indra's Friend, strong drink, best Gladdener! for the feast, Thou, even in secret, storest hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: असृ॑ग्र॒मिन्द॑वः प॒था धर्म॑न्नृ॒तस्य॑ सु॒श्रियः॑ वि॒दा॒ना अ॑स्य॒ योज॑नम्
verses.transliteration: ásr̥gram índavaḥ pathā́  dhármann r̥tásya suśríyaḥ  vidānā́ asya yójanam

translation.text: FORTH on their way the glorious drops have flowed for maintenance of Law, Knowing this sacrifice's course.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र धारा॒ मध्वो॑ अग्रि॒यो म॒हीर॒पो वि गा॑हते ह॒विर्ह॒विष्षु॒ वन्द्यः॑
verses.transliteration: prá dhā́rā mádhvo agriyó  mahī́r apó ví gāhate  havír havíṣṣu vándyaḥ

translation.text: Down in the mighty waters sinks the stream of meath, most excellent, Oblation best of all in worth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र यु॒जो वा॒चो अ॑ग्रि॒यो वृषाव॑ चक्रद॒द्वने॑ सद्मा॒भि स॒त्यो अ॑ध्व॒रः
verses.transliteration: prá yujó vācó agriyó  vŕ̥ṣā́va cakradad váne  sádmābhí satyó adhvaráḥ

translation.text: About the holy place, the Steer true, guileless, noblest, hath sent forth Continuous voices in the wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॒ यत्काव्या॑ क॒विर्नृ॒म्णा वसा॑नो॒ अर्ष॑ति स्व॑र्वा॒जी सि॑षासति
verses.transliteration: pári yát kā́vyā kavír  nr̥mṇā́ vásāno árṣati  svàr vājī́ siṣāsati

translation.text: When, clothed in manly strength, the Sage flows in celestial wisdom round, The Strong would win the light of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानो अ॒भि स्पृधो॒ विशो॒ राजे॑व सीदति यदी॑मृ॒ण्वन्ति॑ वे॒धसः॑
verses.transliteration: pávamāno abhí spŕ̥dho  víśo rā́jeva sīdati  yád īm r̥ṇvánti vedhásaḥ

translation.text: When purified, he sits as King above the hosts, among his folk, What time the sages bring him nigh.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव्यो॒ वारे॒ परि॑ प्रि॒यो हरि॒र्वने॑षु सीदति रे॒भो व॑नुष्यते म॒ती
verses.transliteration: ávyo vā́re pári priyó  hárir váneṣu sīdati  rebhó vanuṣyate matī́

translation.text: Dear, golden-coloured, in the fleece he sinks and settles in the wood: The Singer shows his zeal in hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वा॒युमिन्द्र॑म॒श्विना॑ सा॒कं मदे॑न गच्छति रणा॒ यो अ॑स्य॒ धर्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: sá vāyúm índram aśvínā  sākám mádena gachati  ráṇā yó asya dhármabhiḥ

translation.text: He goes to Indra, Vâyu, to the Aṣvins, as his custom is, With gladdening juice which gives them joy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ मि॒त्रावरु॑णा॒ भगं॒ मध्वः॑ पवन्त ऊ॒र्मयः॑ वि॒दा॒ना अ॑स्य॒ शक्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: ā́ mitrā́váruṇā bhágam  mádhvaḥ pavanta ūrmáyaḥ  vidānā́ asya śákmabhiḥ

translation.text: Tle streams of pleasant Soma flow to Bhaga, Mitra-Varuṇa,– Well-knowing through his mighty powers. Heaven and Earth, riches of meath to win us wealth: Gain for us treasures and renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मभ्यं॑ रोदसी र॒यिं मध्वो॒ वाज॑स्य सा॒तये॑ श्रवो॒ वसू॑नि॒ सं जि॑तम्
verses.transliteration: asmábhyaṃ rodasī rayím  mádhvo vā́jasya sātáye  śrávo vásūni sáṃ jitam

translation.text: Heaven and Earth, riches of meath to win us wealth: Gain for us treasures and renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते सोमा॑ अ॒भि प्रि॒यमिन्द्र॑स्य॒ काम॑मक्षरन् वर्ध॑न्तो अस्य वी॒र्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: eté sómā abhí priyám  índrasya kā́mam akṣaran  várdhanto asya vīryàm

translation.text: OBEYING Indra's dear desire these Soma juices have flowed forth, Increasing his heroic might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नास॑श्चमू॒षदो॒ गच्छ॑न्तो वा॒युम॒श्विना॑ ते नो॑ धान्तु सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: punānā́saś camūṣádo  gáchanto vāyúm aśvínā  té no dhāntu suvī́ryam

translation.text: Laid in the bowl, pure-flowing on to Vâyu and the Aṣvins, may These give us great heroic strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑स्य सोम॒ राध॑से पुना॒नो हार्दि॑ चोदय ऋ॒तस्य॒ योनि॑मा॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: índrasya soma rā́dhase  punānó hā́rdi codaya  r̥tásya yónim āsádam

translation.text: Soma, as thou art purified, incite to bounty Indra's heart, To sit in place of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मृ॒जन्ति॑ त्वा॒ दश॒ क्षिपो॑ हि॒न्वन्ति॑ स॒प्त धी॒तयः॑ अनु॒ विप्रा॑ अमादिषुः
verses.transliteration: mr̥jánti tvā dáśa kṣípo  hinvánti saptá dhītáyaḥ  ánu víprā amādiṣuḥ

translation.text: The ten swift fingers deck thee forth, seven ministers impel thee on: The sages have rejoiced in thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वेभ्य॑स्त्वा॒ मदा॑य॒ कं सृ॑जा॒नमति॑ मे॒ष्यः॑ सं गोभि॑र्वासयामसि
verses.transliteration: devébhyas tvā mádāya káṃ  sr̥jānám áti meṣyàḥ  sáṃ góbhir vāsayāmasi

translation.text: When through the filter thou art poured, we clothe thee with a robe of milk To be a gladdening draught for Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नः क॒लशे॒ष्वा वस्त्रा॑ण्यरु॒षो हरिः॑ परि॒ गव्या॑न्यव्यत
verses.transliteration: punānáḥ kaláśeṣv~ā́  vástrāṇy aruṣó háriḥ  pári gávyāny avyata

translation.text: When purified within the jars, Soma, brightred and golden-hued, Hath clothed him with a robe of milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒घोन॒ आ प॑वस्व नो ज॒हि विश्वा॒ अप॒ द्विषः॑ इन्दो॒ सखा॑य॒मा वि॑श
verses.transliteration: maghóna ā́ pavasva no  jahí víśvā ápa dvíṣaḥ  índo sákhāyam ā́ viśa

translation.text: Flow on to us and make us rich. Drive all our enemies away. O Indu, flow into thy Friend. Send down the rain from heaven, a stream of opulence from earth. Give us, O Soma, victory in war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृ॒ष्टिं दि॒वः परि॑ स्रव द्यु॒म्नं पृ॑थि॒व्या अधि॑ सहो॑ नः सोम पृ॒त्सु धाः॑
verses.transliteration: vr̥ṣṭíṃ diváḥ pári srava  dyumnám pr̥thivyā́ ádhi  sáho naḥ soma pr̥tsú dhāḥ

translation.text: Send down the rain from heaven, a stream of opulence from earth. Give us, O Soma, victory in war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नृ॒चक्ष॑सं त्वा व॒यमिन्द्र॑पीतं स्व॒र्विद॑म् भ॒क्षी॒महि॑ प्र॒जामिष॑म्
verses.transliteration: nr̥cákṣasaṃ tvā vayám  índrapītaṃ svarvídam  bhakṣīmáhi prajā́m íṣam

translation.text: May we obtain thee, Indra's drink, who viewest men and findest light, Gain thee, and progeny and food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ प्रि॒या दि॒वः क॒विर्वयां॑सि न॒प्त्यो॑र्हि॒तः सु॒वा॒नो या॑ति क॒विक्र॑तुः
verses.transliteration: pári priyā́ diváḥ kavír  váyāṃsi naptyòr hitáḥ  suvānó yāti kavíkratuḥ

translation.text: THE Sage of Heaven whose heart is wise, when laid between both hands and pressed, Sends us delightful powers of life.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रप्र॒ क्षया॑य॒ पन्य॑से॒ जना॑य॒ जुष्टो॑ अ॒द्रुहे॑ वी॒त्य॑र्ष॒ चनि॑ष्ठया
verses.transliteration: prá-pra kṣáyāya pányase  jánāya júṣṭo adrúhe  vīty àrṣa cániṣṭhayā

translation.text: On, onward to a glorious home; dear to the people void of guile, With excellent enjoyment, flow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स सू॒नुर्मा॒तरा॒ शुचि॑र्जा॒तो जा॒ते अ॑रोचयत् म॒हान्म॒ही ऋ॑ता॒वृधा॑
verses.transliteration: sá sūnúr mātárā śúcir  jātó jāté arocayat  mahā́n mahī́ r̥tāvŕ̥dhā

translation.text: He, the bright Son, when born illumed his Parents who had sprung to life, Great Son great Strengtheners of Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स स॒प्त धी॒तिभि॑र्हि॒तो न॒द्यो॑ अजिन्वद॒द्रुहः॑ या एक॒मक्षि॑ वावृ॒धुः
verses.transliteration: sá saptá dhītíbhir hitó  nadyò ajinvad adrúhaḥ  yā́ ékam ákṣi vāvr̥dhúḥ

translation.text: Urged by the seven devotions he hath stirred the guileless rivers which Have magnified the Single Eye.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता अ॒भि सन्त॒मस्तृ॑तं म॒हे युवा॑न॒मा द॑धुः इन्दु॑मिन्द्र॒ तव॑ व्र॒ते
verses.transliteration: tā́ abhí sántam ástr̥tam  mahé yúvānam ā́ dadhuḥ  índum indra táva vraté

translation.text: These helped to might theYouthful One, high over all, invincible, Even Indu, Indra! in thy law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि वह्नि॒रम॑र्त्यः स॒प्त प॑श्यति॒ वाव॑हिः क्रिवि॑र्दे॒वीर॑तर्पयत्
verses.transliteration: abhí váhnir ámartyaḥ  saptá paśyati vā́vahiḥ  krívir devī́r atarpayat

translation.text: The immortal Courser, good to draw, looks down upon the Seven: the fount Hath satisfied the Goddesses

verses.sanskrit_deva: अवा॒ कल्पे॑षु नः पुम॒स्तमां॑सि सोम॒ योध्या॑ तानि॑ पुनान जङ्घनः
verses.transliteration: ávā kálpeṣu naḥ pumas  támāṃsi soma yódhyā  tā́ni punāna jaṅghanaḥ

translation.text: Aid us in holy rites, O Man: O Pavamâna, drive away Dark shades that must be met in fight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू नव्य॑से॒ नवी॑यसे सू॒क्ताय॑ साधया प॒थः प्र॒त्न॒वद्रो॑चया॒ रुचः॑
verses.transliteration: nū́ návyase návīyase  sūktā́ya sādhayā patháḥ  pratnavád rocayā rúcaḥ

translation.text: Make the paths ready for a hymn newer and newer evermore: Make the lights shine as erst they shone.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान॒ महि॒ श्रवो॒ गामश्वं॑ रासि वी॒रव॑त् सना॑ मे॒धां सना॒ स्वः॑
verses.transliteration: pávamāna máhi śrávaḥ  gā́m áśvaṃ rāsi vīrávat  sánā medhā́ṃ sánā svàḥ

translation.text: Give, Pavamâna, high renown, give kine and steeds and hero sons: Win for us wisdom, win the light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र स्वा॒नासो॒ रथा॑ इ॒वार्व॑न्तो॒ न श्र॑व॒स्यवः॑ सोमा॑सो रा॒ये अ॑क्रमुः
verses.transliteration: prá svānā́so ráthā iva-  -árvanto ná śravasyávaḥ  sómāso rāyé akramuḥ

translation.text: LIKE cars that thunder on their way, like coursers eager for renown, Have Soma-drops flowed forth for wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हि॒न्वा॒नासो॒ रथा॑ इव दधन्वि॒रे गभ॑स्त्योः भरा॑सः का॒रिणा॑मिव
verses.transliteration: hinvānā́so ráthā iva  dadhanviré gábhastyoḥ  bhárāsaḥ kāríṇām iva

translation.text: Forth have they rushed from holding hands, like chariots that are urged to speed, Like joyful songs of singing-men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: राजा॑नो॒ न प्रश॑स्तिभिः॒ सोमा॑सो॒ गोभि॑रञ्जते य॒ज्ञो न स॒प्त धा॒तृभिः॑
verses.transliteration: rā́jāno ná práśastibhiḥ  sómāso góbhir añjate  yajñó ná saptá dhātŕ̥bhiḥ

translation.text: The Somas deck themselves with milk, as Kings are graced with eulogies, And, with seven priests, the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ सुवा॒नास॒ इन्द॑वो॒ मदा॑य ब॒र्हणा॑ गि॒रा सु॒ता अ॑र्षन्ति॒ धार॑या
verses.transliteration: pári suvānā́sa índavo  mádāya barháṇā girā́  sutā́ arṣanti dhā́rayā

translation.text: Pressed for the gladdening draught, the drops flow forth abundantly with song, The Soma juices in a stream.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒पा॒नासो॑ वि॒वस्व॑तो॒ जन॑न्त उ॒षसो॒ भग॑म् सूरा॒ अण्वं॒ वि त॑न्वते
verses.transliteration: āpānā́so vivásvato  jánanta uṣáso bhágam  sū́rā áṇvaṃ ví tanvate

translation.text: Winning Vivasvan's glory and producing Morning's light, the Suns Pass through the openings of the cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अप॒ द्वारा॑ मती॒नां प्र॒त्ना ऋ॑ण्वन्ति का॒रवः॑ वृष्णो॒ हर॑स आ॒यवः॑
verses.transliteration: ápa dvā́rā matīnā́m  pratnā́ r̥ṇvanti kārávaḥ  vŕ̥ṣṇo hárasa āyávaḥ

translation.text: The singing-men of ancient time open the doors of sacred songs,– Men, for the mighty to accept.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मी॒ची॒नास॑ आसते॒ होता॑रः स॒प्तजा॑मयः प॒दमेक॑स्य॒ पिप्र॑तः
verses.transliteration: samīcīnā́sa āsate  hótāraḥ saptájāmayaḥ  padám ékasya píprataḥ

translation.text: Combined in close society sit the seven priests, the brother-hood, Filling the station of the One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नाभा॒ नाभिं॑ न॒ आ द॑दे॒ चक्षु॑श्चि॒त्सूर्ये॒ सचा॑ क॒वेरप॑त्य॒मा दु॑हे
verses.transliteration: nā́bhā nā́bhiṃ na ā́ dade  cákṣuś cit sū́rye sácā  kavér ápatyam ā́ duhe

translation.text: He gives us kinship with the Gods, and with the Sun unites our eye: The Sage's ofrspring hath appeared.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि प्रि॒या दि॒वस्प॒दम॑ध्व॒र्युभि॒र्गुहा॑ हि॒तम् सूरः॑ पश्यति॒ चक्ष॑सा
verses.transliteration: abhí priyā́ divás padám  adhvaryúbhir gúhā hitám  sū́raḥ paśyati cákṣasā

translation.text: The Sun with his dear eye beholds that quarter of the heavens which priests Have placed within the sacred cell.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उपा॑स्मै गायता नरः॒ पव॑माना॒येन्द॑वे अ॒भि दे॒वाँ इय॑क्षते
verses.transliteration: úpāsmai gāyatā naraḥ  pávamānāyéndave  abhí devā́m̐ íyakṣate

translation.text: SING forth to Indu, O ye men, to him who is purified, Fain to pay worship to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि ते॒ मधु॑ना॒ पयोऽथ॑र्वाणो अशिश्रयुः दे॒वं दे॒वाय॑ देव॒यु
verses.transliteration: abhí te mádhunā páyaḥ-  -átharvāṇo aśiśrayuḥ  deváṃ devā́ya devayú

translation.text: Together with thy pleasant juice the Atharvans have commingled milk, Divine, devoted to the God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पवस्व॒ शं गवे॒ शं जना॑य॒ शमर्व॑ते शं रा॑ज॒न्नोष॑धीभ्यः
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ pavasva śáṃ gáve  śáṃ jánāya śám árvate  śáṃ rājann óṣadhībhyaḥ

translation.text: Bring, by thy flowing, weal to kine, weal to the people, weal to steeds. Weal, O thou King, to growing plants

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब॒भ्रवे॒ नु स्वत॑वसेऽरु॒णाय॑ दिवि॒स्पृशे॑ सोमा॑य गा॒थम॑र्चत
verses.transliteration: babhráve nú svátavase  -aruṇā́ya divispŕ̥śe  sómāya gāthám arcata

translation.text: Sing a praise-song to Soma brown of hue, of independent might. The Red, who reaches up to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हस्त॑च्युतेभि॒रद्रि॑भिः सु॒तं सोमं॑ पुनीतन मधा॒वा धा॑वता॒ मधु॑
verses.transliteration: hástacyutebhir ádribhiḥ  sutáṃ sómam punītana  mádhāv ā́ dhāvatā mádhu

translation.text: Purify Soma when effused with stones which bands move rapidly, And pour the sweet milk in the meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नम॒सेदुप॑ सीदत द॒ध्नेद॒भि श्री॑णीतन इन्दु॒मिन्द्रे॑ दधातन
verses.transliteration: námaséd úpa sīdata  dadhnéd abhí śrīṇītana  índum índre dadhātana

translation.text: With humble homage draw ye nigh; blend the libation with the curds: To Indra offer Indu up.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒मि॒त्र॒हा विच॑र्षणिः॒ पव॑स्व सोम॒ शं गवे॑ दे॒वेभ्यो॑ अनुकाम॒कृत्
verses.transliteration: amitrahā́ vícarṣaṇiḥ  pávasva soma śáṃ gáve  devébhyo anukāmakŕ̥t

translation.text: Soma, foe-que chief o'er men, doing the will of pour forth Prosperity upon our kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑य सोम॒ पात॑वे॒ मदा॑य॒ परि॑ षिच्यसे म॒न॒श्चिन्मन॑स॒स्पतिः॑
verses.transliteration: índrāya soma pā́tave  mádāya pári ṣicyase  manaścín mánasas pátiḥ

translation.text: Heart-knower, Sovran of the heart, thou art effused, O Soma, that Indra may drink thee and rejoice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान सु॒वीर्यं॑ र॒यिं सो॑म रिरीहि नः इन्द॒विन्द्रे॑ण नो यु॒जा
verses.transliteration: pávamāna suvī́ryaṃ  rayíṃ soma rirīhi naḥ  índav índreṇa no yujā́

translation.text: O Soma Pavamâna, give us riches and heroic strength,– Indu! with. Indra for ally.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोमा॑ असृग्र॒मिन्द॑वः सु॒ता ऋ॒तस्य॒ साद॑ने इन्द्रा॑य॒ मधु॑मत्तमाः
verses.transliteration: sómā asr̥gram índavaḥ  sutā́ r̥tásya sā́dane  índrāya mádhumattamāḥ

translation.text: To Indra have the Soma drops, exceeding rich in sweets, been poured, Shed in the seat of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि विप्रा॑ अनूषत॒ गावो॑ व॒त्सं न मा॒तरः॑ इन्द्रं॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: abhí víprā anūṣata  gā́vo vatsáṃ ná mātáraḥ  índraṃ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: As mother kine low to their calves, to Indra have the sages called, Called him to drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒द॒च्युत्क्षे॑ति॒ साद॑ने॒ सिन्धो॑रू॒र्मा वि॑प॒श्चित् सोमो॑ गौ॒री अधि॑ श्रि॒तः
verses.transliteration: madacyút kṣeti sā́dane  síndhor ūrmā́ vipaścít  sómo gaurī́ ádhi śritáḥ

translation.text: In the stream's wave wise Soma dwells, distilling rapture, in his seat, Resting upon a wiId-cow's hide.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दि॒वो नाभा॑ विचक्ष॒णोऽव्यो॒ वारे॑ महीयते सोमो॒ यः सु॒क्रतुः॑ क॒विः
verses.transliteration: divó nā́bhā vicakṣaṇó  -ávyo vā́re mahīyate  sómo yáḥ sukrátuḥ kavíḥ

translation.text: Far-sighted Soma, Sage and Seer, is worshipped in the central point Of heaven, the straining-cloth of wool.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः सोमः॑ क॒लशे॒ष्वाँ अ॒न्तः प॒वित्र॒ आहि॑तः तमिन्दुः॒ परि॑ षस्वजे
verses.transliteration: yáḥ sómaḥ kaláśeṣv ā́m̐  antáḥ pavítra ā́hitaḥ  tám índuḥ pári ṣasvaje

translation.text: In close embraces Indu holds Soma when poured within the jars. And on the. purifying sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वाच॒मिन्दु॑रिष्यति समु॒द्रस्याधि॑ वि॒ष्टपि॑ जिन्व॒न्कोशं॑ मधु॒श्चुत॑म्
verses.transliteration: prá vā́cam índur iṣyati  samudrásyā́dhi viṣṭápi  jínvan kóśam madhuścútam

translation.text: Indu sends forth a voice on high to regions of the sea of air, Shaking the vase that drops with meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नित्य॑स्तोत्रो॒ वन॒स्पति॑र्धी॒नाम॒न्तः स॑ब॒र्दुघः॑ हि॒न्वा॒नो मानु॑षा यु॒गा
verses.transliteration: nítyastotro vánaspátir  dhīnā́m antáḥ sabardúghaḥ  hinvānó mā́nuṣā yugā́

translation.text: The Tree whose praises never fail yields heavenly milk among our hymns, Urging men's generations on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि प्रि॒या दि॒वस्प॒दा सोमो॑ हिन्वा॒नो अ॑र्षति विप्र॑स्य॒ धार॑या क॒विः
verses.transliteration: abhí priyā́ divás padā́  sómo hinvānó arṣati  víprasya dhā́rayā kavíḥ

translation.text: The Wise One, with the Sage's stream, the Soma urged to speed, flows on To the dear places of the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वमान धारय र॒यिं स॒हस्र॑वर्चसम् अ॒स्मे इ॑न्दो स्वा॒भुव॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavamāna dhāraya  rayíṃ sahásravarcasam  asmé indo svābhúvam

translation.text: O Pavamâna, bring us wealth bright with a thousand splendours. Yea. O Indu, give us ready help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोमः॑ पुना॒नो अ॑र्षति स॒हस्र॑धारो॒ अत्य॑विः वा॒योरिन्द्र॑स्य निष्कृ॒तम्
verses.transliteration: sómaḥ punānó arṣati  sahásradhāro átyaviḥ  vāyór índrasya niṣkr̥tám

translation.text: PASSED through, the fleece in thousand streams the Soma, purified, flows on To Indra's, Viyu's special place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानमवस्यवो॒ विप्र॑म॒भि प्र गा॑यत सु॒ष्वा॒णं दे॒ववी॑तये
verses.transliteration: pávamānam avasyavo  vípram abhí prá gāyata  suṣvāṇáṃ devávītaye

translation.text: Sing forth, ye men who long for help, to Pavamâna, to the Sage, Effused to entertain the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑न्ते॒ वाज॑सातये॒ सोमाः॑ स॒हस्र॑पाजसः गृ॒णा॒ना दे॒ववी॑तये
verses.transliteration: pávante vā́jasātaye  sómāḥ sahásrapājasaḥ  gr̥ṇānā́ devávītaye

translation.text: The Soma-drops with thousand powers are purified for victory, Hymned to become the feast of Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नो॒ वाज॑सातये॒ पव॑स्व बृह॒तीरिषः॑ द्यु॒मदि॑न्दो सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: utá no vā́jasātaye  pávasva br̥hatī́r íṣaḥ  dyumád indo suvī́ryam

translation.text: Yea, as thou flowest bring great store of food that we may win the spoil Indu, bring splendid manly might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते नः॑ सह॒स्रिणं॑ र॒यिं पव॑न्ता॒मा सु॒वीर्य॑म् सु॒वा॒ना दे॒वास॒ इन्द॑वः
verses.transliteration: té naḥ sahasríṇaṃ rayím  pávantām ā́ suvī́ryam  suvānā́ devā́sa índavaḥ

translation.text: May they in flowing give us wealth in thousands, and heroic power,– These Godlike Soma-drops effused.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत्या॑ हिया॒ना न हे॒तृभि॒रसृ॑ग्रं॒ वाज॑सातये वि वार॒मव्य॑मा॒शवः॑
verses.transliteration: átyā hiyānā́ ná hetŕ̥bhir  ásr̥graṃ vā́jasātaye  ví vā́ram ávyam āśávaḥ

translation.text: Like coursers by their drivers urged, they were poured forth, for victory, Swift through the woollen straining-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वा॒श्रा अ॑र्ष॒न्तीन्द॑वो॒ऽभि व॒त्सं न धे॒नवः॑ द॒ध॒न्वि॒रे गभ॑स्त्योः
verses.transliteration: vāśrā́ arṣantī́ndavo  -abhí vatsáṃ ná dhenávaḥ  dadhanviré gábhastyoḥ

translation.text: Noisily flow the Soma-drops, like milch-kine lowing to their calves: They have run forth from both the hands.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जुष्ट॒ इन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रः पव॑मान॒ कनि॑क्रदत् विश्वा॒ अप॒ द्विषो॑ जहि
verses.transliteration: júṣṭa índrāya matsaráḥ  pávamāna kánikradat  víśvā ápa dvíṣo jahi

translation.text: As Gladdener whom Indra loves, O Pavamâna, with a roar Drive all our enemies away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प॒घ्नन्तो॒ अरा॑व्णः॒ पव॑मानाः स्व॒र्दृशः॑ योना॑वृ॒तस्य॑ सीदत
verses.transliteration: apaghnánto árāvṇaḥ  pávamānāḥ svardŕ̥śaḥ  yónāv r̥tásya sīdata

translation.text: O Pavamamas, driving off the godless, looking on the light, Sit in the place of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॒ प्रासि॑ष्यदत्क॒विः सिन्धो॑रू॒र्मावधि॑ श्रि॒तः का॒रं बिभ्र॑त्पुरु॒स्पृह॑म्
verses.transliteration: pári prā́siṣyadat kavíḥ  síndhor ūrmā́v ádhi śritáḥ  kārám bíbhrat puruspŕ̥ham

translation.text: REPOSING on the river's wave the Sage hath widely flowed around, Bearing the hymn which many love.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गि॒रा यदी॒ सब॑न्धवः॒ पञ्च॒ व्राता॑ अप॒स्यवः॑ प॒रि॒ष्कृ॒ण्वन्ति॑ धर्ण॒सिम्
verses.transliteration: girā́ yádī sábandhavaḥ  páñca vrā́tā apasyávaḥ  pariṣkr̥ṇvánti dharṇasím

translation.text: When the Five kindred Companies, active in duty, with the song Establish him, the Powerful,

verses.sanskrit_deva: आद॑स्य शु॒ष्मिणो॒ रसे॒ विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अ॑मत्सत यदी॒ गोभि॑र्वसा॒यते॑
verses.transliteration: ā́d asya śuṣmíṇo ráse  víśve devā́ amatsata  yádī góbhir vasāyáte

translation.text: Then in his juice whose strength is great, have all the Gods rejoiced themselves, When he hath clothed him in the milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि॒रि॒णा॒नो वि धा॑वति॒ जह॒च्छर्या॑णि॒ तान्वा॑ अत्रा॒ सं जि॑घ्नते यु॒जा
verses.transliteration: niriṇānó ví dhāvati  jáhac cháryāṇi tā́nvā  átrā sáṃ jighnate yujā́

translation.text: Freeing himself he flows away, leaving his body's severed limbs, And meets his own Companion here.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒प्तीभि॒र्यो वि॒वस्व॑तः शु॒भ्रो न मा॑मृ॒जे युवा॑ गाः कृ॑ण्वा॒नो न नि॒र्णिज॑म्
verses.transliteration: naptī́bhir yó vivásvataḥ  śubhró ná māmr̥jé yúvā  gā́ḥ kr̥ṇvānó ná nirṇíjam

translation.text: He by the daughters of the priest, like a fair youth, hath been adorned, Making the milk, as 'twere, his robe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अति॑ श्रि॒ती ति॑र॒श्चता॑ ग॒व्या जि॑गा॒त्यण्व्या॑ व॒ग्नुमि॑यर्ति॒ यं वि॒दे
verses.transliteration: áti śritī́ tiraścátā  gavyā́ jigāty áṇvyā  vagnúm iyarti yáṃ vidé

translation.text: O'er the fine fingers, through desire of milk, in winding course he goes, And utters voice which he hath found.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि क्षिपः॒ सम॑ग्मत म॒र्जय॑न्तीरि॒षस्पति॑म् पृ॒ष्ठा गृ॑भ्णत वा॒जिनः॑
verses.transliteration: abhí kṣípaḥ sám agmata  marjáyantīr iṣás pátim  pr̥ṣṭhā́ gr̥bhṇata vājínaḥ

translation.text: The nimble fingers have approached, adorning him the Lord of Strength: They grasp the vigorous Courser's back.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ दि॒व्यानि॒ मर्मृ॑श॒द्विश्वा॑नि सोम॒ पार्थि॑वा वसू॑नि याह्यस्म॒युः
verses.transliteration: pári divyā́ni mármr̥śad  víśvāni soma pā́rthivā  vásūni yāhy asmayúḥ

translation.text: Comprising all the treasures that are in the heavens and on the earth, Come, Soma, as our faithful Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष धि॒या या॒त्यण्व्या॒ शूरो॒ रथे॑भिरा॒शुभिः॑ गच्छ॒न्निन्द्र॑स्य निष्कृ॒तम्
verses.transliteration: eṣá dhiyā́ yāty áṇvyā  śū́ro ráthebhir āśúbhiḥ  gáchann índrasya niṣkr̥tám

translation.text: THROUGH the fine fingers, with the song, this Hero comes with rapid ears, Going to Indra's special place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष पु॒रू धि॑यायते बृह॒ते दे॒वता॑तये यत्रा॒मृता॑स॒ आस॑ते
verses.transliteration: eṣá purū́ dhiyāyate  br̥haté devátātaye  yátrāmŕ̥tāsa ā́sate

translation.text: In holy thought he ponders much for the great worship of the Gods. Where the Immortals have their seat.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष हि॒तो वि नी॑यते॒ऽन्तः शु॒भ्राव॑ता प॒था यदी॑ तु॒ञ्जन्ति॒ भूर्ण॑यः
verses.transliteration: eṣá hitó ví nīyate  -antáḥ śubhrā́vatā pathā́  yádī tuñjánti bhū́rṇayaḥ

translation.text: Like a good horse is he led out, when on the path that shines with light The mettled steeds exert their strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष शृङ्गा॑णि॒ दोधु॑व॒च्छिशी॑ते यू॒थ्यो॒३॒॑ वृषा॑ नृ॒म्णा दधा॑न॒ ओज॑सा
verses.transliteration: eṣá śŕ̥ṅgāṇi dódhuvac  -śíśīte yūthyò vŕ̥ṣā  nr̥mṇā́ dádhāna ójasā

translation.text: He brandishes his horns on high, and whets them Bull who leads the herd, Doing with might heroic deeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष रु॒क्मिभि॑रीयते वा॒जी शु॒भ्रेभि॑रं॒शुभिः॑ पतिः॒ सिन्धू॑नां॒ भव॑न्
verses.transliteration: eṣá rukmíbhir īyate  vājī́ śubhrébhir aṃśúbhiḥ  pátiḥ síndhūnām bhávan

translation.text: He moves, a vigorous Steed, adorned with beauteous rays of shining gold, Becoming Sovran of the streams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष वसू॑नि पिब्द॒ना परु॑षा ययि॒वाँ अति॑ अव॒ शादे॑षु गच्छति
verses.transliteration: eṣá vásūni pibdanā́  páruṣā yayivā́m̐ áti  áva śā́deṣu gachati

translation.text: He, over places rough to pass, bringing rich treasures closely packed. Descends into the reservoirs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तं मृ॑जन्ति॒ मर्ज्य॒मुप॒ द्रोणे॑ष्वा॒यवः॑ प्र॒च॒क्रा॒णं म॒हीरिषः॑
verses.transliteration: etám mr̥janti márjyam  úpa dróṇeṣv āyávaḥ  pracakrāṇám mahī́r íṣaḥ

translation.text: Men beautify him in the vats, him worthy to be beautified, Him who brings forth abundant food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तमु॒ त्यं दश॒ क्षिपो॑ मृ॒जन्ति॑ स॒प्त धी॒तयः॑ स्वा॒यु॒धं म॒दिन्त॑मम्
verses.transliteration: etám u tyáṃ dáśa kṣípo  mr̥jánti saptá dhītáyaḥ  svāyudhám madíntamam

translation.text: Him, even him, the fingers ten and the seven songs make beautiful, Well-weaponed, best of gladdeners.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र ते॑ सो॒तार॑ ओ॒ण्यो॒३॒॑ रसं॒ मदा॑य॒ घृष्व॑ये सर्गो॒ न त॒क्त्येत॑शः
verses.transliteration: prá te sotā́ra oṇyò  rásam mádāya ghŕ̥ṣvaye  sárgo ná takty étaśaḥ

translation.text: THE pressers from the Soma-press send forth thy juice for rapturous joy The speckled sap runs like a flood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्रत्वा॒ दक्ष॑स्य र॒थ्य॑म॒पो वसा॑न॒मन्ध॑सा गो॒षामण्वे॑षु सश्चिम
verses.transliteration: krátvā dákṣasya rathyàm  apó vásānam ándhasā  goṣā́m áṇveṣu saścima

translation.text: With strength we follow through the sieve him who brings might and wins the kine, Enrobed in water with his juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अन॑प्तम॒प्सु दु॒ष्टरं॒ सोमं॑ प॒वित्र॒ आ सृ॑ज पु॒नी॒हीन्द्रा॑य॒ पात॑वे
verses.transliteration: ánaptam apsú duṣṭáraṃ  sómam pavítra ā́ sr̥ja  punīhī́ndrāya pā́tave

translation.text: Pour on the sieve the Soma, ne'er subdued in waters, waterless, And make it pure for Indra's drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र पु॑ना॒नस्य॒ चेत॑सा॒ सोमः॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अर्षति क्रत्वा॑ स॒धस्थ॒मास॑दत्
verses.transliteration: prá punānásya cétasā  sómaḥ pavítre arṣati  krátvā sadhástham ā́sadat

translation.text: Moved by the purifier's thought, the Soma flows into the sieve: By wisdom it hath gained its home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र त्वा॒ नमो॑भि॒रिन्द॑व॒ इन्द्र॒ सोमा॑ असृक्षत म॒हे भरा॑य का॒रिणः॑
verses.transliteration: prá tvā námobhir índavaḥ-  índra sómā asr̥kṣata  mahé bhárāya kāríṇaḥ

translation.text: With humble homage, Indra, have the Soma-drops flowed forth to thee, Contending for the glorious prize.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नो रू॒पे अ॒व्यये॒ विश्वा॒ अर्ष॑न्न॒भि श्रियः॑ शूरो॒ न गोषु॑ तिष्ठति
verses.transliteration: punānó rūpé avyáye  víśvā árṣann abhí śríyaḥ  śū́ro ná góṣu tiṣṭhati

translation.text: Purified in his fleecy garb, attaining every beauty, he Stands, hero-like, amid the kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दि॒वो न सानु॑ पि॒प्युषी॒ धारा॑ सु॒तस्य॑ वे॒धसः॑ वृथा॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अर्षति
verses.transliteration: divó ná sā́nu pipyúṣī  dhā́rā sutásya vedhásaḥ  vŕ̥thā pavítre arṣati

translation.text: Swelling, as 'twere, to heights of heaven, the stream of the creative juice Falls lightly on the cleansing sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म विप॒श्चितं॒ तना॑ पुना॒न आ॒युषु॑ अव्यो॒ वारं॒ वि धा॑वसि
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma vipaścítaṃ  tánā punāná āyúṣu  ávyo vā́raṃ ví dhāvasi

translation.text: Thus, Soma, purifying himwho knoweth song mid living men, Thou wanderest through the cloth of wool.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र नि॒म्नेने॑व॒ सिन्ध॑वो॒ घ्नन्तो॑ वृ॒त्राणि॒ भूर्ण॑यः सोमा॑ असृग्रमा॒शवः॑
verses.transliteration: prá nimnéneva síndhavo  ghnánto vr̥trā́ṇi bhū́rṇayaḥ  sómā asr̥gram āśávaḥ

translation.text: LIKE rivers down a steep descent, slaying the Vr̥itras, full of zeal, The rapid Soma-streams have flowed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि सु॑वा॒नास॒ इन्द॑वो वृ॒ष्टयः॑ पृथि॒वीमि॑व इन्द्रं॒ सोमा॑सो अक्षरन्
verses.transliteration: abhí suvānā́sa índavo  vr̥ṣṭáyaḥ pr̥thivī́m iva  índraṃ sómāso akṣaran

translation.text: The drops of Soma juice effused fall like the rain upon the earth: To Indra flow the Soma-streams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत्यू॑र्मिर्मत्स॒रो मदः॒ सोमः॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अर्षति वि॒घ्नन्रक्षां॑सि देव॒युः
verses.transliteration: átyūrmir matsaró mádaḥ  sómaḥ pavítre arṣati  vighnán rákṣāṃsi devayúḥ

translation.text: With swelling wave the gladdening drink, the Soma, flows into.the sieve, Loving the Gods and slaying fiends.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ क॒लशे॑षु धावति प॒वित्रे॒ परि॑ षिच्यते उ॒क्थैर्य॒ज्ञेषु॑ वर्धते
verses.transliteration: ā́ kaláśeṣu dhāvati  pavítre pári ṣicyate  ukthaír yajñéṣu vardhate

translation.text: It hastens to the pitchers, poured upon the sieve it waxes strong At sacrifices through the lauds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अति॒ त्री सो॑म रोच॒ना रोह॒न्न भ्रा॑जसे॒ दिव॑म् इ॒ष्णन्त्सूर्यं॒ न चो॑दयः
verses.transliteration: áti trī́ soma rocanā́  róhan ná bhrājase dívam  iṣṇán sū́ryaṃ ná codayaḥ

translation.text: Soma, thou shinest mounting heaven as 'twere above light's triple realm, And moving secm'st to speed the Sun.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि विप्रा॑ अनूषत मू॒र्धन्य॒ज्ञस्य॑ का॒रवः॑ दधा॑ना॒श्चक्ष॑सि प्रि॒यम्
verses.transliteration: abhí víprā anūṣata  mūrdhán yajñásya kārávaḥ  dádhānāś cákṣasi priyám

translation.text: To him, the head of sacnfice, singers and bards have sung their songs, Offering what he loves to see.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ त्वा वा॒जिनं॒ नरो॑ धी॒भिर्विप्रा॑ अव॒स्यवः॑ मृ॒जन्ति॑ दे॒वता॑तये
verses.transliteration: tám u tvā vājínaṃ náro  dhībhír víprā avasyávaḥ  mr̥jánti devátātaye

translation.text: The men, the sages with their hymns, eager for help, deck thee strong steed, Deck thee for service of the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मधो॒र्धारा॒मनु॑ क्षर ती॒व्रः स॒धस्थ॒मास॑दः चारु॑र्ऋ॒ताय॑ पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: mádhor dhā́rām ánu kṣara  tīvráḥ sadhástham ā́sadaḥ  cā́rur r̥tā́ya pītáye

translation.text: Flow onward to the stream of meath rest efficacious in thy home, Fair, to be drunk at sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ सुवा॒नो गि॑रि॒ष्ठाः प॒वित्रे॒ सोमो॑ अक्षाः मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: pári suvānó giriṣṭhā́ḥ  pavítre sómo akṣāḥ  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: THOU, Soma, dweller on the hills, effused, hast flowed into the sieve,: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं विप्र॒स्त्वं क॒विर्मधु॒ प्र जा॒तमन्ध॑सः मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: tváṃ vípras tváṃ kavír  mádhu prá jātám ándhasaḥ  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: Thou art a sacred Bard, a Sage; the meath is offspring of thy sap: All-bountcous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ विश्वे॑ स॒जोष॑सो दे॒वासः॑ पी॒तिमा॑शत मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: táva víśve sajóṣaso  devā́saḥ pītím āśata  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: All Deities of one accord have come that they may drink of thee: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यो विश्वा॑नि॒ वार्या॒ वसू॑नि॒ हस्त॑योर्द॒धे मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: ā́ yó víśvāni vā́ryā  vásūni hástayor dadhé  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: He who containeth in his hands all treasures much to be desired: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य इ॒मे रोद॑सी म॒ही सं मा॒तरे॑व॒ दोह॑ते मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: yá imé ródasī mahī́  sám mātáreva dóhate  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: Who milketh out this mighty Pair, the Earth and Heaven, like mother kine All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॒ यो रोद॑सी उ॒भे स॒द्यो वाजे॑भि॒रर्ष॑ति मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: pári yó ródasī ubhé  sadyó vā́jebhir árṣati  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: Who in a moment mightily floweth around these two world-halvcs: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स शु॒ष्मी क॒लशे॒ष्वा पु॑ना॒नो अ॑चिक्रदत् मदे॑षु सर्व॒धा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: sá śuṣmī́ kaláśeṣv ā́-  -ā́ punānó acikradat  mádeṣu sarvadhā́ asi

translation.text: The Strong One, being purified, hath in the pitchers cried aloud: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्सो॑म चि॒त्रमु॒क्थ्यं॑ दि॒व्यं पार्थि॑वं॒ वसु॑ तन्नः॑ पुना॒न आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: yát soma citrám ukthyàṃ  divyám pā́rthivaṃ vásu  tán naḥ punāná ā́ bhara

translation.text: O SOMA, being purified bring us the wondrous treasure, meet For lauds, that is in earth and heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒वं हि स्थः स्व॑र्पती॒ इन्द्र॑श्च सोम॒ गोप॑ती ई॒शा॒ना पि॑प्यतं॒ धियः॑
verses.transliteration: yuváṃ hí stháḥ svàrpatī  índraś ca soma gópatī  īśānā́ pipyataṃ dhíyaḥ

translation.text: For ye Twain, Indra, Soma, are Lords of the light, Lords of the kine: Great Rulers, prosper ye our songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॑ पुना॒न आ॒युषु॑ स्त॒नय॒न्नधि॑ ब॒र्हिषि॑ हरिः॒ सन्योनि॒मास॑दत्
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā punāná āyúṣu  stanáyann ádhi barhíṣi  háriḥ sán yónim ā́sadat

translation.text: The tawny Steer, while cleansed among the living, bellowing on the grass, Hath sunk and settled in his home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अवा॑वशन्त धी॒तयो॑ वृष॒भस्याधि॒ रेत॑सि सू॒नोर्व॒त्सस्य॑ मा॒तरः॑
verses.transliteration: ávāvaśanta dhītáyo  vr̥ṣabhásyā́dhi rétasi  sūnór vatsásya mātáraḥ

translation.text: Over the Steer's productive flow the sacred songs were resonant, The mothers of the darling Son.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कु॒विद्वृ॑ष॒ण्यन्ती॑भ्यः पुना॒नो गर्भ॑मा॒दध॑त् याः शु॒क्रं दु॑ह॒ते पयः॑
verses.transliteration: kuvíd vr̥ṣaṇyántībhyaḥ  punānó gárbham ādádhat  yā́ḥ śukráṃ duhaté páyaḥ

translation.text: Hath he not, purified, impregned the kine whb long to meet their Lord, The kine who yield the shining milk?

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ शिक्षापत॒स्थुषो॑ भि॒यस॒मा धे॑हि॒ शत्रु॑षु पव॑मान वि॒दा र॒यिम्
verses.transliteration: úpa śikṣāpatasthúṣo  bhiyásam ā́ dhehi śátruṣu  pávamāna vidā́ rayím

translation.text: Bring near us those who stand aloof strike fear into our enemies: O Pavamâna, find us wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि शत्रोः॑ सोम॒ वृष्ण्यं॒ नि शुष्मं॒ नि वय॑स्तिर दू॒रे वा॑ स॒तो अन्ति॑ वा
verses.transliteration: ní śátroḥ soma vŕ̥ṣṇyaṃ  ní śúṣmaṃ ní váyas tira  dūré vā sató ánti vā

translation.text: Soma, bring down the foeman's might, his vigorous strength and vital powe'r, Whether he be afar or near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र क॒विर्दे॒ववी॑त॒येऽव्यो॒ वारे॑भिरर्षति सा॒ह्वान्विश्वा॑ अ॒भि स्पृधः॑
verses.transliteration: prá kavír devávītaye-  -ávyo vā́rebhir arṣati  sāhvā́n víśvā abhí spŕ̥dhaḥ

translation.text: FORTH through the straining-cloth the Sage flows to the banquet of the Gods, Subduing all our enemies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि ष्मा॑ जरि॒तृभ्य॒ आ वाजं॒ गोम॑न्त॒मिन्व॑ति पव॑मानः सह॒स्रिण॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá hí ṣmā jaritŕ̥bhya~ā́  vā́jaṃ gómantam ínvati  pávamānaḥ sahasríṇam

translation.text: For he, as Pavamâna, sends thousandfold treasure in the shape Of cattle to the singing-men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॒ विश्वा॑नि॒ चेत॑सा मृ॒शसे॒ पव॑से म॒ती स नः॑ सोम॒ श्रवो॑ विदः
verses.transliteration: pári víśvāni cétasā  mr̥śáse pávase matī́  sá naḥ soma śrávo vidaḥ

translation.text: Thou graspest all things with thy mind, and purifiest thee with thoughts As such, O Soma, find us fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑र्ष बृ॒हद्यशो॑ म॒घव॑द्भ्यो ध्रु॒वं र॒यिम् इषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: abhy àrṣa br̥hád yáśo  maghávadbhyo dhruváṃ rayím  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: Pour lofty glory on us, send sure riches to our liberal lords, Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं राजे॑व सुव्र॒तो गिरः॑ सो॒मा वि॑वेशिथ पु॒ना॒नो व॑ह्ने अद्भुत
verses.transliteration: tváṃ rā́jeva suvrató  gíraḥ somā́ viveśitha  punānó vahne adbhuta

translation.text: As thou art cleansed, O Wondrous Steed, O Soma, thou hast entered, like A pious King, into the songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वह्नि॑र॒प्सु दु॒ष्टरो॑ मृ॒ज्यमा॑नो॒ गभ॑स्त्योः सोम॑श्च॒मूषु॑ सीदति
verses.transliteration: sá váhnir apsú duṣṭáro  mr̥jyámāno gábhastyoḥ  sómaś camū́ṣu sīdati

translation.text: He, Soma, like a courser in the floods invincible, made clean With hands, is resting in the jars.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्री॒ळुर्म॒खो न मं॑ह॒युः प॒वित्रं॑ सोम गच्छसि दध॑त्स्तो॒त्रे सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: krīḷúr makhó ná maṃhayúḥ  pavítraṃ soma gachasi  dádhat stotré suvī́ryam

translation.text: Disporting, like a liberal chief, thou goest, Soma, to the sieve, Lending the laud a Hero's strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते धा॑व॒न्तीन्द॑वः॒ सोमा॒ इन्द्रा॑य॒ घृष्व॑यः म॒त्स॒रासः॑ स्व॒र्विदः॑
verses.transliteration: eté dhāvantī́ndavaḥ  sómā índrāya ghŕ̥ṣvayaḥ  matsarā́saḥ svarvídaḥ

translation.text: To Indra flow these running drops, these Somas frolicsome in mood. Exhilarating, finding light;

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒वृ॒ण्वन्तो॑ अभि॒युजः॒ सुष्व॑ये वरिवो॒विदः॑ स्व॒यं स्तो॒त्रे व॑य॒स्कृतः॑
verses.transliteration: pravr̥ṇvánto abhiyújaḥ  súṣvaye varivovídaḥ  svayáṃ stotré vayaskŕ̥taḥ

translation.text: Driving off foes, bestowing room upon the presser, willingly Bringing their praiser vitalforce.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृथा॒ क्रीळ॑न्त॒ इन्द॑वः स॒धस्थ॑म॒भ्येक॒मित् सिन्धो॑रू॒र्मा व्य॑क्षरन्
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥thā krī́ḷanta índavaḥ  sadhástham abhy ékam ít  síndhor ūrmā́ vy àkṣaran

translation.text: Lightly disporting them, the drops flow to one common reservoir, And fall into the river's wave.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते विश्वा॑नि॒ वार्या॒ पव॑मानास आशत हि॒ता न सप्त॑यो॒ रथे॑
verses.transliteration: eté víśvāni vā́ryā  pávamānāsa āśata  hitā́ ná sáptayo ráthe

translation.text: These Pavamânas have obtained all blessings much to be desired, Like coursers harnessed to a car.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आस्मि॑न्पि॒शङ्ग॑मिन्दवो॒ दधा॑ता वे॒नमा॒दिशे॑ यो अ॒स्मभ्य॒मरा॑वा
verses.transliteration: ā́smin piśáṅgam indavo  dádhātā venám ādíśe  yó asmábhyam árāvā

translation.text: With view to us, O Soma-drops, bestow his manifold desire On him who yet hath given us naught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒भुर्न रथ्यं॒ नवं॒ दधा॑ता॒ केत॑मा॒दिशे॑ शु॒क्राः प॑वध्व॒मर्ण॑सा
verses.transliteration: r̥bhúr ná ráthyaṃ návaṃ  dádhātā kétam ādíśe  śukrā́ḥ pavadhvam árṇasā

translation.text: Bring us our wish with this design, as a wright brings his new-wrought wheel: Flow pure and shining with the stream.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒त उ॒ त्ये अ॑वीवश॒न्काष्ठां॑ वा॒जिनो॑ अक्रत स॒तः प्रासा॑विषुर्म॒तिम्
verses.transliteration: etá u tyé avīvaśan  kā́ṣṭhāṃ vājíno akrata  satáḥ prā́sāviṣur matím

translation.text: These drops have cried with resonant voice: like swift steeds they have run the course, And roused the good man's hymn to life.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते सोमा॑स आ॒शवो॒ रथा॑ इव॒ प्र वा॒जिनः॑ सर्गाः॑ सृ॒ष्टा अ॑हेषत
verses.transliteration: eté sómāsa āśávo  ráthā iva prá vājínaḥ  sárgāḥ sr̥ṣṭā́ aheṣata

translation.text: THESE rapid Soma-streams have stirred themselves to motion like strong steeds, Like cars, like armies hurried forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते वाता॑ इवो॒रवः॑ प॒र्जन्य॑स्येव वृ॒ष्टयः॑ अ॒ग्नेरि॑व भ्र॒मा वृथा॑
verses.transliteration: eté vā́tā ivorávaḥ  parjányasyeva vr̥ṣṭáyaḥ  agnér iva bhramā́ vŕ̥thā

translation.text: Swift as wide winds they lightly move, like rain-storms of Parjanya, like The flickering flames of burning fire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते पू॒ता वि॑प॒श्चितः॒ सोमा॑सो॒ दध्या॑शिरः वि॒पा व्या॑नशु॒र्धियः॑
verses.transliteration: eté pūtā́ vipaścítaḥ  sómāso dádhyāśiraḥ  vipā́ vy ā̀naśur dhíyaḥ

translation.text: These Soma juices, blent with curds, purified, skilled in sacred hymns, Have gained by song their hearts'desire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते मृ॒ष्टा अम॑र्त्याः ससृ॒वांसो॒ न श॑श्रमुः इय॑क्षन्तः प॒थो रजः॑
verses.transliteration: eté mr̥ṣṭā́ ámartyāḥ  sasr̥vā́ṃso ná śaśramuḥ  íyakṣantaḥ pathó rájaḥ

translation.text: Immortal, cleansed, these drops, since first they flowed, have never wearied, fain To reach the regions and their paths.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते पृ॒ष्ठानि॒ रोद॑सोर्विप्र॒यन्तो॒ व्या॑नशुः उ॒तेदमु॑त्त॒मं रजः॑
verses.transliteration: eté pr̥ṣṭhā́ni ródasor  viprayánto vy ā̀naśuḥ  utédám uttamáṃ rájaḥ

translation.text: Advancing they have travelled o'er the ridges of the earth and heaven, And this the highest realm of all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तन्तुं॑ तन्वा॒नमु॑त्त॒ममनु॑ प्र॒वत॑ आशत उ॒तेदमु॑त्त॒माय्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: tántuṃ tanvānám uttamám  ánu praváta āśata  utédám uttamā́yyam

translation.text: Over the heights have they attained the highest thread that is spun out, And this which must be deemed most high.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म प॒णिभ्य॒ आ वसु॒ गव्या॑नि धारयः त॒तं तन्तु॑मचिक्रदः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma paṇíbhya~ā́  vásu gávyāni dhārayaḥ  tatáṃ tántum acikradaḥ

translation.text: Thou, Soma, boldest wealth in kine which thou hast seized from niggard churls: Thou calledst forth the outspun thread.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोमा॑ असृग्रमा॒शवो॒ मधो॒र्मद॑स्य॒ धार॑या अ॒भि विश्वा॑नि॒ काव्या॑
verses.transliteration: sómā asr̥gram āśávaḥ  mádhor mádasya dhā́rayā  abhí víśvāni kā́vyā

translation.text: SWIFT Soma drops have been effused in streams of meath, the gladdening drink, For sacred lore of every kind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अनु॑ प्र॒त्नास॑ आ॒यवः॑ प॒दं नवी॑यो अक्रमुः रु॒चे ज॑नन्त॒ सूर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: ánu pratnā́sa āyávaḥ  padáṃ návīyo akramuḥ  rucé jananta sū́ryam

translation.text: Hither to newer. resting-place the ancient Living Ones are come. They made the Sun that he might shine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वमान नो भरा॒र्यो अदा॑शुषो॒ गय॑म् कृ॒धि प्र॒जाव॑ती॒रिषः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavamāna no bhara-  -aryó ádāśuṣo gáyam  kr̥dhí prajā́vatīr íṣaḥ

translation.text: O Pavamâna, bring to us the unsacrificing foeman's wealth, And give us food with progeny.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि सोमा॑स आ॒यवः॒ पव॑न्ते॒ मद्यं॒ मद॑म् अ॒भि कोशं॑ मधु॒श्चुत॑म्
verses.transliteration: abhí sómāsa āyávaḥ  pávante mádyam mádam  abhí kóśam madhuścútam

translation.text: The living Somas being cleansed diffuse exhilarating drink, Turned to the vat which drips with meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोमो॑ अर्षति धर्ण॒सिर्दधा॑न इन्द्रि॒यं रस॑म् सु॒वीरो॑ अभिशस्ति॒पाः
verses.transliteration: sómo arṣati dharṇasír  dádhāna indriyáṃ rásam  suvī́ro abhiśastipā́ḥ

translation.text: Soma gows on intelligent, possessing sap and mighty strength, Brave Hero who repels the curse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑य सोम पवसे दे॒वेभ्यः॑ सध॒माद्यः॑ इन्दो॒ वाजं॑ सिषाससि
verses.transliteration: índrāya soma pavase  devébhyaḥ sadhamā́dyaḥ  índo vā́jaṃ siṣāsasi

translation.text: For Indra, Soma! thou art cleansed, a feast-companion for the Gods:

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य पी॒त्वा मदा॑ना॒मिन्द्रो॑ वृ॒त्राण्य॑प्र॒ति ज॒घान॑ ज॒घन॑च्च॒ नु
verses.transliteration: asyá pītvā́ mádānāṃ  índro vr̥trā́ṇy apratí  jaghā́na jaghánac ca nú

translation.text: When he had drunken draughts of this, Indra smote down resistless foes: Yea, smote them, and shall smite them still.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सोमा॑सो अधन्विषुः॒ पव॑मानास॒ इन्द॑वः श्री॒णा॒ना अ॒प्सु मृ॑ञ्जत
verses.transliteration: prá sómāso adhanviṣuḥ  pávamānāsa índavaḥ  śrīṇānā́ apsú mr̥ñjata

translation.text: HITHERWARD have the Soma streamed, the drops while they are purified: When bIent, in waters they are rinsed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि गावो॑ अधन्विषु॒रापो॒ न प्र॒वता॑ य॒तीः पु॒ना॒ना इन्द्र॑माशत
verses.transliteration: abhí gā́vo adhanviṣur  -ā́po ná pravátā yatī́ḥ  punānā́ índram āśata

translation.text: The milk hath run to meet them like floods rushing down a precipice: They come to Indra, being cleansed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र प॑वमान धन्वसि॒ सोमेन्द्रा॑य॒ पात॑वे नृभि॑र्य॒तो वि नी॑यसे
verses.transliteration: prá pavamāna dhanvasi  sóméndrāya pā́tave  nŕ̥bhir yató ví nīyase

translation.text: O Soma Pavamâna, thou art flowing to be Indra's drink: The men have seized and lead thee forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म नृ॒माद॑नः॒ पव॑स्व चर्षणी॒सहे॑ सस्नि॒र्यो अ॑नु॒माद्यः॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma nr̥mā́danaḥ  pávasva carṣaṇīsáhe  sásnir yó anumā́dyaḥ

translation.text: Victorious, to be hailed with joy, O Soma, flow, delighting men, To him who ruleth o'er mankind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्दो॒ यदद्रि॑भिः सु॒तः प॒वित्रं॑ परि॒धाव॑सि अर॒मिन्द्र॑स्य॒ धाम्ने॑
verses.transliteration: índo yád ádribhiḥ sutáḥ  pavítram paridhā́vasi  áram índrasya dhā́mne

translation.text: Thou, Indu, when, effused by stones, thou runnest to the filter, art, Ready for Indra's high decree.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व वृत्रहन्तमो॒क्थेभि॑रनु॒माद्यः॑ शुचिः॑ पाव॒को अद्भु॑तः
verses.transliteration: pávasva vr̥trahantama-  -ukthébhir anumā́dyaḥ  śúciḥ pāvakó ádbhuto

translation.text: Flow on, best Vr̥itra-slayer; flow meet to be hailed with joyful lauds. Pure, purifying, wonderful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शुचिः॑ पाव॒क उ॑च्यते॒ सोमः॑ सु॒तस्य॒ मध्वः॑ दे॒वा॒वीर॑घशंस॒हा
verses.transliteration: śúciḥ pāvaká ucyate  sómaḥ sutásya mádhvaḥ  devāvī́r aghaśaṃsahā́

translation.text: Pure, purifying is he called the Soma of the meath eflused, Slayer of sinners, dear to Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व दक्ष॒साध॑नो दे॒वेभ्यः॑ पी॒तये॑ हरे म॒रुद्भ्यो॑ वा॒यवे॒ मदः॑
verses.transliteration: pávasva dakṣasā́dhano  devébhyaḥ pītáye hare  marúdbhyo vāyáve mádaḥ

translation.text: GREEN-HUED! as one who giveth strength flow on for Gods to drink, a draught For Vâyu and the Marut host.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान धि॒या हि॒तो॒३॒॑ऽभि योनिं॒ कनि॑क्रदत् धर्म॑णा वा॒युमा वि॑श
verses.transliteration: pávamāna dhiyā́ hitáḥ-  -abhí yóniṃ kánikradat  dhármaṇā vāyúm ā́ viśa

translation.text: O Pavamâna, sent by song, roaring about thy dwelling-place, Pass into Vâyu as Law bids.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सं दे॒वैः शो॑भते॒ वृषा॑ क॒विर्योना॒वधि॑ प्रि॒यः वृ॒त्र॒हा दे॑व॒वीत॑मः
verses.transliteration: sáṃ devaíḥ śobhate vŕ̥ṣā  kavír yónāv ádhi priyáḥ  vr̥trahā́ devavī́tamaḥ

translation.text: The Steer shines with the Deities, dear Sage in his appointed home, Foe-Slayer, most beloved by Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॑ रू॒पाण्या॑वि॒शन्पु॑ना॒नो या॑ति हर्य॒तः यत्रा॒मृता॑स॒ आस॑ते
verses.transliteration: víśvā rūpā́ṇy āviśán  punānó yāti haryatáḥ  yátrāmŕ̥tāsa ā́sate

translation.text: Taking each beauteous form, he goes, desirable, while purified, Thither where- the Immortals sit.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒रु॒षो ज॒नय॒न्गिरः॒ सोमः॑ पवत आयु॒षक् इन्द्रं॒ गच्छ॑न्क॒विक्र॑तुः
verses.transliteration: aruṣó janáyan gíraḥ  sómaḥ pavata āyuṣák  índraṃ gáchan kavíkratuḥ

translation.text: To Indra Soma flows, the Red, engendering song, exceeding wise, The visitor of living men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व मदिन्तम प॒वित्रं॒ धार॑या कवे अ॒र्कस्य॒ योनि॑मा॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva madintama  pavítraṃ dhā́rayā kave  arkásya yónim āsádam

translation.text: Flow, best exhilarator, Sage, flow to the filter in a stream To seat thee in the place of song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॑मृक्षन्त वा॒जिन॑मु॒पस्थे॒ अदि॑ते॒रधि॑ विप्रा॑सो॒ अण्व्या॑ धि॒या
verses.transliteration: tám amr̥kṣanta vājínam  upásthe áditer ádhi  víprāso áṇvyā dhiyā́

translation.text: THE sages with the fingers' art have dressed and decked that vigorous Steed Upon the lap of Aditi,

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं गावो॑ अ॒भ्य॑नूषत स॒हस्र॑धार॒मक्षि॑तम् इन्दुं॑ ध॒र्तार॒मा दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: táṃ gā́vo abhy ànūṣata  sahásradhāram ákṣitam  índuṃ dhartā́ram ā́ diváḥ

translation.text: The kine have called aloud to him exhaustless with a thousand streams, To Indu who supporteth heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं वे॒धां मे॒धया॑ह्य॒न्पव॑मान॒मधि॒ द्यवि॑ ध॒र्ण॒सिं भूरि॑धायसम्
verses.transliteration: táṃ vedhā́m medháyāhyan  pávamānam ádhi dyávi  dharṇasím bhū́ridhāyasam

translation.text: Him, nourisher of many, Sage, creative Pavamâna, they Have sent, by wisdom, to the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॑ह्यन्भु॒रिजो॑र्धि॒या सं॒वसा॑नं वि॒वस्व॑तः पतिं॑ वा॒चो अदा॑भ्यम्
verses.transliteration: tám ahyan bhuríjor dhiyā́  saṃvásānaṃ vivásvataḥ  pátiṃ vācó ádābhyam

translation.text: Him, dweller with Vivasvan, they with use of both arms have sent forth, The Lord of Speech infallible.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं साना॒वधि॑ जा॒मयो॒ हरिं॑ हिन्व॒न्त्यद्रि॑भिः ह॒र्य॒तं भूरि॑चक्षसम्
verses.transliteration: táṃ sā́nāv ádhi jāmáyo  háriṃ hinvanty ádribhiḥ  haryatám bhū́ricakṣasam

translation.text: Him, green, beloved, many eyed, the Sisters with prosing stones Send down to ridges of the sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ हिन्वन्ति वे॒धसः॒ पव॑मान गिरा॒वृध॑म् इन्द॒विन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रम्
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā hinvanti vedhásaḥ  pávamāna girāvŕ̥dham  índav índrāya matsarám

translation.text: O Pavamâna, Indu, priests hurry thee on to Indra, thee Who aidest song and cheerest him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष क॒विर॒भिष्टु॑तः प॒वित्रे॒ अधि॑ तोशते पु॒ना॒नो घ्नन्नप॒ स्रिधः॑
verses.transliteration: eṣá kavír abhíṣṭutaḥ  pavítre ádhi tośate  punānó ghnánn ápa srídhaḥ

translation.text: THIS Sage, exalted by our lauds, flows to the purifying cloth, Scattering foes as he is cleansed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष इन्द्रा॑य वा॒यवे॑ स्व॒र्जित्परि॑ षिच्यते प॒वित्रे॑ दक्ष॒साध॑नः
verses.transliteration: eṣá índrāya vāyáve  svarjít pári ṣicyate  pavítre dakṣasā́dhanaḥ

translation.text: As giving power and winning light, for Indra and for Vâyu he Is poured upon the filtering-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष नृभि॒र्वि नी॑यते दि॒वो मू॒र्धा वृषा॑ सु॒तः सोमो॒ वने॑षु विश्व॒वित्
verses.transliteration: eṣá nŕ̥bhir ví nīyate  divó mūrdhā́ vŕ̥ṣā sutáḥ  sómo váneṣu viśvavít

translation.text: The men conduct him, Soma, Steer, Omniscient, and the Head of Heaven, Effused into the vats of wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष ग॒व्युर॑चिक्रद॒त्पव॑मानो हिरण्य॒युः इन्दुः॑ सत्रा॒जिदस्तृ॑तः
verses.transliteration: eṣá gavyúr acikradat  pávamāno hiraṇyayúḥ  índuḥ satrājíd ástr̥taḥ

translation.text: Longing for kine, longing for gold hath Indu Pavamâna lowed, Still Conqueror, never overcome.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष सूर्ये॑ण हासते॒ पव॑मानो॒ अधि॒ द्यवि॑ प॒वित्रे॑ मत्स॒रो मदः॑
verses.transliteration: eṣá sū́ryeṇa hāsate  pávamāno ádhi dyávi  pavítre matsaró mádaḥ

translation.text: This Pavamâna, gladdening draught, drops on the filtering cloth, and then Mounts up with Sûrya to the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष शु॒ष्म्य॑सिष्यदद॒न्तरि॑क्षे॒ वृषा॒ हरिः॑ पु॒ना॒न इन्दु॒रिन्द्र॒मा
verses.transliteration: eṣá śuṣmy àsiṣyadad  antárikṣe vŕ̥ṣā háriḥ  punāná índur índram ā́

translation.text: To Indra in the firmament this mighty tawny Steer hath flowed, This Indu, being purified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष वा॒जी हि॒तो नृभि॑र्विश्व॒विन्मन॑स॒स्पतिः॑ अव्यो॒ वारं॒ वि धा॑वति
verses.transliteration: eṣá vājī́ hitó nŕ̥bhir  viśvavín mánasas pátiḥ  ávyo vā́raṃ ví dhāvati

translation.text: URGED by the men, this vigorous Steed, Lord of the mind, Omniscient, Runs to the woollen straining-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष प॒वित्रे॑ अक्षर॒त्सोमो॑ दे॒वेभ्यः॑ सु॒तः विश्वा॒ धामा॑न्यावि॒शन्
verses.transliteration: eṣá pavítre akṣarat  sómo devébhyaḥ sutáḥ  víśvā dhā́māny āviśán

translation.text: Within the filter hath he flowed, this Soma for the Gods effused, Entering all their essences.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष दे॒वः शु॑भाय॒तेऽधि॒ योना॒वम॑र्त्यः वृ॒त्र॒हा दे॑व॒वीत॑मः
verses.transliteration: eṣá deváḥ śubhāyate-  -ádhi yónāv ámartyaḥ  vr̥trahā́ devavī́tamaḥ

translation.text: He shines in beauty there, this God Immortal in his dwelling-place, Foe-slayer, dearest to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष वृषा॒ कनि॑क्रदद्द॒शभि॑र्जा॒मिभि॑र्य॒तः अ॒भि द्रोणा॑नि धावति
verses.transliteration: eṣá vŕ̥ṣā kánikradad  daśábhir jāmíbhir yatáḥ  abhí dróṇāni dhāvati

translation.text: Directed by the Sisters ten, bellowing on his way this Steer Runs onward to the wooden vats.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष सूर्य॑मरोचय॒त्पव॑मानो॒ विच॑र्षणिः विश्वा॒ धामा॑नि विश्व॒वित्
verses.transliteration: eṣá sū́ryam arocayat  pávamāno vícarṣaṇiḥ  víśvā dhā́māni viśvavít

translation.text: This Pavamâna, swiftand strong, Omniscient, gave spleudour to The Sun and all his forms of light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष शु॒ष्म्यदा॑भ्यः॒ सोमः॑ पुना॒नो अ॑र्षति दे॒वा॒वीर॑घशंस॒हा
verses.transliteration: eṣá śuṣmy ádābhyaḥ  sómaḥ punānó arṣati  devāvī́r aghaśaṃsahā́

translation.text: This Soma being purified, flows mighty and infallible, Slayer of sinners, dear toGods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रास्य॒ धारा॑ अक्षर॒न्वृष्णः॑ सु॒तस्यौज॑सा दे॒वाँ अनु॑ प्र॒भूष॑तः
verses.transliteration: prā́sya dhā́rā akṣaran  vŕ̥ṣṇaḥ sutásyaújasā  devā́m̐ ánu prabhū́ṣataḥ

translation.text: FORWARD with mighty force have flowed the currents of this Steer effused, Of him who sets him by the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सप्तिं॑ मृजन्ति वे॒धसो॑ गृ॒णन्तः॑ का॒रवो॑ गि॒रा ज्योति॑र्जज्ञा॒नमु॒क्थ्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: sáptim mr̥janti vedháso  gr̥ṇántaḥ kārávo girā́  jyótir jajñānám ukthyàm

translation.text: The singers praise him with their song, and learned priests adorn the Steed, Brought forth as light that merits laud.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒षहा॑ सोम॒ तानि॑ ते पुना॒नाय॑ प्रभूवसो वर्धा॑ समु॒द्रमु॒क्थ्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: suṣáhā soma tā́ni te  punānā́ya prabhūvaso  várdhā samudrám ukthyàm

translation.text: These things thou winnest lightly while purified, Soma, Lord of wealth: Fill full the sea that claims our praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॒ वसू॑नि सं॒जय॒न्पव॑स्व सोम॒ धार॑या इ॒नु द्वेषां॑सि स॒ध्र्य॑क्
verses.transliteration: víśvā vásūni saṃjáyan  pávasva soma dhā́rayā  inú dvéṣāṃsi sadhryàk

translation.text: Winning all precious things at once, flow on, O Soma, with thy stream Drive to one place our enemies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: रक्षा॒ सु नो॒ अर॑रुषः स्व॒नात्स॑मस्य॒ कस्य॑ चित् नि॒दो यत्र॑ मुमु॒च्महे॑
verses.transliteration: rákṣā sú no áraruṣaḥ  svanā́t samasya kásya cit  nidó yátra mumucmáhe

translation.text: Preserve us from the godless, from ill-omened voice of one and all, That so we may be freed from blame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एन्दो॒ पार्थि॑वं र॒यिं दि॒व्यं प॑वस्व॒ धार॑या द्यु॒मन्तं॒ शुष्म॒मा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: éndo pā́rthivaṃ rayíṃ  divyám pavasva dhā́rayā  dyumántaṃ śúṣmam ā́ bhara

translation.text: O Indu, as thou flowest on bring us the wealth of earth and heaven, And splendid vigour, in thy stream.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र धारा॑ अस्य शु॒ष्मिणो॒ वृथा॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अक्षरन् पु॒ना॒नो वाच॑मिष्यति
verses.transliteration: prá dhā́rā asya śuṣmíṇo  vŕ̥thā pavítre akṣaran  punānó vā́cam iṣyati

translation.text: STREAMS of this Potent One have flowed easily to the straining-cloth: While he is cleansed he lifts his voice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्दु॑र्हिया॒नः सो॒तृभि॑र्मृ॒ज्यमा॑नः॒ कनि॑क्रदत् इय॑र्ति व॒ग्नुमि॑न्द्रि॒यम्
verses.transliteration: índur hiyānáḥ sotŕ̥bhir  mr̥jyámānaḥ kánikradat  íyarti vagnúm indriyám

translation.text: Indu, by pressers urged to speed, bellowing out while beautified. Sends forth a very mighty sound.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नः॒ शुष्मं॑ नृ॒षाह्यं॑ वी॒रव॑न्तं पुरु॒स्पृह॑म् पव॑स्व सोम॒ धार॑या
verses.transliteration: ā́ naḥ śúṣmaṃ nr̥ṣā́hyaṃ  vīrávantam puruspŕ̥ham  pávasva soma dhā́rayā

translation.text: Pour on us, Soma, with thy stream manconquering might which many crave, Accompanied with hero sons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सोमो॒ अति॒ धार॑या॒ पव॑मानो असिष्यदत् अ॒भि द्रोणा॑न्या॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: prá sómo áti dhā́rayā  pávamāno asiṣyadat  abhí dróṇāny āsádam

translation.text: Hither hath Pavamâna flowed, Soma flowed hither in a stream, To settle in the vats of wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प्सु त्वा॒ मधु॑मत्तमं॒ हरिं॑ हिन्व॒न्त्यद्रि॑भिः इन्द॒विन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: apsú tvā mádhumattamaṃ  háriṃ hinvanty ádribhiḥ  índav índrāya pītáye

translation.text: To waters with the stones they drive thee tawny-hued, most rich in sweets, O Indu, to be Indra's drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒नोता॒ मधु॑मत्तमं॒ सोम॒मिन्द्रा॑य व॒ज्रिणे॑ चारुं॒ शर्धा॑य मत्स॒रम्
verses.transliteration: sunótā mádhumattamaṃ  sómam índrāya vajríṇe  cā́ruṃ śárdhāya matsarám

translation.text: For Indra, for the Thunderer press the Soma very rich in sweets, Lovely, inspiriting, for strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सोमा॑सः स्वा॒ध्य१॒॑ः पव॑मानासो अक्रमुः र॒यिं कृ॑ण्वन्ति॒ चेत॑नम्
verses.transliteration: prá sómāsaḥ svādhyàḥ  pávamānāso akramuḥ  rayíṃ kr̥ṇvanti cétanam

translation.text: THE, Soma-drops, benevolent, come forth as they are purified, Bestowing wealth which all may see.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दि॒वस्पृ॑थि॒व्या अधि॒ भवे॑न्दो द्युम्न॒वर्ध॑नः भवा॒ वाजा॑नां॒ पतिः॑
verses.transliteration: divás pr̥thivyā́ ádhi  bhávendo dyumnavárdhanaḥ  bhávā vā́jānām pátiḥ

translation.text: O Indu, high o'er heaven and earth be thou, increaser of our might: The Master of all strength be thou.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्यं॒ वाता॑ अभि॒प्रिय॒स्तुभ्य॑मर्षन्ति॒ सिन्ध॑वः सोम॒ वर्ध॑न्ति ते॒ महः॑
verses.transliteration: túbhyaṃ vā́tā abhipríyas  túbhyam arṣanti síndhavaḥ  sóma várdhanti te máhaḥ

translation.text: The winds are gracious in their love to thee, the rivers flow to thee Soma, they multiply thy power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प्या॑यस्व॒ समे॑तु ते वि॒श्वतः॑ सोम॒ वृष्ण्य॑म् भवा॒ वाज॑स्य संग॒थे
verses.transliteration: ā́ pyāyasva sám etu te  viśvátaḥ soma vŕ̥ṣṇyam  bhávā vā́jasya saṃgathé

translation.text: Soma, wax great. From every side may vigorous powers unite in thee: Be in the gathering-Place of strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्यं॒ गावो॑ घृ॒तं पयो॒ बभ्रो॑ दुदु॒ह्रे अक्षि॑तम् वर्षि॑ष्ठे॒ अधि॒ सान॑वि
verses.transliteration: túbhyaṃ gā́vo ghr̥tám páyo  bábhro duduhré ákṣitam  várṣiṣṭhe ádhi sā́navi

translation.text: For thee, brown-hued! the kine have poured imperishable oil and milk. Aloft on the sublimest height.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वा॒यु॒धस्य॑ ते स॒तो भुव॑नस्य पते व॒यम् इन्दो॑ सखि॒त्वमु॑श्मसि
verses.transliteration: svāyudhásya te sató  bhúvanasya pate vayám  índo sakhitvám uśmasi

translation.text: Friendship, O Indu, we desire with thee who bearest noble arms, With thee, O Lord of all that is.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सोमा॑सो मद॒च्युतः॒ श्रव॑से नो म॒घोनः॑ सु॒ता वि॒दथे॑ अक्रमुः
verses.transliteration: prá sómāso madacyútaḥ  śrávase no maghónaḥ  sutā́ vidáthe akramuḥ

translation.text: THE rapture-shedding Soma-drops, effused in our assembly, have Flowed forth to glorify our prince.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदीं॑ त्रि॒तस्य॒ योष॑णो॒ हरिं॑ हिन्व॒न्त्यद्रि॑भिः इन्दु॒मिन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: ā́d īṃ tritásya yóṣaṇo  háriṃ hinvanty ádribhiḥ  índum índrāya pītáye

translation.text: Then Trita's Maidens onward urge the Tawny-coloured with the stones, Indu for Indra, for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदीं॑ हं॒सो यथा॑ ग॒णं विश्व॑स्यावीवशन्म॒तिम् अत्यो॒ न गोभि॑रज्यते
verses.transliteration: ā́d īṃ haṃsó yáthā gaṇáṃ  víśvasyāvīvaśan matím  átyo ná góbhir ajyate

translation.text: Now like a swan he maketh all the company sing each his hymn: He, like a steed, is bathed in milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒भे सो॑माव॒चाक॑शन्मृ॒गो न त॒क्तो अ॑र्षसि सीद॑न्नृ॒तस्य॒ योनि॒मा
verses.transliteration: ubhé somāvacā́kaśat-  mr̥gó ná taktó arṣasi  sī́dann r̥tásya yónim ā́

translation.text: O Soma, viewing heaven and earth, thou runncst like a darting deer Set in the place of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि गावो॑ अनूषत॒ योषा॑ जा॒रमि॑व प्रि॒यम् अग॑न्ना॒जिं यथा॑ हि॒तम्
verses.transliteration: abhí gā́vo anūṣata  yóṣā jārám iva priyám  ágann ājíṃ yáthā hitám

translation.text: The cows have sung with joy to him, even as a woman to her love He came as to a settled race.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मे धे॑हि द्यु॒मद्यशो॑ म॒घव॑द्भ्यश्च॒ मह्यं॑ च स॒निं मे॒धामु॒त श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: asmé dhehi dyumád yáśo  maghávadbhyaś ca máhyaṃ ca  saním medhā́m utá śrávaḥ

translation.text: Bestow illustrious fame on us, both on our liberal lords and me, Glory, intelligence, and wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सोमा॑सो विप॒श्चितो॒ऽपां न य॑न्त्यू॒र्मयः॑ वना॑नि महि॒षा इ॑व
verses.transliteration: prá sómāso vipaścíto  -apā́ṃ ná yanty ūrmáyaḥ  vánāni mahiṣā́ iva

translation.text: LIKE waves of waters, skilled in song the juices of the Soma speed Onward, as buffaloes to woods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि द्रोणा॑नि ब॒भ्रवः॑ शु॒क्रा ऋ॒तस्य॒ धार॑या वाजं॒ गोम॑न्तमक्षरन्
verses.transliteration: abhí dróṇāni babhrávaḥ  śukrā́ r̥tásya dhā́rayā  vā́jaṃ gómantam akṣaran

translation.text: With stream of sacrifice the brown bright drops have flowed with strength in store Of kine into the wooden vats.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒ता इन्द्रा॑य वा॒यवे॒ वरु॑णाय म॒रुद्भ्यः॑ सोमा॑ अर्षन्ति॒ विष्ण॑वे
verses.transliteration: sutā́ índrāya vāyáve  váruṇāya marúdbhyaḥ-  sómā arṣanti víṣṇave

translation.text: To Indra, Vâyu, Varuṇa, to Vishṇu, and the Maruts, flow The drops of Soma juice effused.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ति॒स्रो वाच॒ उदी॑रते॒ गावो॑ मिमन्ति धे॒नवः॑ हरि॑रेति॒ कनि॑क्रदत्
verses.transliteration: tisró vā́ca úd īrate  gā́vo mimanti dhenávaḥ  hárir eti kánikradat

translation.text: Three several words are uttered: kine are lowing, cows who give their milk: The Tawny-hued goes bellowing on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि ब्रह्मी॑रनूषत य॒ह्वीर्ऋ॒तस्य॑ मा॒तरः॑ म॒र्मृ॒ज्यन्ते॑ दि॒वः शिशु॑म्
verses.transliteration: abhí bráhmīr anūṣata  yahvī́r r̥tásya mātáraḥ  marmr̥jyánte diváḥ śíśum

translation.text: The young and sacred mothers of the holy rite have uttered praise: They decorate the Child of Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: रा॒यः स॑मु॒द्राँश्च॒तुरो॒ऽस्मभ्यं॑ सोम वि॒श्वतः॑ आ प॑वस्व सह॒स्रिणः॑
verses.transliteration: rāyáḥ samudrā́ṃś catúro  -asmábhyaṃ soma viśvátaḥ  ā́ pavasva sahasríṇaḥ

translation.text: From every side, O Soma, for our profit, pour thou forth four seas Filled full of riches thousandfold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सु॑वा॒नो धार॑या॒ तनेन्दु॑र्हिन्वा॒नो अ॑र्षति रु॒जद्दृ॒ळ्हा व्योज॑सा
verses.transliteration: prá suvānó dhā́rayā tánā-  -índur hinvānó arṣati  rujád dr̥ḷhā́ vy ójasā

translation.text: THE drop of Soma juice effused flows onward with this stream impelled. Rending strong places with its might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒त इन्द्रा॑य वा॒यवे॒ वरु॑णाय म॒रुद्भ्यः॑ सोमो॑ अर्षति॒ विष्ण॑वे
verses.transliteration: sutá índrāya vāyáve  váruṇāya marúdbhyaḥ-  sómo arṣati víṣṇave

translation.text: Poured forth to Indra, Varuṇa, to Vâyu and the Marut hosts, To Vishṇu, flows the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॑णं॒ वृष॑भिर्य॒तं सु॒न्वन्ति॒ सोम॒मद्रि॑भिः दु॒हन्ति॒ शक्म॑ना॒ पयः॑
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣāṇaṃ vŕ̥ṣabhir yatáṃ  sunvánti sómam ádribhiḥ  duhánti śákmanā páyaḥ

translation.text: With stones they press the Soma forth, the Strong conducted by the strong: They milk the liquor out with skill.

verses.sanskrit_deva: भुव॑त्त्रि॒तस्य॒ मर्ज्यो॒ भुव॒दिन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रः सं रू॒पैर॑ज्यते॒ हरिः॑
