verses.transliteration: bhúvat tritásya márjyo  bhúvad índrāya matsaráḥ  sáṃ rūpaír ajyate háriḥ

translation.text: 'Tis he whom Trita must refine, 'tis he who shall make Indra glad: The Tawny One is decked with tints.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भीमृ॒तस्य॑ वि॒ष्टपं॑ दुह॒ते पृश्नि॑मातरः चारु॑ प्रि॒यत॑मं ह॒विः
verses.transliteration: abhī́m r̥tásya viṣṭápaṃ  duhaté pŕ̥śnimātaraḥ  cā́ru priyátamaṃ havíḥ

translation.text: Him do the Sons of Pr̥iṣni milk, the dwelling-place of sacrifice, Oblation lovely and most dear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समे॑न॒मह्रु॑ता इ॒मा गिरो॑ अर्षन्ति स॒स्रुतः॑ धे॒नूर्वा॒श्रो अ॑वीवशत्
verses.transliteration: sám enam áhrutā imā́ḥ-  gíro arṣanti sasrútaḥ  dhenū́r vāśró avīvaśat

translation.text: To him in one unitcd stream th-,se songs flow on straight forward. he, Loud voiced, hath made the milch-kine low.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नः॑ पवस्व॒ धार॑या॒ पव॑मान र॒यिं पृ॒थुम् यया॒ ज्योति॑र्वि॒दासि॑ नः
verses.transliteration: ā́ naḥ pavasva dhā́rayā  pávamāna rayím pr̥thúm  yáyā jyótir vidā́si naḥ

translation.text: Pour forth on us abundant wealth, O Pavamâna, with thy stream. Wherewith thou mayest find us light

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्दो॑ समुद्रमीङ्खय॒ पव॑स्व विश्वमेजय रा॒यो ध॒र्ता न॒ ओज॑सा
verses.transliteration: índo samudramīṅkhaya  pávasva viśvamejaya  rāyó dhartā́ na ójasā

translation.text: O Indu, swayer of the sea, shaker of all things, flow thou on, Bearer of wealth to us with might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वया॑ वी॒रेण॑ वीरवो॒ऽभि ष्या॑म पृतन्य॒तः क्षरा॑ णो अ॒भि वार्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: tváyā vīréṇa vīravo  abhí ṣyāma pr̥tanyatáḥ  kṣárā ṇo abhí vā́ryam

translation.text: With thee for Hero, Valiant One! may we subdue our enemies: Let what is precious flow to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वाज॒मिन्दु॑रिष्यति॒ सिषा॑सन्वाज॒सा ऋषिः॑ व्र॒ता वि॑दा॒न आयु॑धा
verses.transliteration: prá vā́jam índur iṣyati  síṣāsan vājasā́ ŕ̥ṣiḥ  vratā́ vidāná ā́yudhā

translation.text: Indu arouses strength the Sage who strives for victory, winning power, Discovering holy works and means.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं गी॒र्भिर्वा॑चमीङ्ख॒यं पु॑ना॒नं वा॑सयामसि सोमं॒ जन॑स्य॒ गोप॑तिम्
verses.transliteration: táṃ gīrbhír vācamīṅkhayám  punānáṃ vāsayāmasi  sómaṃ jánasya gópatim

translation.text: Mover of speech, we robe him with our songs as he is purified Soma, the Guardian of the folk;

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वो॒ यस्य॑ व्र॒ते जनो॑ दा॒धार॒ धर्म॑ण॒स्पतेः॑ पु॒ना॒नस्य॑ प्र॒भूव॑सोः
verses.transliteration: víśvo yásya vraté jáno  dādhā́ra dhármaṇas páteḥ  punānásya prabhū́vasoḥ

translation.text: On whose way, Lord of Holy Law, most richi as he is purified. The people all have set their hearts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस॑र्जि॒ रथ्यो॑ यथा प॒वित्रे॑ च॒म्वोः॑ सु॒तः कार्ष्म॑न्वा॒जी न्य॑क्रमीत्
verses.transliteration: ásarji ráthyo yathā  pavítre camvòḥ sutáḥ  kā́rṣman vājī́ ny àkramīt

translation.text: FORTH from the mortar is the juice sent, like a car-horse, to the sieve: The Steed steps forward to the goal.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वह्निः॑ सोम॒ जागृ॑विः॒ पव॑स्व देव॒वीरति॑ अ॒भि कोशं॑ मधु॒श्चुत॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá váhniḥ soma jā́gr̥viḥ  pávasva devavī́r áti  abhí kóśam madhuścútam

translation.text: Thus, Soma, watchful, bearing well, cheering the Gods, flow past the sieve, Turned to the vat that drops with meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ ज्योतीं॑षि पूर्व्य॒ पव॑मान॒ वि रो॑चय क्रत्वे॒ दक्षा॑य नो हिनु
verses.transliteration: sá no jyótīṃṣi pūrvya  pávamāna ví rocaya  krátve dákṣāya no hinu

translation.text: Excellent Pavamâna, make the lights shine brightly out for us. Speed us to mental power and skill.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शु॒म्भमा॑न ऋता॒युभि॑र्मृ॒ज्यमा॑नो॒ गभ॑स्त्योः पव॑ते॒ वारे॑ अ॒व्यये॑
verses.transliteration: śumbhámāna r̥tāyúbhir  mr̥jyámāno gábhastyoḥ  pávate vā́re avyáye

translation.text: He, beautified by pious men, and coming from their hands adorned, Flows through the fleecy straining-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स विश्वा॑ दा॒शुषे॒ वसु॒ सोमो॑ दि॒व्यानि॒ पार्थि॑वा पव॑ता॒मान्तरि॑क्ष्या
verses.transliteration: sá víśvā dāśúṣe vásu  sómo divyā́ni pā́rthivā  pávatām ā́ntárikṣyā

translation.text: May Soma pour all treasures of the heavens, the earth, the firmament Upon the liberal worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ दि॒वस्पृ॒ष्ठम॑श्व॒युर्ग॑व्य॒युः सो॑म रोहसि वी॒र॒युः श॑वसस्पते
verses.transliteration: ā́ divás pr̥ṣṭhám aśvayúr  gavyayúḥ soma rohasi  vīrayúḥ śavasas pate

translation.text: Thou mountest to the height of heaven, O Soma, seeking steeds and kine, And seeking heroes, Lord of Strength!

verses.sanskrit_deva: स सु॒तः पी॒तये॒ वृषा॒ सोमः॑ प॒वित्रे॑ अर्षति वि॒घ्नन्रक्षां॑सि देव॒युः
verses.transliteration: sá sutáḥ pītáye vŕ̥ṣā  sómaḥ pavítre arṣati  vighnán rákṣāṃsi devayúḥ

translation.text: SOMA, the Steer, effused for draught, flows to the purifying sieve, Slaying the fiends, loving the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प॒वित्रे॑ विचक्ष॒णो हरि॑रर्षति धर्ण॒सिः अ॒भि योनिं॒ कनि॑क्रदत्
verses.transliteration: sá pavítre vicakṣaṇó  hárir arṣati dharṇasíḥ  -abhí yóniṃ kánikradat

translation.text: Far-sighted, tawny-coloured, he flows to the sieve, intelligent, Bellowing, to his place of rest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वा॒जी रो॑च॒ना दि॒वः पव॑मानो॒ वि धा॑वति र॒क्षो॒हा वार॑म॒व्यय॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá vājī́ rocanā́ diváḥ  pávamāno ví dhāvati  rakṣohā́ vā́ram avyáyam

translation.text: This vigorous Pavamâna runs forth to the luminous realm of heaven, Fiend-slayer, through the fleecy sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्रि॒तस्याधि॒ सान॑वि॒ पव॑मानो अरोचयत् जा॒मिभिः॒ सूर्यं॑ स॒ह
verses.transliteration: sá tritásyā́dhi sā́navi  pávamāno arocayat  jāmíbhiḥ sū́ryaṃ sahá

translation.text: This Payamana up above Trita's high ridge hath made the Sun, Together with the Sisters, shine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वृ॑त्र॒हा वृषा॑ सु॒तो व॑रिवो॒विददा॑भ्यः सोमो॒ वाज॑मिवासरत्
verses.transliteration: sá vr̥trahā́ vŕ̥ṣā sutó  varivovíd ádābhyaḥ  sómo vā́jam ivāsarat

translation.text: This Vr̥itra-slaying Steer, effused, Soma room-giver, ne'er deceived, Hath gone, as 'twere, to win the spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स दे॒वः क॒विने॑षि॒तो॒३॒॑ऽभि द्रोणा॑नि धावति इन्दु॒रिन्द्रा॑य मं॒हना॑
verses.transliteration: sá deváḥ kavíneṣitáḥ-  abhí dróṇāni dhāvati  índur índrāya maṃhánā

translation.text: Urged onward by the sage, the God speeds forward to the casks of wood, Indu to Indra willingly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष उ॒ स्य वृषा॒ रथोऽव्यो॒ वारे॑भिरर्षति गच्छ॒न्वाजं॑ सह॒स्रिण॑म्
verses.transliteration: eṣá u syá vŕ̥ṣā ráthaḥ-  -ávyo vā́rebhir arṣati  gáchan vā́jaṃ sahasríṇam

translation.text: THIS Steer, this Chariot, rushes through the woollen filter, as he goes To war that wins a thousand spoils.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तं त्रि॒तस्य॒ योष॑णो॒ हरिं॑ हिन्व॒न्त्यद्रि॑भिः इन्दु॒मिन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: etáṃ tritásya yóṣaṇo  háriṃ hinvanty ádribhiḥ  índum índrāya pītáye

translation.text: The Dames of Trita with the stones onward impel this Tawny One Indu to Indra for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तं त्यं ह॒रितो॒ दश॑ मर्मृ॒ज्यन्ते॑ अप॒स्युवः॑ याभि॒र्मदा॑य॒ शुम्भ॑ते
verses.transliteration: etáṃ tyáṃ haríto dáśa  marmr̥jyánte apasyúvaḥ  yā́bhir mádāya śúmbhate

translation.text: Ten active fingers carefully adorn him here; they make him bright And beauteous for the gladdening draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष स्य मानु॑षी॒ष्वा श्ये॒नो न वि॒क्षु सी॑दति गच्छ॑ञ्जा॒रो न यो॒षित॑म्
verses.transliteration: eṣá syá mā́nuṣīṣv~ā́  śyenó ná vikṣú sīdati  gáchañ jāró ná yoṣítam

translation.text: He like a falcon settles down amid the families of men. Speeding like lover to his love.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष स्य मद्यो॒ रसोऽव॑ चष्टे दि॒वः शिशुः॑ य इन्दु॒र्वार॒मावि॑शत्
verses.transliteration: eṣá syá mádyo rásaḥ-  -áva caṣṭe diváḥ śíśuḥ  yá índur vā́ram ā́viśat

translation.text: This young exhilarating juice looks downward from its place in heaven, This Soma-drop that pierced the sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष स्य पी॒तये॑ सु॒तो हरि॑रर्षति धर्ण॒सिः क्रन्द॒न्योनि॑म॒भि प्रि॒यम्
verses.transliteration: eṣá syá pītáye sutó  hárir arṣati dharṇasíḥ  krándan yónim abhí priyám

translation.text: Poured for the draught, this tawny juice flows forth, intelligent, crying out, Unto the well-beloved place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒शुर॑र्ष बृहन्मते॒ परि॑ प्रि॒येण॒ धाम्ना॑ यत्र॑ दे॒वा इति॒ ब्रव॑न्
verses.transliteration: āśúr arṣa br̥hanmate  pári priyéṇa dhā́mnā  yátra devā́ íti brávan

translation.text: FLOW On, O thou of lofty thought, flow swift in thy beloved form, Saying, I go where dwell the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प॒रि॒ष्कृ॒ण्वन्ननि॑ष्कृतं॒ जना॑य या॒तय॒न्निषः॑ वृ॒ष्टिं दि॒वः परि॑ स्रव
verses.transliteration: pariṣkr̥ṇvánn ániṣkr̥taṃ  jánāya yātáyann íṣaḥ  vr̥ṣṭíṃ diváḥ pári srava

translation.text: Preparing what is unprepared, and bringing store of food to man, Make thou the rain descend from heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒त ए॑ति प॒वित्र॒ आ त्विषिं॒ दधा॑न॒ ओज॑सा वि॒चक्षा॑णो विरो॒चय॑न्
verses.transliteration: sutá eti pavítra ā́  tvíṣiṃ dádhāna ójasā  vicákṣāṇo virocáyan

translation.text: With might, bestowing power, thejuice enters the purifying sieve, Far-seeing, sending forth its light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं स यो दि॒वस्परि॑ रघु॒यामा॑ प॒वित्र॒ आ सिन्धो॑रू॒र्मा व्यक्ष॑रत्
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ sá yó divás pári  raghuyā́mā pavítra ā́  síndhor ūrmā́ vy ákṣarat

translation.text: This is it which in rapid course hath with the river's wave flowed down From heaven upon the straining cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒विवा॑सन्परा॒वतो॒ अथो॑ अर्वा॒वतः॑ सु॒तः इन्द्रा॑य सिच्यते॒ मधु॑
verses.transliteration: āvívāsan parāváto  átho arvāvátaḥ sutáḥ  índrāya sicyate mádhu

translation.text: Inviting him frorh far away, and even from near at hand, the juice For Indra is poured forth as meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मी॒ची॒ना अ॑नूषत॒ हरिं॑ हिन्व॒न्त्यद्रि॑भिः योना॑वृ॒तस्य॑ सीदत
verses.transliteration: samīcīnā́ anūṣata  háriṃ hinvanty ádribhiḥ  yónāv r̥tásya sīdata

translation.text: In union they have sung the hymn: with stones they urge the Tawny One. Sit in the place of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नो अ॑क्रमीद॒भि विश्वा॒ मृधो॒ विच॑र्षणिः शु॒म्भन्ति॒ विप्रं॑ धी॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: punānó akramīd abhí  víśvā mŕ̥dho vícarṣaṇiḥ  śumbhánti vípraṃ dhītíbhiḥ

translation.text: THE Very Active hath assailed, while purified, all enemies: They deck the Sage with holy songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ योनि॑मरु॒णो रु॑ह॒द्गम॒दिन्द्रं॒ वृषा॑ सु॒तः ध्रु॒वे सद॑सि सीदति
verses.transliteration: ā́ yónim aruṇó ruhad  gámad índraṃ vŕ̥ṣā sutáḥ  dhruvé sádasi sīdati

translation.text: The Red hath mounted to his place; to India, goes the mighty juice: He settles in his firm abode.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू नो॑ र॒यिं म॒हामि॑न्दो॒ऽस्मभ्यं॑ सोम वि॒श्वतः॑ आ प॑वस्व सह॒स्रिण॑म्
verses.transliteration: nū́ no rayím mahā́m indo  -asmábhyaṃ soma viśvátaḥ  ā́ pavasva sahasríṇam

translation.text: O Indu, Soma, send us now great opulence from every side, Pour on us treasures thousandfold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॑ सोम पवमान द्यु॒म्नानी॑न्द॒वा भ॑र वि॒दाः स॑ह॒स्रिणी॒रिषः॑
verses.transliteration: víśvā soma pavamāna  dyumnā́nīndav ā́ bhara  vidā́ḥ sahasríṇīr íṣaḥ

translation.text: O Soma Pavamâna, bring, Indu, all splcndours hitherward: Find for us food in boundless store.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पुना॒न आ भ॑र र॒यिं स्तो॒त्रे सु॒वीर्य॑म् ज॒रि॒तुर्व॑र्धया॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ punāná ā́ bhara  rayíṃ stotré suvī́ryam  jaritúr vardhayā gíraḥ

translation.text: As thou art cleansed, bring hero strength and riches to thy worshipper, And prosper thou the singer's hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒न इ॑न्द॒वा भ॑र॒ सोम॑ द्वि॒बर्ह॑सं र॒यिम् वृष॑न्निन्दो न उ॒क्थ्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: punāná indav ā́ bhara  sóma dvibárhasaṃ rayím  vŕ̥ṣann indo na ukthyàm

translation.text: O Indu, Soma, being cleansed, bring hither riches doublypiled, Wealth, mighty Indu, meet for lauds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र ये गावो॒ न भूर्ण॑यस्त्वे॒षा अ॒यासो॒ अक्र॑मुः घ्नन्तः॑ कृ॒ष्णामप॒ त्वच॑म्
verses.transliteration: prá yé gā́vo ná bhū́rṇayas  tveṣā́ ayā́so ákramuḥ  ghnántaḥ kr̥ṣṇā́m ápa tvácam

translation.text: ACTIVE and bright have they come forth, impetuous in speed like bulls, Driving the black skin far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒वि॒तस्य॑ मनाम॒हेऽति॒ सेतुं॑ दुरा॒व्य॑म् सा॒ह्वांसो॒ दस्यु॑मव्र॒तम्
verses.transliteration: suvitásya manāmahe-  -áti sétuṃ durāvyàm  sāhvā́ṃso dásyum avratám

translation.text: Quelling the riteless Dasyu, may we think upon the bridge of bliss, Leaving the bridge of woe behind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शृ॒ण्वे वृ॒ष्टेरि॑व स्व॒नः पव॑मानस्य शु॒ष्मिणः॑ चर॑न्ति वि॒द्युतो॑ दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: śr̥ṇvé vr̥ṣṭér iva svanáḥ  pávamānasya śuṣmíṇaḥ  cáranti vidyúto diví

translation.text: The mighty Pavamâna's roar is heard as 'twere the rush of rain Lightnings are flashing to the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व म॒हीमिषं॒ गोम॑दिन्दो॒ हिर॑ण्यवत् अश्वा॑व॒द्वाज॑वत्सु॒तः
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva mahī́m íṣaṃ  gómad indo híraṇyavat  áśvāvad vā́javat sutáḥ

translation.text: Pour out on us abundant food, when thou art pressed, O Indu wealth In kine and gold and steeds and spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प॑वस्व विचर्षण॒ आ म॒ही रोद॑सी पृण उ॒षाः सूर्यो॒ न र॒श्मिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: sá pavasva vicarṣaṇe  ā́ mahī́ ródasī pr̥ṇa  uṣā́ḥ sū́ryo ná raśmíbhiḥ

translation.text: Flow on thy way, Most Active, thou. fill full the mighty heavens and earth, As Dawn, as Sûrya with his beams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ णः शर्म॒यन्त्या॒ धार॑या सोम वि॒श्वतः॑ सरा॑ र॒सेव॑ वि॒ष्टप॑म्
verses.transliteration: pári ṇaḥ śarmayántyā  dhā́rayā soma viśvátaḥ  sárā raséva viṣṭápam

translation.text: On every side, O Soma, flow round us with thy protecting stream, As Rasâ flows around the world.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ज॒नय॑न्रोच॒ना दि॒वो ज॒नय॑न्न॒प्सु सूर्य॑म् वसा॑नो॒ गा अ॒पो हरिः॑
verses.transliteration: janáyan rocanā́ divó  janáyann apsú sū́ryam  vásāno gā́ apó háriḥ

translation.text: ENGENDERING the Sun in floods, engendering heaven's lights, green-hued, Robed in the waters and the milk,

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष प्र॒त्नेन॒ मन्म॑ना दे॒वो दे॒वेभ्य॒स्परि॑ धार॑या पवते सु॒तः
verses.transliteration: eṣá pratnéna mánmanā  devó devébhyas pári  dhā́rayā pavate sutáḥ

translation.text: According to primeval plan this Soma, with his stream, effused Flows purely on, a God for Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वा॒वृ॒धा॒नाय॒ तूर्व॑ये॒ पव॑न्ते॒ वाज॑सातये सोमाः॑ स॒हस्र॑पाजसः
verses.transliteration: vāvr̥dhānā́ya tū́rvaye  pávante vā́jasātaye  sómāḥ sahásrapājasaḥ

translation.text: For him victorious, waxen great, the juices with a thousand powers Are purified for winning spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दु॒हा॒नः प्र॒त्नमित्पयः॑ प॒वित्रे॒ परि॑ षिच्यते क्रन्द॑न्दे॒वाँ अ॑जीजनत्
verses.transliteration: duhānáḥ pratnám ít páyaḥ  pavítre pári ṣicyate  krándan devā́m̐ ajījanat

translation.text: Shedding the ancient fluid he is poured into the cleansing sieve: He, thundering, hath produced the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि विश्वा॑नि॒ वार्या॒भि दे॒वाँ ऋ॑ता॒वृधः॑ सोमः॑ पुना॒नो अ॑र्षति
verses.transliteration: abhí víśvāni vā́ryā-  -abhí devā́m̐ r̥tāvŕ̥dhaḥ  sómaḥ punānó arṣati

translation.text: Soma, while purifying, sends hither all things to be desired, He sends the Gods who strengthen Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गोम॑न्नः सोम वी॒रव॒दश्वा॑व॒द्वाज॑वत्सु॒तः पव॑स्व बृह॒तीरिषः॑
verses.transliteration: góman naḥ soma vīrávad  áśvāvad vā́javat sutáḥ  pávasva br̥hatī́r íṣaḥ

translation.text: Soma, effused, pour on us wealth in kine, in heroes, steeds, and spoil, Send us abundant store of food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो अत्य॑ इव मृ॒ज्यते॒ गोभि॒र्मदा॑य हर्य॒तः तं गी॒र्भिर्वा॑सयामसि
verses.transliteration: yó átya iva mr̥jyáte  góbhir mádāya haryatáḥ  táṃ gīrbhír vāsayāmasi

translation.text: WE will enrobe with sacred song the Lovely One who, as a Steed, Is decked with milk for rapturous joy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं नो॒ विश्वा॑ अव॒स्युवो॒ गिरः॑ शुम्भन्ति पू॒र्वथा॑ इन्दु॒मिन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ no víśvā avasyúvo  gíraḥ śumbhanti pūrváthā  índum índrāya pītáye

translation.text: All songs of ours desiring grace adorn him in the ancient way, Indu for Indra, for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नो या॑ति हर्य॒तः सोमो॑ गी॒र्भिः परि॑ष्कृतः विप्र॑स्य॒ मेध्या॑तिथेः
verses.transliteration: punānó yāti haryatáḥ  sómo gīrbhíḥ páriṣkr̥taḥ  víprasya médhyātitheḥ

translation.text: Soma flows on when purified, beloved and adorned with songs, Songs of the sage Medhyâtithi.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान वि॒दा र॒यिम॒स्मभ्यं॑ सोम सु॒श्रिय॑म् इन्दो॑ स॒हस्र॑वर्चसम्
verses.transliteration: pávamāna vidā́ rayím  asmábhyaṃ soma suśríyam  índo sahásravarcasam

translation.text: O Soma Pavamâna, find exceeding glorious wealth for us, Wealth, Indu, fraught with boundless might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्दु॒रत्यो॒ न वा॑ज॒सृत्कनि॑क्रन्ति प॒वित्र॒ आ यदक्षा॒रति॑ देव॒युः
verses.transliteration: índur átyo ná vājasŕ̥t  kánikranti pavítra ā́  yád ákṣār áti devayúḥ

translation.text: Like courser racing to the prize Indu, the lover of the Gods, Roars, as he passes, in the sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व॒ वाज॑सातये॒ विप्र॑स्य गृण॒तो वृ॒धे सोम॒ रास्व॑ सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: pávasva vā́jasātaye  víprasya gr̥ṇató vr̥dhé  sóma rā́sva suvī́ryam

translation.text: Flow on thy way to win us strength, to speed the sage who praises thee: Soma, bestow heroic power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र ण॑ इन्दो म॒हे तन॑ ऊ॒र्मिं न बिभ्र॑दर्षसि अ॒भि दे॒वाँ अ॒यास्यः॑
verses.transliteration: prá ṇa indo mahé táne-  ūrmíṃ ná bíbhrad arṣasi  abhí devā́m̐ ayā́syaḥ

translation.text: INDU, to us for this great rite, bearing as 'twere thy wave to Gods, Unwearied, thou art flowing forQh.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒ती जु॒ष्टो धि॒या हि॒तः सोमो॑ हिन्वे परा॒वति॑ विप्र॑स्य॒ धार॑या क॒विः
verses.transliteration: matī́ juṣṭó dhiyā́ hitáḥ  sómo hinve parāváti  víprasya dhā́rayā kavíḥ

translation.text: Pleased with the hymn, impelled by prayer, Soma is hurried far away, The Wise One in the Singer's stream.,

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं दे॒वेषु॒ जागृ॑विः सु॒त ए॑ति प॒वित्र॒ आ सोमो॑ याति॒ विच॑र्षणिः
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ devéṣu jā́gr̥viḥ  sutá eti pavítra ā́  sómo yāti vícarṣaṇiḥ

translation.text: Watchful among the. gods, this juice advances to the cleansing sieve Soma, most active, travels on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पवस्व वाज॒युश्च॑क्रा॒णश्चारु॑मध्व॒रम् ब॒र्हिष्माँ॒ आ वि॑वासति
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ pavasva vājayúś  cakrāṇáś cā́rum adhvarám  barhíṣmām̐ ā́ vivāsati

translation.text: Flow onward, seeking strength for us, embellishing the sacrifice: The priest with trimmed grass calleth thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ भगा॑य वा॒यवे॒ विप्र॑वीरः स॒दावृ॑धः सोमो॑ दे॒वेष्वा य॑मत्
verses.transliteration: sá no bhágāya vāyáve  vípravīraḥ sadā́vr̥dhaḥ  sómo devéṣv ā́ yamat

translation.text: May Soma, ever bringing power to Bhaga and to Vâyu, Sage And Hero, lead us to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ अ॒द्य वसु॑त्तये क्रतु॒विद्गा॑तु॒वित्त॑मः वाजं॑ जेषि॒ श्रवो॑ बृ॒हत्
verses.transliteration: sá no adyá vásuttaye  kratuvíd gātuvíttamaḥ  vā́jaṃ jeṣi śrávo br̥hát

translation.text: So, to increase our wealth to-day, Inspirer, best of Furtherers, Win for us strength and high renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प॑वस्व॒ मदा॑य॒ कं नृ॒चक्षा॑ दे॒ववी॑तये इन्द॒विन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: sá pavasva mádāya káṃ  nr̥cákṣā devávītaye  índav índrāya pītáye

translation.text: FLOW, thou who viewest men, to give delight, to entertain the Gods, Indu, to Indra for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ अर्षा॒भि दू॒त्यं१॒॑ त्वमिन्द्रा॑य तोशसे दे॒वान्त्सखि॑भ्य॒ आ वर॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá no arṣābhí dūtyàṃ  tvám índrāya tośase  devā́n sákhibhya ā́ váram

translation.text: Stream to thine embassy for us: thou hastenest, for Indra, to The Gods, O better than our friends.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वाम॑रु॒णं व॒यं गोभि॑रञ्ज्मो॒ मदा॑य॒ कम् वि नो॑ रा॒ये दुरो॑ वृधि
verses.transliteration: utá tvā́m aruṇáṃ vayáṃ  góbhir añjmo mádāya kám  ví no rāyé dúro vr̥dhi

translation.text: We balm thee, red of hue, with milk to fit thee for the rapturous joy: Unbar for us the doors of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत्यू॑ प॒वित्र॑मक्रमीद्वा॒जी धुरं॒ न याम॑नि इन्दु॑र्दे॒वेषु॑ पत्यते
verses.transliteration: áty ū pavítram akramīd  vājī́ dhúraṃ ná yā́mani  índur devéṣu patyate

translation.text: He through the sieve hath passed, as comes a courser to the pole, to run Indu belongs unto the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समी॒ सखा॑यो अस्वर॒न्वने॒ क्रीळ॑न्त॒मत्य॑विम् इन्दुं॑ ना॒वा अ॑नूषत
verses.transliteration: sám ī sákhāyo asvaran  váne krī́ḷantam átyavim  índuṃ nāvā́ anūṣata

translation.text: All friends have lauded him as he sports in the wood, beyond the fleece: Singers have chanted Indu's praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तया॑ पवस्व॒ धार॑या॒ यया॑ पी॒तो वि॒चक्ष॑से इन्दो॑ स्तो॒त्रे सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: táyā pavasva dhā́rayā  yáyā pītó vicákṣase  índo stotré suvī́ryam

translation.text: Flow, Indu, with that stream wherein steeped thou announcest to the man Who worships thee heroic strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: असृ॑ग्रन्दे॒ववी॑त॒येऽत्या॑सः॒ कृत्व्या॑ इव क्षर॑न्तः पर्वता॒वृधः॑
verses.transliteration: ásr̥gran devávītaye-  -átyāsaḥ kŕ̥tvyā iva  kṣárantaḥ parvatāvŕ̥dhaḥ

translation.text: LIKE able coursers they have been sent forth to be the feast of Gods, joying in mountains, flowing on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ष्कृतास॒ इन्द॑वो॒ योषे॑व॒ पित्र्या॑वती वा॒युं सोमा॑ असृक्षत
verses.transliteration: páriṣkr̥tāsa índavo  yóṣeva pítryāvatī  vāyúṃ sómā asr̥kṣata

translation.text: To Vâyu flow the Soma-streams, the drops of juice made beautiful Like a bride dowered by her sire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते सोमा॑स॒ इन्द॑वः॒ प्रय॑स्वन्तश्च॒मू सु॒ताः इन्द्रं॑ वर्धन्ति॒ कर्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: eté sómāsa índavaḥ  práyasvantaḥ camū́ sutā́ḥ  índraṃ vardhanti kármabhiḥ

translation.text: Pressed in the mortar, these, the drops of juice, the Somas rich in food, Give strength to Indra with their work.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ धा॑वता सुहस्त्यः शु॒क्रा गृ॑भ्णीत म॒न्थिना॑ गोभिः॑ श्रीणीत मत्स॒रम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ dhāvatā suhastyaḥ  śukrā́ gr̥bhṇīta manthínā  góbhiḥ śrīṇīta matsarám

translation.text: Deft-handed men, run hither, seize the brilliant juices blent with meal, And cook with milk the gladdening draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प॑वस्व धनंजय प्रय॒न्ता राध॑सो म॒हः अ॒स्मभ्यं॑ सोम गातु॒वित्
verses.transliteration: sá pavasva dhanaṃjaya  prayantā́ rā́dhaso maháḥ  asmábhyaṃ soma gātuvít

translation.text: Thus, Soma, Conqueror of wealth! flow, finding furtherance for us, Giver oF ample opulence.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तं मृ॑जन्ति॒ मर्ज्यं॒ पव॑मानं॒ दश॒ क्षिपः॑ इन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रं मद॑म्
verses.transliteration: etám mr̥janti márjyam  pávamānaṃ dáśa kṣípaḥ  índrāya matsarám mádam

translation.text: This Pavamâna, meet to be adorned, the fingers ten adorn, The draught that shall make Indra glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒या सोमः॑ सुकृ॒त्यया॑ म॒हश्चि॑द॒भ्य॑वर्धत म॒न्दा॒न उद्वृ॑षायते
verses.transliteration: ayā́ sómaḥ sukr̥tyáyā  maháś cid abhy àvardhata  mandāná úd vr̥ṣāyate

translation.text: GREAT as he was, Soma hath gained strength by this high solemnity: joyous he riseth like a bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कृ॒तानीद॑स्य॒ कर्त्वा॒ चेत॑न्ते दस्यु॒तर्ह॑णा ऋ॒णा च॑ धृ॒ष्णुश्च॑यते
verses.transliteration: kr̥tā́nī́d asya kártvā  cétante dasyutárhaṇā  r̥ṇā́ ca dhr̥ṣṇúś cayate

translation.text: His task is done: his crushings of the Dasyus are made manifest: He sternly reckoneth their debts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आत्सोम॑ इन्द्रि॒यो रसो॒ वज्रः॑ सहस्र॒सा भु॑वत् उ॒क्थं यद॑स्य॒ जाय॑ते
verses.transliteration: ā́t sóma indriyó ráso  vájraḥ sahasrasā́ bhuvat  uktháṃ yád asya jā́yate

translation.text: Soon as his song of praise is born, the Soma, Indra's juice, becomes A thousand-winning thunderbolt.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्व॒यं क॒विर्वि॑ध॒र्तरि॒ विप्रा॑य॒ रत्न॑मिच्छति यदी॑ मर्मृ॒ज्यते॒ धियः॑
verses.transliteration: svayáṃ kavír vidhartári  víprāya rátnam ichati  yádī marmr̥jyáte dhíyaḥ

translation.text: Seer and Sustainer, he himself desireth riches for the sage When he embellisheth his songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सि॒षा॒सतू॑ रयी॒णां वाजे॒ष्वर्व॑तामिव भरे॑षु जि॒ग्युषा॑मसि
verses.transliteration: siṣāsátū rayīṇā́ṃ  vā́jeṣv árvatām iva  bháreṣu jigyúṣām asi

translation.text: Fain would they both win riches as in races of the steeds. In war Thou art upon the conquerors' side.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ नृ॒म्णानि॒ बिभ्र॑तं स॒धस्थे॑षु म॒हो दि॒वः चारुं॑ सुकृ॒त्यये॑महे
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā nr̥mṇā́ni bíbhrataṃ  sadhástheṣu mahó diváḥ  cā́ruṃ sukr̥tyáyemahe

translation.text: WITH sacrifice we seek to thee kind Cherisher of manly might In mansions of the lofty heavens;

verses.sanskrit_deva: संवृ॑क्तधृष्णुमु॒क्थ्यं॑ म॒हाम॑हिव्रतं॒ मद॑म् श॒तं पुरो॑ रुरु॒क्षणि॑म्
verses.transliteration: sáṃvr̥ktadhr̥ṣṇum ukthyàm  mahā́mahivratam mádam  śatám púro rurukṣáṇim

translation.text: Gladdening crusher of the bold, ruling with very mighty sway, Destroyer of a hundred forts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत॑स्त्वा र॒यिम॒भि राजा॑नं सुक्रतो दि॒वः सु॒प॒र्णो अ॑व्य॒थिर्भ॑रत्
verses.transliteration: átas tvā rayím abhí  rā́jānaṃ sukrato diváḥ  suparṇó avyathír bharat

translation.text: Hence, Sapient One! the Falcon, strong of wing, unwearied, brought thee down, Lord over riches, from the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्व॑स्मा॒ इत्स्व॑र्दृ॒शे साधा॑रणं रज॒स्तुर॑म् गो॒पामृ॒तस्य॒ विर्भ॑रत्
verses.transliteration: víśvasmā ít svàr dr̥śé  sā́dhāraṇaṃ rajastúram  gopā́m r̥tásya vír bharat

translation.text: That each may see the light, the Bird brought us the guard of Law, the Friend Of all, the speeder through the air.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॑ हिन्वा॒न इ॑न्द्रि॒यं ज्यायो॑ महि॒त्वमा॑नशे अ॒भि॒ष्टि॒कृद्विच॑र्षणिः
verses.transliteration: ádhā hinvāná indriyáṃ  jyā́yo mahitvám ānaśe  abhiṣṭikŕ̥d vícarṣaṇiḥ

translation.text: And now, sent forth, it hath attained to mighty power and majesty, Most active, ready to assist.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व वृ॒ष्टिमा सु नो॒ऽपामू॒र्मिं दि॒वस्परि॑ अ॒य॒क्ष्मा बृ॑ह॒तीरिषः॑
verses.transliteration: pávasva vr̥ṣṭím ā́ sú naḥ-  -apā́m ūrmíṃ divás pári  ayakṣmā́ br̥hatī́r íṣaḥ

translation.text: Poust down the rain upon us, pour a wave of waters from the sky, And plenteous store of wholesome fbod.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तया॑ पवस्व॒ धार॑या॒ यया॒ गाव॑ इ॒हागम॑न् जन्या॑स॒ उप॑ नो गृ॒हम्
verses.transliteration: táyā pavasva dhā́rayā  yáyā gā́va ihā́gáman  jányāsa úpa no gr̥hám

translation.text: Flow onward with that stream of thine, whereby the cows have come to us, The kine of strangers to our home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: घृ॒तं प॑वस्व॒ धार॑या य॒ज्ञेषु॑ देव॒वीत॑मः अ॒स्मभ्यं॑ वृ॒ष्टिमा प॑व
verses.transliteration: ghr̥tám pavasva dhā́rayā  yajñéṣu devavī́tamaḥ  asmábhyaṃ vr̥ṣṭím ā́ pava

translation.text: Chief Friend of Gods in sacred rites, pour on us fatness with thy stream, Ppur down on us a flood of rain.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स न॑ ऊ॒र्जे व्य१॒॑व्ययं॑ प॒वित्रं॑ धाव॒ धार॑या दे॒वासः॑ शृ॒णव॒न्हि क॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá na ūrjé vy àvyáyam  pavítraṃ dhāva dhā́rayā  devā́saḥ śr̥ṇávan hí kam

translation.text: To give us vigour, with thy stream run through the fleecy straining-cloth For verily the Gods will bear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानो असिष्यद॒द्रक्षां॑स्यप॒जङ्घ॑नत् प्र॒त्न॒वद्रो॒चय॒न्रुचः॑
verses.transliteration: pávamāno asiṣyadat  rákṣāṃsy apajáṅghanat  pratnavád rocáyan rúcaḥ

translation.text: Onward hath Pavamâna flowed and beaten off the Raksasas, Flashing out splendour as of old.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उत्ते॒ शुष्मा॑स ईरते॒ सिन्धो॑रू॒र्मेरि॑व स्व॒नः वा॒णस्य॑ चोदया प॒विम्
verses.transliteration: út te śúṣmāsa īrate  síndhor ūrmér iva svanáḥ  vāṇásya codayā pavím

translation.text: LOUD as a river's roaring wave thy powers have lifted up themselves: Urge on thine arrow's sharpened point.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒स॒वे त॒ उदी॑रते ति॒स्रो वाचो॑ मख॒स्युवः॑ यदव्य॒ एषि॒ सान॑वि
verses.transliteration: prasavé ta úd īrate  tisró vā́co makhasyúvaḥ  yád ávya éṣi sā́navi

translation.text: At thine effusion upward rise three voices full of joy, when thou Flowest upon the fleecy ridge.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव्यो॒ वारे॒ परि॑ प्रि॒यं हरिं॑ हिन्व॒न्त्यद्रि॑भिः पव॑मानं मधु॒श्चुत॑म्
verses.transliteration: ávyo vā́re pári priyáṃ  háriṃ hinvanty ádribhiḥ  pávamānam madhuścútam

translation.text: On to the fleece they urge with stone the tawny well-beloved One, Even Pavamâna, dropping meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व मदिन्तम प॒वित्रं॒ धार॑या कवे अ॒र्कस्य॒ योनि॑मा॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva madintama  pavítraṃ dhā́rayā kave  arkásya yónim āsádam

translation.text: Flow with thy current to the sieve, O Sage most powerful to cheer, To seat thee in the place of song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प॑वस्व मदिन्तम॒ गोभि॑रञ्जा॒नो अ॒क्तुभिः॑ इन्द॒विन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: sá pavasva madintama  góbhir añjānó aktúbhiḥ  índav índrāya pītáye

translation.text: Flow, Most Exhilarating! flow anointed with the milk for balm, Indu, for Indra, for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध्व॑र्यो॒ अद्रि॑भिः सु॒तं सोमं॑ प॒वित्र॒ आ सृ॑ज पु॒नी॒हीन्द्रा॑य॒ पात॑वे
verses.transliteration: ádhvaryo ádribhiḥ sutáṃ  sómam pavítra ā́ sr̥ja  punīhī́ndrāya pā́tave

translation.text: ADHVARYU, on the filter pour the Soma juice expressed with stones, And make it pure for Indra's drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दि॒वः पी॒यूष॑मुत्त॒मं सोम॒मिन्द्रा॑य व॒ज्रिणे॑ सु॒नोता॒ मधु॑मत्तमम्
verses.transliteration: diváḥ pīyū́ṣam uttamáṃ  sómam índrāya vajríṇe  sunótā mádhumattamaṃ

translation.text: Pour out for Indra, Thunder-armed, the milk of heaven,, the Soma's juice, Most excellent, most rich in sweets.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ त्य इ॑न्दो॒ अन्ध॑सो दे॒वा मधो॒र्व्य॑श्नते पव॑मानस्य म॒रुतः॑
verses.transliteration: táva tyá indo ándhaso  devā́ mádhor vy àśnate  pávamānasya marútaḥ

translation.text: These Gods and all the Marut host, Indu enjoy this juice of thine, This Pavamâna's flowing meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि सो॑म व॒र्धय॑न्त्सु॒तो मदा॑य॒ भूर्ण॑ये वृष॑न्त्स्तो॒तार॑मू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí soma vardháyan  sutó mádāya bhū́rṇaye  vŕ̥ṣan stotā́ram ūtáye

translation.text: For, Soma, thou hast been effused, strengthening for the wild carouse, O Steer, the singer, for our help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑र्ष विचक्षण प॒वित्रं॒ धार॑या सु॒तः अ॒भि वाज॑मु॒त श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: abhy àrṣa vicakṣaṇa  pavítraṃ dhā́rayā sutáḥ  abhí vā́jam utá śrávaḥ

translation.text: Flow with thy stream, Far-sighted One, effused, into the cleansing sieve: Flow on to give us strength and fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ द्यु॒क्षः स॒नद्र॑यि॒र्भर॒द्वाजं॑ नो॒ अन्ध॑सा सु॒वा॒नो अ॑र्ष प॒वित्र॒ आ
verses.transliteration: pári dyukṣáḥ sanádrayir  bhárad vā́jaṃ no ándhasā  suvānó arṣa pavítra ā́

translation.text: WEALTH-WINNER, dwelling in the sky, bringing us vigour with the juice, Flow to the filter when effused.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॑ प्र॒त्नेभि॒रध्व॑भि॒रव्यो॒ वारे॒ परि॑ प्रि॒यः स॒हस्र॑धारो या॒त्तना॑
verses.transliteration: táva pratnébhir ádhvabhir  ávyo vā́re pári priyó  sahásradhāro yāt tánā

translation.text: So, in thine ancient ways, may he, beloved, with a thousand streams Run o'er the fleecy straining-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: च॒रुर्न यस्तमी॑ङ्ख॒येन्दो॒ न दान॑मीङ्खय व॒धैर्व॑धस्नवीङ्खय
verses.transliteration: carúr ná yás tám īṅkhaya-  -índo ná dā́nam īṅkhaya  vadhaír vadhasnav īṅkhaya

translation.text: Him who is like a caldron shake: O Indu, shake thy gift to us Shake it, armed Warrior! with thine arms.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि शुष्म॑मिन्दवेषां॒ पुरु॑हूत॒ जना॑नाम् यो अ॒स्माँ आ॒दिदे॑शति
verses.transliteration: ní śúṣmam indav eṣām  púruhūta jánānām  yó asmā́m̐ ādídeśati

translation.text: Indu, invoked with many a prayer, bring down the vigour of these men, Of him who threatens us with war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श॒तं न॑ इन्द ऊ॒तिभिः॑ स॒हस्रं॑ वा॒ शुची॑नाम् पव॑स्व मंह॒यद्र॑यिः
verses.transliteration: śatáṃ na inda ūtíbhiḥ  sahásraṃ vā śúcīnām  pávasva maṃhayádrayiḥ

translation.text: Indu, Wealth-giver, with thine help pour out for us a hundred, yea, A thousand of thy pure bright streams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उत्ते॒ शुष्मा॑सो अस्थू॒ रक्षो॑ भि॒न्दन्तो॑ अद्रिवः नु॒दस्व॒ याः प॑रि॒स्पृधः॑
verses.transliteration: út te śúṣmāso asthuḥ-  rákṣo bhindánto adrivaḥ  nudásva yā́ḥ parispŕ̥dhaḥ

translation.text: O THOU with stones for arms, thy powers, crushing the fiends, have raised themselves: Chase thou the foes who compass us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒या नि॑ज॒घ्निरोज॑सा रथसं॒गे धने॑ हि॒ते स्तवा॒ अबि॑भ्युषा हृ॒दा
verses.transliteration: ayā́ nijaghnír ójasā  rathasaṃgé dháne hité  stávā ábibhyuṣā hr̥dā́

translation.text: Thou conquerest thus with might when car meets car, and when the prize is staked: With fearless heart will I sing praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्य॑ व्र॒तानि॒ नाधृषे॒ पव॑मानस्य दू॒ढ्या॑ रु॒ज यस्त्वा॑ पृत॒न्यति॑
verses.transliteration: ásya vratā́ni nā́dhŕ̥ṣe  pávamānasya dūḍhyā̀  rujá yás tvā pr̥tanyáti

translation.text: No one with evil thought assails this Pavamâna's holy laws: Crush him who fain would fight with thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं हि॑न्वन्ति मद॒च्युतं॒ हरिं॑ न॒दीषु॑ वा॒जिन॑म् इन्दु॒मिन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रम्
verses.transliteration: táṃ hinvanti madacyútaṃ  háriṃ nadī́ṣu vājínam  índum índrāya matsarám

translation.text: For Indra to the streams they drive the tawny rapture-dropping Steed, Indu the bringer of delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य प्र॒त्नामनु॒ द्युतं॑ शु॒क्रं दु॑दुह्रे॒ अह्र॑यः पयः॑ सहस्र॒सामृषि॑म्
verses.transliteration: asyá pratnā́m ánu dyútaṃ  śukráṃ duduhre áhrayaḥ  páyaḥ sahasrasā́m ŕ̥ṣim

translation.text: AFTER his ancient splendour, they, the bold, have drawn the bright milk from The Sage who wins a thousand gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं सूर्य॑ इवोप॒दृग॒यं सरां॑सि धावति स॒प्त प्र॒वत॒ आ दिव॑म्
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ sū́rya ivopadŕ̥g  ayáṃ sárāṃsi dhāvati  saptá praváta ā́ dívam

translation.text: In aspect he is like the Sun; he runneth forward to the lakes, Seven currents flowing through the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं विश्वा॑नि तिष्ठति पुना॒नो भुव॑नो॒परि॑ सोमो॑ दे॒वो न सूर्यः॑
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ víśvāni tiṣṭhati  punānó bhúvanopári  sómo devó ná sū́ryaḥ

translation.text: He, shining in his splendour, stands high over all things that exist- Soma, a God as Sûrya is.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ णो दे॒ववी॑तये॒ वाजाँ॑ अर्षसि॒ गोम॑तः पु॒ना॒न इ॑न्दविन्द्र॒युः
verses.transliteration: pári ṇo devávītaye  vā́jām̐ arṣasi gómataḥ  punāná indav indrayúḥ

translation.text: Thou, Indu, in thy brilliancy, pourest on us, as Indra's Friend, Wealth from the kine to feast the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यवं॑यवं नो॒ अन्ध॑सा पु॒ष्टम्पु॑ष्टं॒ परि॑ स्रव सोम॒ विश्वा॑ च॒ सौभ॑गा
verses.transliteration: yávaṃ-yavaṃ no ándhasā  puṣṭám-puṣṭam pári srava  sóma víśvā ca saúbhagā

translation.text: POUR on us with thy juice all kinds of corn, each sort of nourishment, And, Soma, all felicities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्दो॒ यथा॒ तव॒ स्तवो॒ यथा॑ ते जा॒तमन्ध॑सः नि ब॒र्हिषि॑ प्रि॒ये स॑दः
verses.transliteration: índo yáthā táva stávo  yáthā te jātám ándhasaḥ  ní barhíṣi priyé sadaḥ

translation.text: As thine, O Indu, is the praise, and thine what springeth from the juice, Seat thee on the dear sacred grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नो॑ गो॒विद॑श्व॒वित्पव॑स्व सो॒मान्ध॑सा म॒क्षूत॑मेभि॒रह॑भिः
verses.transliteration: utá no govíd aśvavít  pávasva somā́ndhasā  makṣū́tamebhir áhabhiḥ

translation.text: And, finding for us kine and steeds, O Soma, with thy juice flow on Through days that fly most rapidly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो जि॒नाति॒ न जीय॑ते॒ हन्ति॒ शत्रु॑म॒भीत्य॑ स प॑वस्व सहस्रजित्
verses.transliteration: yó jinā́ti ná jī́yate  hánti śátrum abhī́tya  sá pavasva sahasrajit

translation.text: As one who conquers, ne'er subdued, attacks and stays the enemy, Thus, Vanquisher of thousands! flow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॒ सोम॑ ऋ॒तं बृ॒हदा॒शुः प॒वित्रे॑ अर्षति वि॒घ्नन्रक्षां॑सि देव॒युः
verses.transliteration: pári sóma r̥tám br̥hád  āśúḥ pavítre arṣati  vighnán rákṣāṃsi devayúḥ

translation.text: SWIFT to the purifying sieve flows Soma as exalted Law, Slaying the fiends, loving the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्सोमो॒ वाज॒मर्ष॑ति श॒तं धारा॑ अप॒स्युवः॑ इन्द्र॑स्य स॒ख्यमा॑वि॒शन्
verses.transliteration: yát sómo vā́jam árṣati  śatáṃ dhā́rā apasyúvaḥ  índrasya sakhyám āviśán

translation.text: When Soma pours the strengthening food a hundred ever-active streams To Indra's friendship win theirway.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि त्वा॒ योष॑णो॒ दश॑ जा॒रं न क॒न्या॑नूषत मृ॒ज्यसे॑ सोम सा॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: abhí tvā yóṣaṇo dáśa  jāráṃ ná kanyā̀nūṣata  mr̥jyáse soma sātáye

translation.text: Ten Dames have sung to welcome thee, even as a maiden greets her love: O Soma, thou art decked to win.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमिन्द्रा॑य॒ विष्ण॑वे स्वा॒दुरि॑न्दो॒ परि॑ स्रव नॄन्त्स्तो॒तॄन्पा॒ह्यंह॑सः
verses.transliteration: tvám índrāya víṣṇave  svādúr indo pári srava  nr̥̄́n stotr̥̄́n pāhy áṃhasaḥ

translation.text: Flow hitherward, O Indu, sweet to Indra and to Vishṇu: guard The men, the singers, from distress.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र ते॒ धारा॑ अस॒श्चतो॑ दि॒वो न य॑न्ति वृ॒ष्टयः॑ अच्छा॒ वाजं॑ सह॒स्रिण॑म्
verses.transliteration: prá te dhā́rā asaścáto  divó ná yanti vr̥ṣṭáyaḥ  áchā vā́jaṃ sahasríṇam

translation.text: THY streams that never fail or waste flow forth like showers of rain from heaven, To bring a thousand stores of strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि प्रि॒याणि॒ काव्या॒ विश्वा॒ चक्षा॑णो अर्षति हरि॑स्तुञ्जा॒न आयु॑धा
verses.transliteration: abhí priyā́ṇi kā́vyā  víśvā cákṣāṇo arṣati  háris tuñjāná ā́yudhā

translation.text: He flows beholding on his way all wellbeloved sacred lore, Green-tinted, brandishing his, arms.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स म॑र्मृजा॒न आ॒युभि॒रिभो॒ राजे॑व सुव्र॒तः श्ये॒नो न वंसु॑ षीदति
verses.transliteration: sá marmr̥jāná āyúbhir  íbho rā́jeva suvratáḥ  śyenó ná váṃsu ṣīdati

translation.text: He, when the people deck him like a docile king of elephants. Sits as a falcon in the, wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ विश्वा॑ दि॒वो वसू॒तो पृ॑थि॒व्या अधि॑ पु॒ना॒न इ॑न्द॒वा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: sá no víśvā divó vásu-  -utó pr̥thivyā́ ádhi  punāná indav ā́ bhara

translation.text: So bring thou hitherward to us, Indu, while thou art purified, All treasures both of heaven and earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तर॒त्स म॒न्दी धा॑वति॒ धारा॑ सु॒तस्यान्ध॑सः तर॒त्स म॒न्दी धा॑वति
verses.transliteration: tárat sá mandī́ dhāvati  dhā́rā sutásyā́ndhasaḥ  tárat sá mandī́ dhāvati

translation.text: SWIFT runs this giver of delight, even the stream of flowing juice: Swift runs this giver of delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒स्रा वे॑द॒ वसू॑नां॒ मर्त॑स्य दे॒व्यव॑सः तर॒त्स म॒न्दी धा॑वति
verses.transliteration: usrā́ veda vásūnām  mártasya devy ávasaḥ  tárat sá mandī́ dhāvati

translation.text: The Morning knows all precious things, the Goddess knows her grace to man: Swift runs this giver of delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ध्व॒स्रयोः॑ पुरु॒षन्त्यो॒रा स॒हस्रा॑णि दद्महे तर॒त्स म॒न्दी धा॑वति
verses.transliteration: dhvasráyoḥ puruṣántyor  ā́ sahásrāṇi dadmahe  tárat sá mandī́ dhāvati

translation.text: We have accepted thousands from Dhvasra's and Purushanti's hands: Swift runs this giver of delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ययो॑स्त्रिं॒शतं॒ तना॑ स॒हस्रा॑णि च॒ दद्म॑हे तर॒त्स म॒न्दी धा॑वति
verses.transliteration: ā́ yáyos triṃśátaṃ tánā  sahásrāṇi ca dádmahe  tárat sá mandī́ dhāvati

translation.text: From whom we have accepted thus thousands and three times ten beside: Swift runs this giver of delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व गो॒जिद॑श्व॒जिद्वि॑श्व॒जित्सो॑म रण्य॒जित् प्र॒जाव॒द्रत्न॒मा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: pávasva gojíd aśvajíd  viśvajít soma raṇyajít  prajā́vad rátnam ā́ bhara

translation.text: FLOW onward, Soma, winning kine, and steeds, and all that gives delight: Bring hither wealth with progeny.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्वा॒द्भ्यो अदा॑भ्यः॒ पव॒स्वौष॑धीभ्यः पव॑स्व धि॒षणा॑भ्यः
verses.transliteration: pávasvādbhyó ádābhyaḥ  pávasvaúṣadhībhyaḥ  pávasva dhiṣáṇābhyaḥ

translation.text: Flow onward from the waters, flow, inviolable, from the plants: Flow onward from the pressing-boards.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म॒ पव॑मानो॒ विश्वा॑नि दुरि॒ता त॑र क॒विः सी॑द॒ नि ब॒र्हिषि॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma pávamāno  víśvāni duritā́ tara  kavíḥ sīda ní barhíṣi

translation.text: Soma, as Pavamâna, pass over all trouble and distress: Sit on the sacred grass, a Sage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान॒ स्व॑र्विदो॒ जाय॑मानोऽभवो म॒हान् इन्दो॒ विश्वाँ॑ अ॒भीद॑सि
verses.transliteration: pávamāna svàr vido  jā́yamāno 'bhavo mahā́n  índo víśvām̐ abhī́d asi

translation.text: Thou, Pavamâna, foundest light; thou at thy birth becamest great: O Indu, thou art over all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र गा॑य॒त्रेण॑ गायत॒ पव॑मानं॒ विच॑र्षणिम् इन्दुं॑ स॒हस्र॑चक्षसम्
verses.transliteration: prá gāyatréṇa gāyata  pávamānaṃ vícarṣaṇim  índuṃ sahásracakṣasam

translation.text: SING forth and laud with sacred song most active Pavamâna, laud Indu who sees with thousand eyes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ स॒हस्र॑चक्षस॒मथो॑ स॒हस्र॑भर्णसम् अति॒ वार॑मपाविषुः
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā sahásracakṣasam  átho sahásrabharṇasam  áti vā́ram apāviṣuḥ

translation.text: Thee who hast thousand eyes to see, bearer of thousand burthens, they Have filtered through the fleecy cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अति॒ वारा॒न्पव॑मानो असिष्यदत्क॒लशाँ॑ अ॒भि धा॑वति इन्द्र॑स्य॒ हार्द्या॑वि॒शन्
verses.transliteration: áti vā́rān pávamāno asiṣyadat  kaláśām̐ abhí dhāvati  índrasya hā́rdy āviśán

translation.text: He, Pavamâna, hath streamed through the fleece then: he runs into the jars, Finding his way to Indra's heart.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑स्य सोम॒ राध॑से॒ शं प॑वस्व विचर्षणे प्र॒जाव॒द्रेत॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: índrasya soma rā́dhase  śám pavasva vicarṣaṇe  prajā́vad réta ā́ bhara

translation.text: That Indra may be bounteous, flow, most active Soma, for our weal: Bring genial seed with progeny.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒या वी॒ती परि॑ स्रव॒ यस्त॑ इन्दो॒ मदे॒ष्वा अ॒वाह॑न्नव॒तीर्नव॑
verses.transliteration: ayā́ vītī́ pári srava  yás ta indo mádeṣv ā́  avā́han navatī́r náva

translation.text: FLOW onward, Indu, with this food for him who in thy wild delight Battered the nine-and-ninety down,

verses.sanskrit_deva: पुरः॑ स॒द्य इ॒त्थाधि॑ये॒ दिवो॑दासाय॒ शम्ब॑रम् अध॒ त्यं तु॒र्वशं॒ यदु॑म्
verses.transliteration: púraḥ sadyá itthā́dhiye  dívodāsāya śámbaram  ádha tyáṃ turváśaṃ yádum

translation.text: Smote swiftly forts, and gambara, then Yadu and that Turvaga, For pious Divodâsa's sake.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ णो॒ अश्व॑मश्व॒विद्गोम॑दिन्दो॒ हिर॑ण्यवत् क्षरा॑ सह॒स्रिणी॒रिषः॑
verses.transliteration: pári ṇo áśvam aśvavíd  gómad indo híraṇyavat  kṣárā sahasríṇīr íṣaḥ

translation.text: Finder of horses, pour on us horses and wealth in kine and gold, And, Indu, food in boundless store.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानस्य ते व॒यं प॒वित्र॑मभ्युन्द॒तः स॒खि॒त्वमा वृ॑णीमहे
verses.transliteration: pávamānasya te vayám  pavítram abhyundatáḥ  sakhitvám ā́ vr̥ṇīmahe

translation.text: We seek to win thy friendly love, even Pavamâna's flowing o'er The limit of the cleansing sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये ते॑ प॒वित्र॑मू॒र्मयो॑ऽभि॒क्षर॑न्ति॒ धार॑या तेभि॑र्नः सोम मृळय
verses.transliteration: yé te pavítram ūrmáyo  -abhikṣáranti dhā́rayā  tébhir naḥ soma mr̥ḷaya

translation.text: With those same waves which in their stream oyerflow the purifying sieve, Soma; be gracious unto us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पुना॒न आ भ॑र र॒यिं वी॒रव॑ती॒मिष॑म् ईशा॑नः सोम वि॒श्वतः॑
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ punāná ā́ bhara  rayíṃ vīrávatīm íṣam  ī́śānaḥ soma viśvátaḥ

translation.text: O Soma, being purified, bring us from all sides,– for thou canst,– Riches and food with hero sons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तमु॒ त्यं दश॒ क्षिपो॑ मृ॒जन्ति॒ सिन्धु॑मातरम् समा॑दि॒त्येभि॑रख्यत
verses.transliteration: etám u tyáṃ dáśa kṣípo  mr̥jánti síndhumātaram  sám ādityébhir akhyata

translation.text: Him here, the Child whom streams have borne, the ten swift fingers beautify With the Âdityas is he seen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समिन्द्रे॑णो॒त वा॒युना॑ सु॒त ए॑ति प॒वित्र॒ आ सं सूर्य॑स्य र॒श्मिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: sám índreṇotá vāyúnā  sutá eti pavítra ā́  sáṃ sū́ryasya raśmíbhiḥ

translation.text: With Indra and with Vâyu he, effused, flows onward with,the beams Of Sûrya to the cleansing sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ भगा॑य वा॒यवे॑ पू॒ष्णे प॑वस्व॒ मधु॑मान् चारु॑र्मि॒त्रे वरु॑णे च
verses.transliteration: sá no bhágāya vāyáve  pūṣṇé pavasva mádhumān  cā́rur mitré váruṇe ca

translation.text: Flow rich in sweets and lovely for our Bhaga, Vâyu, Pûshan flow For Mitra and for Varuṇa.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒च्चा ते॑ जा॒तमन्ध॑सो दि॒वि षद्भूम्या द॑दे उ॒ग्रं शर्म॒ महि॒ श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: uccā́ te jātám ándhaso  diví ṣád bhū́my ā́ dade  ugráṃ śárma máhi śrávaḥ

translation.text: High is thy juice's birth: though set in heaven, on earth it hath obtained Strong sheltering power and great renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ना विश्वा॑न्य॒र्य आ द्यु॒म्नानि॒ मानु॑षाणाम् सिषा॑सन्तो वनामहे
verses.transliteration: enā́ víśvāny aryá~ā́  dyumnā́ni mā́nuṣāṇām  síṣāsanto vanāmahe

translation.text: Striving to win, with him we gain all wealth from the ungodly man, Yea, all the glories of mankind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स न॒ इन्द्रा॑य॒ यज्य॑वे॒ वरु॑णाय म॒रुद्भ्यः॑ व॒रि॒वो॒वित्परि॑ स्रव
verses.transliteration: sá na índrāya yájyave  váruṇāya marúdbhyaḥ-  varivovít pári srava

translation.text: Finder of room and freedom, flow for Indra whom we must adore, For Varuṇa and the Marut host.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उपो॒ षु जा॒तम॒प्तुरं॒ गोभि॑र्भ॒ङ्गं परि॑ष्कृतम् इन्दुं॑ दे॒वा अ॑यासिषुः
verses.transliteration: úpo ṣú jātám aptúraṃ  góbhir bhaṅgám páriṣkr̥tam  índuṃ devā́ ayāsiṣuḥ

translation.text: The Gods have come to Indu well-descended, beautified with milk, The active crusher of the foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिद्व॑र्धन्तु नो॒ गिरो॑ व॒त्सं सं॒शिश्व॑रीरिव य इन्द्र॑स्य हृदं॒सनिः॑
verses.transliteration: tám íd vardhantu no gíraḥ  vatsáṃ saṃśíśvarīr iva  yá índrasya hr̥daṃsániḥ

translation.text: Even as mother cows their calf, so let our praise-songs strengthen him, Yea, him who winneth Indra's heart.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अर्षा॑ णः सोम॒ शं गवे॑ धु॒क्षस्व॑ पि॒प्युषी॒मिष॑म् वर्धा॑ समु॒द्रमु॒क्थ्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: árṣā ṇaḥ soma śáṃ gáve  dhukṣásva pipyúṣīm íṣam  várdhā samudrám ukthyàm

translation.text: Soma, pour blessings on our kine, pour forth the food that streams with milk Increase the sea that merits laud.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानो अजीजनद्दि॒वश्चि॒त्रं न त॑न्य॒तुम् ज्योति॑र्वैश्वान॒रं बृ॒हत्
verses.transliteration: pávamāno ajījanad  diváś citráṃ ná tanyatúm  jyótir vaiśvānarám br̥hát

translation.text: From heaven hath Pavamâna made, as 'twere, the marvellous thunder, and The lofty light of all mankind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानस्य ते॒ रसो॒ मदो॑ राजन्नदुच्छु॒नः वि वार॒मव्य॑मर्षति
verses.transliteration: pávamānasya te ráso  mádo rājann aduchunáḥ  ví vā́ram ávyam arṣati

translation.text: The gladdening and auspicious juice of thee, of Pavamâna, King! Flows o'er the woollen straining-cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान॒ रस॒स्तव॒ दक्षो॒ वि रा॑जति द्यु॒मान् ज्योति॒र्विश्वं॒ स्व॑र्दृ॒शे
verses.transliteration: pávamāna rásas táva  dákṣo ví rājati dyumā́n  jyótir víśvaṃ svàr dr̥śé

translation.text: Thy juice, O Pavamâna, sends its rays abroad like splendid skill, Like lustre, all heaven's light, to see.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॒ मदो॒ वरे॑ण्य॒स्तेना॑ पव॒स्वान्ध॑सा दे॒वा॒वीर॑घशंस॒हा
verses.transliteration: yás te mádo váreṇyo  ténā pavasvā́ndhasā  devāvī́r aghaśaṃsahā́

translation.text: Flow onward with that juice of thine most excellent, that brings delight, Slaying the wicked, dear to Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जघ्नि॑र्वृ॒त्रम॑मि॒त्रियं॒ सस्नि॒र्वाजं॑ दि॒वेदि॑वे गो॒षा उ॑ अश्व॒सा अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: jághnir vr̥trám amitríyaṃ  sásnir vā́jaṃ divé-dive  goṣā́ u aśvasā́ asi

translation.text: Killing the foeman and his hate, and winning booty every day, Gainer art thou of steeds and kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सम्मि॑श्लो अरु॒षो भ॑व सूप॒स्थाभि॒र्न धे॒नुभिः॑ सीद॑ञ्छ्ये॒नो न योनि॒मा
verses.transliteration: sámmiślo aruṣó bhava  sūpasthā́bhir ná dhenúbhiḥ  sī́dañ chyenó ná yónim ā́

translation.text: Red-hued, be blended with the milk that seems to yield its lovely breast, Falcon-like resting in thine home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प॑वस्व॒ य आवि॒थेन्द्रं॑ वृ॒त्राय॒ हन्त॑वे व॒व्रि॒वांसं॑ म॒हीर॒पः
verses.transliteration: sá pavasva yá ā́vitha-  índraṃ vr̥trā́ya hántave  vavrivā́ṃsam mahī́r apáḥ

translation.text: Flow onward thou who strengthenedst Indra to slaughter Vr̥itra who Compassed and stayed the mighty floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒वीरा॑सो व॒यं धना॒ जये॑म सोम मीढ्वः पु॒ना॒नो व॑र्ध नो॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: suvī́rāso vayáṃ dhánā  jáyema soma mīḍhvaḥ  punānó vardha no gíraḥ

translation.text: Soma who rainest gifts, may we win riches with our hero sons: Strengthen, as thou art cleansed, our hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वोता॑स॒स्तवाव॑सा॒ स्याम॑ व॒न्वन्त॑ आ॒मुरः॑ सोम॑ व्र॒तेषु॑ जागृहि
verses.transliteration: tvótāsas távā́vasā  syā́ma vanvánta āmúraḥ  sóma vratéṣu jāgr̥hi

translation.text: Aided by thee, and through thy grace, may we be slayers when we war: Watch, Soma, at our solemn rites.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प॒घ्नन्प॑वते॒ मृधोऽप॒ सोमो॒ अरा॑व्णः गच्छ॒न्निन्द्र॑स्य निष्कृ॒तम्
verses.transliteration: apaghnán pavate mŕ̥dhaḥ-  -ápa sómo árāvṇaḥ  gáchann índrasya niṣkr̥tám

translation.text: Chasing our foemen, driving off the godless, Soma flowcth on, Going to Indra's special place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हो नो॑ रा॒य आ भ॑र॒ पव॑मान ज॒ही मृधः॑ रास्वे॑न्दो वी॒रव॒द्यशः॑
verses.transliteration: mahó no rāyá ā́ bhara  pávamāna jahī́ mŕ̥dhaḥ  rā́svendo vīrávad yáśaḥ

translation.text: O Pavamâna, hither bring great riches, and destroy our foes: O Indu, grant heroic fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न त्वा॑ श॒तं च॒न ह्रुतो॒ राधो॒ दित्स॑न्त॒मा मि॑नन् यत्पु॑ना॒नो म॑ख॒स्यसे॑
verses.transliteration: ná tvā śatáṃ caná hrúto  rā́dho dítsantam ā́ minan  yát punānó makhasyáse

translation.text: A hundred obstacles have ne'er checked thee when fain to give thy boons, When, being cleansed, thou combatest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्वेन्दो॒ वृषा॑ सु॒तः कृ॒धी नो॑ य॒शसो॒ जने॑ विश्वा॒ अप॒ द्विषो॑ जहि
verses.transliteration: pávasvendo vŕ̥ṣā sutáḥ  kr̥dhī́ no yaśáso jáne  víśvā ápa dvíṣo jahi

translation.text: Indu, flow on, a mighty juice; glorify us among the folk: Drive all our enemies away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्य॑ ते स॒ख्ये व॒यं तवे॑न्दो द्यु॒म्न उ॑त्त॒मे सा॒स॒ह्याम॑ पृतन्य॒तः
verses.transliteration: ásya te sakhyé vayáṃ  távendo dyumná uttamé  sāsahyā́ma pr̥tanyatáḥ

translation.text: Indu, in this thy friendship most lofty and glorious may we Subdue all those who war with us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या ते॑ भी॒मान्यायु॑धा ति॒ग्मानि॒ सन्ति॒ धूर्व॑णे रक्षा॑ समस्य नो नि॒दः
verses.transliteration: yā́ te bhīmā́ny ā́yudhā  tigmā́ni sánti dhū́rvaṇe  rákṣā samasya no nidáḥ

translation.text: Those awful weapons that thou hast, sharpened at point to strike men down- Guard us therewith from every foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते अ॑सृग्र॒मिन्द॑वस्ति॒रः प॒वित्र॑मा॒शवः॑ विश्वा॑न्य॒भि सौभ॑गा
verses.transliteration: eté asr̥gram índavas  tiráḥ pavítram āśávaḥ  víśvāny abhí saúbhagā

translation.text: THESE rapid Soma-drops have been poured through the purifying sieve To bring us all felicities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒घ्नन्तो॑ दुरि॒ता पु॒रु सु॒गा तो॒काय॑ वा॒जिनः॑ तना॑ कृ॒ण्वन्तो॒ अर्व॑ते
verses.transliteration: vighnánto duritā́ purú  sugā́ tokā́ya vājínaḥ  tánā kr̥ṇvánto árvate

translation.text: Dispelling manifold mishap, giving the courser's progeny, Yea, and the warrior steed, success.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कृ॒ण्वन्तो॒ वरि॑वो॒ गवे॒ऽभ्य॑र्षन्ति सुष्टु॒तिम् इळा॑म॒स्मभ्यं॑ सं॒यत॑म्
verses.transliteration: kr̥ṇvánto várivo gáve  -abhy àrṣanti suṣṭutím  íḷām asmábhyaṃ saṃyátam

translation.text: Bringing prosperity to kine, they make perpetual Iḷâ flow To us for noble eulogy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: असा॑व्यं॒शुर्मदा॑या॒प्सु दक्षो॑ गिरि॒ष्ठाः श्ये॒नो न योनि॒मास॑दत्
verses.transliteration: ásāvy aṃśúr mádāya-  -apsú dákṣo giriṣṭhā́ḥ  śyenó ná yónim ā́sadat

translation.text: Strong, mountain-born, the stalk hath been pressed in the streams for rapturous joy: Hawk-like he settles in his home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शु॒भ्रमन्धो॑ दे॒ववा॑तम॒प्सु धू॒तो नृभिः॑ सु॒तः स्वद॑न्ति॒ गावः॒ पयो॑भिः
verses.transliteration: śubhrám ándho devávātam  apsú dhūtó nŕ̥bhiḥ sutáḥ  svádanti gā́vaḥ páyobhiḥ

translation.text: Fair is the God-loved juice; the plant is washed in waters, pressed by men The milch-kine sweeten it with milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदी॒मश्वं॒ न हेता॒रोऽशू॑शुभन्न॒मृता॑य मध्वो॒ रसं॑ सध॒मादे॑
verses.transliteration: ā́d īm áśvaṃ ná hétāraḥ-  -áśūśubhann amŕ̥tāya  mádhvo rásaṃ sadhamā́de

translation.text: As drivers deck a courser, so have they adorned the meath's juice for Ambrosia, for the festival.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यास्ते॒ धारा॑ मधु॒श्चुतोऽसृ॑ग्रमिन्द ऊ॒तये॑ ताभिः॑ प॒वित्र॒मास॑दः
verses.transliteration: yā́s te dhā́rā madhuścútaḥ-  -ásr̥gram inda ūtáye  tā́bhiḥ pavítram ā́sadaḥ

translation.text: Thou, Indu, with thy streams that drop sweet juices, which were poured for help, Hast settled in the cleansing sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सो अ॒र्षेन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑ ति॒रो रोमा॑ण्य॒व्यया॑ सीद॒न्योना॒ वने॒ष्वा
verses.transliteration: só arṣéndrāya pītáye  tiró rómāṇy avyáyā  sī́dan yónā váneṣv ā́

translation.text: So flow thou onward through the fleece, for Indra flow, to be his drink, Finding thine home in vats of wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमि॑न्दो॒ परि॑ स्रव॒ स्वादि॑ष्ठो॒ अङ्गि॑रोभ्यः व॒रि॒वो॒विद्घृ॒तं पयः॑
verses.transliteration: tvám indo pári srava  svā́diṣṭho áṅgirobhyaḥ  varivovíd ghr̥tám páyaḥ

translation.text: As giving room and freedom, as most sweet, pour butter forth and milk, O Indu, for the Angirases.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं विच॑र्षणिर्हि॒तः पव॑मानः॒ स चे॑तति हि॒न्वा॒न आप्यं॑ बृ॒हत्
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ vícarṣaṇir hitáḥ  pávamānaḥ sá cetati  hinvāná ā́pyam br̥hát

translation.text: Most active and benevolent, this Pavamâna, sent to us For lofty friendship, meditates.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष वृषा॒ वृष॑व्रतः॒ पव॑मानो अशस्ति॒हा कर॒द्वसू॑नि दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: eṣá vŕ̥ṣā vŕ̥ṣavrataḥ  pávamāno aśastihā́  kárad vásūni dāśúṣe

translation.text: Queller of curses, mighty, with strong sway, this Pavamâna shall Bring treasures to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व सह॒स्रिणं॑ र॒यिं गोम॑न्तम॒श्विन॑म् पु॒रु॒श्च॒न्द्रं पु॑रु॒स्पृह॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva sahasríṇam  rayíṃ gómantam aśvínam  puruścandrám puruspŕ̥ham

translation.text: Pour thou upon us thousandfold possessions, both of kine and steeds, Exceeding glorious, much-desired.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ष स्य परि॑ षिच्यते मर्मृ॒ज्यमा॑न आ॒युभिः॑ उ॒रु॒गा॒यः क॒विक्र॑तुः
verses.transliteration: eṣá syá pári ṣicyate  marmr̥jyámāna āyúbhiḥ  urugāyáḥ kavíkratuḥ

translation.text: Wandering far, with wise designs, the juice here present is effused, Made beautiful by living men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒हस्रो॑तिः श॒ताम॑घो वि॒मानो॒ रज॑सः क॒विः इन्द्रा॑य पवते॒ मदः॑
verses.transliteration: sahásrotiḥ śatā́magho  vimā́no rájasaḥ kavíḥ  índrāya pavate mádaḥ

translation.text: For Indra flows the gladdening drink, the measurer of the region, Sage, With countless wealth and endless help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गि॒रा जा॒त इ॒ह स्तु॒त इन्दु॒रिन्द्रा॑य धीयते विर्योना॑ वस॒तावि॑व
verses.transliteration: girā́ jātá ihá stutáḥ-  índur índrāya dhīyate  vír yónā vasatā́v iva

translation.text: Born on the inountain, lauded here, Indu for Indra is set down, As in her sheltering nest a bird.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानः सु॒तो नृभिः॒ सोमो॒ वाज॑मिवासरत् च॒मूषु॒ शक्म॑ना॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: pávamānaḥ sutó nŕ̥bhiḥ  sómo vā́jam ivāsarat  camū́ṣu śákmanāsádam

translation.text: Pressed by the men, as 'twere to war hath Soma Pavamâna sped, To test with might within the vats.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्रि॑पृ॒ष्ठे त्रि॑वन्धु॒रे रथे॑ युञ्जन्ति॒ यात॑वे ऋषी॑णां स॒प्त धी॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ tripr̥ṣṭhé trivandhuré  ráthe yuñjanti yā́tave  ŕ̥ṣīṇāṃ saptá dhītíbhiḥ

translation.text: That he may move, they yoke him to the three-backed triple-seated car By the Seven R̥ishis' holy songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं सो॑तारो धन॒स्पृत॑मा॒शुं वाजा॑य॒ यात॑वे हरिं॑ हिनोत वा॒जिन॑म्
verses.transliteration: táṃ sotāro dhanaspŕ̥tam  āśúṃ vā́jāya yā́tave  háriṃ hinota vājínam

translation.text: Drive ye that Tawny Courser, O ye pressers, on his way to war, Swift Steed who carries off the spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒वि॒शन्क॒लशं॑ सु॒तो विश्वा॒ अर्ष॑न्न॒भि श्रियः॑ शूरो॒ न गोषु॑ तिष्ठति
verses.transliteration: āviśán kaláśaṃ sutó  víśvā árṣann abhí śríyaḥ  śū́ro ná góṣu tiṣṭhati

translation.text: Pouring all glories hither, he, effused and entering the jar, Stands like a hero mid the kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त॑ इन्दो॒ मदा॑य॒ कं पयो॑ दुहन्त्या॒यवः॑ दे॒वा दे॒वेभ्यो॒ मधु॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ ta indo mádāya kám  páyo duhanty āyávaḥ  devā́ devébhyo mádhu

translation.text: Indu, the living men milk out the juice to make the rapturous draught: Gods for the Gods milk out the meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नः॒ सोमं॑ प॒वित्र॒ आ सृ॒जता॒ मधु॑मत्तमम् दे॒वेभ्यो॑ देव॒श्रुत्त॑मम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ naḥ sómam pavítra~ā́  sr̥játā mádhumattamam  devébhyo devaśrúttamam

translation.text: Pour for the Gods into the sieve our Soma very rich in sweets, Him whom the Gods most gladly hear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते सोमा॑ असृक्षत गृणा॒नाः श्रव॑से म॒हे म॒दिन्त॑मस्य॒ धार॑या
verses.transliteration: eté sómā asr̥kṣata  gr̥ṇānā́ḥ śrávase mahé  madíntamasya dhā́rayā

translation.text: Into his stream who gladdens best these Soma juices have been poured, Lauded with songs for lofty fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि गव्या॑नि वी॒तये॑ नृ॒म्णा पु॑ना॒नो अ॑र्षसि स॒नद्वा॑जः॒ परि॑ स्रव
verses.transliteration: abhí gávyāni vītáye  nr̥mṇā́ punānó arṣasi  sanádvājaḥ pári srava

translation.text: Thou flowest to enjoy the milk, and bringest valour, being cleansed: Winning the spoil flow hitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नो॒ गोम॑ती॒रिषो॒ विश्वा॑ अर्ष परि॒ष्टुभः॑ गृ॒णा॒नो ज॒मद॑ग्निना
verses.transliteration: utá no gómatīr íṣaḥ-  víśvā arṣa pariṣṭúbhaḥ  gr̥ṇānó jamádagninā

translation.text: And, hymned by Jamadagnis, let all nourishment that kine supply, And general praises, flow to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व वा॒चो अ॑ग्रि॒यः सोम॑ चि॒त्राभि॑रू॒तिभिः॑ अ॒भि विश्वा॑नि॒ काव्या॑
verses.transliteration: pávasva vācó agriyáḥ  sóma citrā́bhir ūtíbhiḥ  abhí víśvāni kā́vyā

translation.text: Soma, as leader of the song flow onward with thy wondrous aids, For holy lore of every kind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं स॑मु॒द्रिया॑ अ॒पो॑ऽग्रि॒यो वाच॑ ई॒रय॑न् पव॑स्व विश्वमेजय
verses.transliteration: tváṃ samudríyā apáḥ-  -agriyó vā́ca īráyan  pávasva viśvamejaya

translation.text: Do thou as leader of the song, stirring the waters of the sea, Flow onward, thou who movest all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्ये॒मा भुव॑ना कवे महि॒म्ने सो॑म तस्थिरे तुभ्य॑मर्षन्ति॒ सिन्ध॑वः
verses.transliteration: túbhyemā́ bhúvanā kave  mahimné soma tasthire  túbhyam arṣanti síndhavaḥ

translation.text: O Soma, O thou Sage, these worlds stand ready to attest thy might: For thy behoof the rivers flow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र ते॑ दि॒वो न वृ॒ष्टयो॒ धारा॑ यन्त्यस॒श्चतः॑ अ॒भि शु॒क्रामु॑प॒स्तिर॑म्
verses.transliteration: prá te divó ná vr̥ṣṭáyo  dhā́rā yanty asaścátaḥ  abhí śukrā́m upastíram

translation.text: Like showers of rain that fall from heaven thy streams perpetually flow To the bright fleece spread under them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॒येन्दुं॑ पुनीतनो॒ग्रं दक्षा॑य॒ साध॑नम् ई॒शा॒नं वी॒तिरा॑धसम्
verses.transliteration: índrāyéndum punītana-  -ugráṃ dákṣāya sā́dhanam  īśānáṃ vītírādhasam

translation.text: For potent Indra purify Indu effectual and strong, Enjoyment-giver, Mighty Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान ऋ॒तः क॒विः सोमः॑ प॒वित्र॒मास॑दत् दध॑त्स्तो॒त्रे सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: pávamāna r̥táḥ kavíḥ  sómaḥ pavítram ā́sadat  dádhat stotré suvī́ryam

translation.text: Soma, true, Pavamâna, Sage, is seated in the cleansing sieve, Giving his praiser hero strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व सह॒स्रिणं॑ र॒यिं सो॑म सु॒वीर्य॑म् अ॒स्मे श्रवां॑सि धारय
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva sahasríṇam  rayíṃ soma suvī́ryam  asmé śrávāṃsi dhāraya

translation.text: POUR hitherward, O Soma, wealth in thousands and heroic strength, And keep renown secure for us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इष॒मूर्जं॑ च पिन्वस॒ इन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रिन्त॑मः च॒मूष्वा नि षी॑दसि
verses.transliteration: íṣam ū́rjaṃ ca pinvase-  índrāya matsaríntamaḥ  camū́ṣv ā́ ní ṣīdasi

translation.text: Thou makest food and vigour swell for Indra, best of gladdeners! Within the cups thou seatest thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒त इन्द्रा॑य॒ विष्ण॑वे॒ सोमः॑ क॒लशे॑ अक्षरत् मधु॑माँ अस्तु वा॒यवे॑
verses.transliteration: sutá índrāya víṣṇave  sómaḥ kaláśe akṣarat  mádhumām̐ astu vāyáve

translation.text: For Indra and for Vishṇu poured, Soma hath flowed into the jar: May Vâyu find it rich in sweets.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते अ॑सृग्रमा॒शवोऽति॒ ह्वरां॑सि ब॒भ्रवः॑ सोमा॑ ऋ॒तस्य॒ धार॑या
verses.transliteration: eté asr̥gram āśávaḥ-  -áti hvárāṃsi babhrávaḥ  sómā r̥tásya dhā́rayā

translation.text: These Somas swift and brown of hue, in stream of solemn sacrifice Have flowed through twisted obstacles,

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॒ वर्ध॑न्तो अ॒प्तुरः॑ कृ॒ण्वन्तो॒ विश्व॒मार्य॑म् अ॒प॒घ्नन्तो॒ अरा॑व्णः
verses.transliteration: índraṃ várdhanto aptúraḥ  kr̥ṇvánto víśvam ā́ryam  apaghnánto árāvṇaḥ

translation.text: Performing every noble work, active, augmenting Indra's strength, Driving away the godless ones.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒ता अनु॒ स्वमा रजो॒ऽभ्य॑र्षन्ति ब॒भ्रवः॑ इन्द्रं॒ गच्छ॑न्त॒ इन्द॑वः
verses.transliteration: sutā́ ánu svám ā́ rájo  -abhy àrṣanti babhrávaḥ  índraṃ gáchanta índavaḥ

translation.text: Brown Soma-drops, effused that seek Indra, to their appropriate place Flow through the region hitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒या प॑वस्व॒ धार॑या॒ यया॒ सूर्य॒मरो॑चयः हि॒न्वा॒नो मानु॑षीर॒पः
verses.transliteration: ayā́ pavasva dhā́rayā  yáyā sū́ryam árocayaḥ  hinvānó mā́nuṣīr apáḥ

translation.text: Flow onward with that stream of thine wherewith thou gavest Sûrya light, Urging on waters good to men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अयु॑क्त॒ सूर॒ एत॑शं॒ पव॑मानो म॒नावधि॑ अ॒न्तरि॑क्षेण॒ यात॑वे
verses.transliteration: áyukta sū́ra étaśam  pávamāno manā́v ádhi  antárikṣeṇa yā́tave

translation.text: He, Pavamâna, high o'er man yoked the Sun's courser Etaṣa To travel through the realm of air.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्या ह॒रितो॒ दश॒ सूरो॑ अयुक्त॒ यात॑वे इन्दु॒रिन्द्र॒ इति॑ ब्रु॒वन्
verses.transliteration: utá tyā́ haríto dáśa  sū́ro ayukta yā́tave  índur índra íti bruván

translation.text: And those ten Coursers, tawny-hued, he harnessed that the Sun might come Indu, he said, is Indra's self.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परी॒तो वा॒यवे॑ सु॒तं गिर॒ इन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रम् अव्यो॒ वारे॑षु सिञ्चत
verses.transliteration: párītó vāyáve sutáṃ  gíra índrāya matsarám  ávyo vā́reṣu siñcata

translation.text: Hence, singers, pour the gladdeningjuice to Vâyu and to Indra, pour The drops upon the fleecy cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान वि॒दा र॒यिम॒स्मभ्यं॑ सोम दु॒ष्टर॑म् यो दू॒णाशो॑ वनुष्य॒ता
verses.transliteration: pávamāna vidā́ rayím  asmábhyaṃ soma duṣṭáram  yó dūṇā́śo vanuṣyatā́

translation.text: O Soma Pavamâna, find wealth for us not to be assailed, Wealth which the foeman may not win.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑र्ष सह॒स्रिणं॑ र॒यिं गोम॑न्तम॒श्विन॑म् अ॒भि वाज॑मु॒त श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: abhy àrṣa sahasríṇaṃ  rayíṃ gómantam aśvínam  abhí vā́jam utá śrávaḥ

translation.text: Send riches hither with thy stream in thousands, both of steeds and kine, Send spoil of war and high renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोमो॑ दे॒वो न सूर्योऽद्रि॑भिः पवते सु॒तः दधा॑नः क॒लशे॒ रस॑म्
verses.transliteration: sómo devó ná sū́ryaḥ  -ádribhiḥ pavate sutáḥ  dádhānaḥ kaláśe rásam

translation.text: Soma the God, expressed with stones, like Sûrya, floweth on his way, Pouring the juice within the jar.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते धामा॒न्यार्या॑ शु॒क्रा ऋ॒तस्य॒ धार॑या वाजं॒ गोम॑न्तमक्षरन्
verses.transliteration: eté dhā́māny ā́ryā  śukrā́ r̥tásya dhā́rayā  vā́jaṃ gómantam akṣaran

translation.text: These brilliant drops have poured for us, in stream of solemn sacrifice, Worshipful laws and strength in kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒ता इन्द्रा॑य व॒ज्रिणे॒ सोमा॑सो॒ दध्या॑शिरः प॒वित्र॒मत्य॑क्षरन्
verses.transliteration: sutā́ índrāya vajríṇe  sómāso dádhyāśiraḥ  pavítram áty akṣaran

translation.text: Over the cleansing sieve have flowed the Somas, blent with curdled milk, Effused for Indra Thunder-armed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सो॑म॒ मधु॑मत्तमो रा॒ये अ॑र्ष प॒वित्र॒ आ मदो॒ यो दे॑व॒वीत॑मः
verses.transliteration: prá soma mádhumattamo  rāyé arṣa pavítra ā́  mádo yó devavī́tamaḥ

translation.text: Soma, do thou most rich in sweets, a gladdening drink most dear to Gods, Flow to the sieve to bring us wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमी॑ मृजन्त्या॒यवो॒ हरिं॑ न॒दीषु॑ वा॒जिन॑म् इन्दु॒मिन्द्रा॑य मत्स॒रम्
verses.transliteration: tám ī mr̥janty āyávo  háriṃ nadī́ṣu vājínam  índum índrāya matsarám

translation.text: For Indra, living men adorn the Tawny Courser in the streams, Indu, the giver of delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व॒ हिर॑ण्यव॒दश्वा॑वत्सोम वी॒रव॑त् वाजं॒ गोम॑न्त॒मा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva híraṇyavad  áśvāvat soma vīrávat  vā́jaṃ gómantam ā́ bhara

translation.text: Pour for us, Soma, wealth in gold, in horses and heroic sons, Bring hither strength in herds of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॒ वाजे॒ न वा॑ज॒युमव्यो॒ वारे॑षु सिञ्चत इन्द्रा॑य॒ मधु॑मत्तमम्
verses.transliteration: pári vā́je ná vājayúm  ávyo vā́reṣu siñcata  índrāya mádhumattamam

translation.text: For Indra pour ye on the fleece him very sweet to taste, who longs. For battle as it were in war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒विं मृ॑जन्ति॒ मर्ज्यं॑ धी॒भिर्विप्रा॑ अव॒स्यवः॑ वृषा॒ कनि॑क्रदर्षति
verses.transliteration: kavím mr̥janti márjyaṃ  dhībhír víprā avasyávaḥ  vŕ̥ṣā kánikrad arṣati

translation.text: The singers, seeking help, adorn the Sage who must be decked with songs: Loud bellowing the Steer comes on,

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृष॑णं धी॒भिर॒प्तुरं॒ सोम॑मृ॒तस्य॒ धार॑या म॒ती विप्राः॒ सम॑स्वरन्
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣaṇaṃ dhībhír aptúraṃ  sómam r̥tásya dhā́rayā  matī́ víprāḥ sám asvaran

translation.text: The singers with their thoughts and hymns have, in the stream of sacrifice, Caused Soma, active Steer, to roar.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑स्व देवायु॒षगिन्द्रं॑ गच्छतु ते॒ मदः॑ वा॒युमा रो॑ह॒ धर्म॑णा
verses.transliteration: pávasva devāyuṣág  índraṃ gachatu te mádaḥ  vāyúm ā́ roha dhármaṇā

translation.text: God, working with mankind, flow on; to Indra go thy gladdening juice: To Vâyu mount as Law commands

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान॒ नि तो॑शसे र॒यिं सो॑म श्र॒वाय्य॑म् प्रि॒यः स॑मु॒द्रमा वि॑श
verses.transliteration: pávamāna ní tośase  rayíṃ soma śravā́yyam  priyáḥ samudrám ā́ viśa

translation.text: O Soma, Pavamâna, thou pourest out wealth that brings renown: Enter the lake, as one we love.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प॒घ्नन्प॑वसे॒ मृधः॑ क्रतु॒वित्सो॑म मत्स॒रः नु॒दस्वादे॑वयुं॒ जन॑म्
verses.transliteration: apaghnán pavase mŕ̥dhaḥ  kratuvít soma matsaráḥ  nudásvā́devayuṃ jánam

translation.text: Soma thou flowest chasing foes and bringing wisdom and delight: Drive off the folk who love not Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑माना असृक्षत॒ सोमाः॑ शु॒क्रास॒ इन्द॑वः अ॒भि विश्वा॑नि॒ काव्या॑
verses.transliteration: pávamānā asr̥kṣata  sómāḥ śukrā́sa índavaḥ  abhí víśvāni kā́vyā

translation.text: The Pavamânas have been poured, the brilliant drops of Soma juice, For holy lore of every kind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानास आ॒शवः॑ शु॒भ्रा अ॑सृग्र॒मिन्द॑वः घ्नन्तो॒ विश्वा॒ अप॒ द्विषः॑
verses.transliteration: pávamānāsa āśávaḥ  śubhrā́ asr̥gram índavaḥ  ghnánto víśvā ápa dvíṣaḥ

translation.text: The Pavamânas have been shed, the beautiful swift Soma-drops, Driving all enemies afar.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑माना दि॒वस्पर्य॒न्तरि॑क्षादसृक्षत पृ॒थि॒व्या अधि॒ सान॑वि
verses.transliteration: pávamānā divás pári-  antárikṣād asr̥kṣata  pr̥thivyā́ ádhi sā́navi

translation.text: From, heaven, from out the firmament, hath Pavamâna been effused Upon the summit of the earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नः सो॑म॒ धार॒येन्दो॒ विश्वा॒ अप॒ स्रिधः॑ ज॒हि रक्षां॑सि सुक्रतो
verses.transliteration: punānáḥ soma dhā́rayā-  -índo víśvā ápa srídhaḥ  jahí rákṣāṃsi sukrato

translation.text: O Soma, Indu, very wise, drive, being purified, with thy stream All foes, all Raksasas away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प॒घ्नन्त्सो॑म र॒क्षसो॒ऽभ्य॑र्ष॒ कनि॑क्रदत् द्यु॒मन्तं॒ शुष्म॑मुत्त॒मम्
verses.transliteration: apaghnán soma rakṣáso  -abhy àrṣa kánikradat  dyumántaṃ śúṣmam uttamám

translation.text: Driving the Raksasas afar, O Soma, bellowing, pour for us Most excellent and splendid strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मे वसू॑नि धारय॒ सोम॑ दि॒व्यानि॒ पार्थि॑वा इन्दो॒ विश्वा॑नि॒ वार्या॑
verses.transliteration: asmé vásūni dhāraya  sóma divyā́ni pā́rthivā  índo víśvāni vā́ryā

translation.text: Soma, do thou secure for us the treasures of the earih and heaven, Indu, all boons to be desired.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॑ सोम द्यु॒माँ अ॑सि॒ वृषा॑ देव॒ वृष॑व्रतः वृषा॒ धर्मा॑णि दधिषे
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā soma dyumā́m̐ asi  vŕ̥ṣā deva vŕ̥ṣavrataḥ  vŕ̥ṣā dhármāṇi dadhiṣe

translation.text: Soma, thou art a splendid Steer, a Steer, O God, with steerlike sway: Thou as a Steer ordainest laws.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृष्ण॑स्ते॒ वृष्ण्यं॒ शवो॒ वृषा॒ वनं॒ वृषा॒ मदः॑ स॒त्यं वृ॑ष॒न्वृषेद॑सि
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣṇas te vŕ̥ṣṇyaṃ śávo  vŕ̥ṣā vánaṃ vŕ̥ṣā mádaḥ  satyáṃ vr̥ṣan vŕ̥ṣéd asi

translation.text: Steer-strong thy might is as a steer's, steerstrong thywood, steer-like thy drink A Steer indeed, O Steer, art thou.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अश्वो॒ न च॑क्रदो॒ वृषा॒ सं गा इ॑न्दो॒ समर्व॑तः वि नो॑ रा॒ये दुरो॑ वृधि
verses.transliteration: áśvo ná cakrado vŕ̥ṣā  sáṃ gā́ indo sám árvataḥ  ví no rāyé dúro vr̥dhi

translation.text: Thou, Indu, as a vigorous horse, hast neighed together steeds and kine: Unbar for us the doors to wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: असृ॑क्षत॒ प्र वा॒जिनो॑ ग॒व्या सोमा॑सो अश्व॒या शु॒क्रासो॑ वीर॒याशवः॑
verses.transliteration: ásr̥kṣata prá vājíno  gavyā́ sómāso aśvayā́  śukrā́so vīrayā́śávaḥ

translation.text: Out of desire of cows and steeds and horses. potent Soma-drops, Brilliant and swift, have been effused.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शु॒म्भमा॑ना ऋता॒युभि॑र्मृ॒ज्यमा॑ना॒ गभ॑स्त्योः पव॑न्ते॒ वारे॑ अ॒व्यये॑
verses.transliteration: śumbhámānā r̥tāyúbhir  mr̥jyámānā gábhastyoḥ  pávante vā́re avyáye

translation.text: They purified in both the hands, made beautiful by holy men, Flow onward to the fleecy cloth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते विश्वा॑ दा॒शुषे॒ वसु॒ सोमा॑ दि॒व्यानि॒ पार्थि॑वा पव॑न्ता॒मान्तरि॑क्ष्या
verses.transliteration: té víśvā dāśúṣe vásu  sómā divyā́ni pā́rthivā  pávantām ā́ntárikṣyā

translation.text: These Soma juices shall pour forth all treasures for the worshipper From heaven and earth and firmament.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मानस्य विश्ववि॒त्प्र ते॒ सर्गा॑ असृक्षत सूर्य॑स्येव॒ न र॒श्मयः॑
verses.transliteration: pávamānasya viśvavit  prá te sárgā asr̥kṣata  sū́ryasyeva ná raśmáyaḥ

translation.text: The streams of Pavamâna, thine, Finder of all, have been effused, Even as Sûrya's rays of light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: के॒तुं कृ॒ण्वन्दि॒वस्परि॒ विश्वा॑ रू॒पाभ्य॑र्षसि स॒मु॒द्रः सो॑म पिन्वसे
verses.transliteration: ketúṃ kr̥ṇván divás pári  víśvā rūpā́bhy àrṣasi  samudráḥ soma pinvase

translation.text: Making the light that shines from heaven thou flowest on to every form Soma, thou swellest like a sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हि॒न्वा॒नो वाच॑मिष्यसि॒ पव॑मान॒ विध॑र्मणि अक्रा॑न्दे॒वो न सूर्यः॑
verses.transliteration: hinvānó vā́cam iṣyasi  pávamāna vídharmaṇi  ákrān devó ná sū́ryaḥ

translation.text: Urged on thou sendest out thy voice, O Pavamâna; thou hast moved, Like the God Sûrya, to the sieve.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्दुः॑ पविष्ट॒ चेत॑नः प्रि॒यः क॑वी॒नां म॒ती सृ॒जदश्वं॑ र॒थीरि॑व
verses.transliteration: índuḥ paviṣṭa cétanaḥ  priyáḥ kavīnā́m matī́  sr̥jád áśvaṃ rathī́r iva

translation.text: Indu, Enlightener, Friend, hath been purified by the sages' hymns: So starts the charioteer his steed-

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऊ॒र्मिर्यस्ते॑ प॒वित्र॒ आ दे॑वा॒वीः प॒र्यक्ष॑रत् सीद॑न्नृ॒तस्य॒ योनि॒मा
verses.transliteration: ūrmír yás te pavítra~ā́  devāvī́ḥ paryákṣarat  sī́dann r̥tásya yónim ā́

translation.text: Thy God-delighting wave which hath flowed to purifying seive, Alighting in the home of Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ अर्ष प॒वित्र॒ आ मदो॒ यो दे॑व॒वीत॑मः इन्द॒विन्द्रा॑य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: sá no arṣa pavítra~ā́  mádo yó devavī́tamaḥ  índav índrāya pītáye

translation.text: Flow to our sieve, a gladdening draught that hath most intercourse with Gods, Indu, to Indra for his drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒षे प॑वस्व॒ धार॑या मृ॒ज्यमा॑नो मनी॒षिभिः॑ इन्दो॑ रु॒चाभि गा इ॑हि
verses.transliteration: iṣé pavasva dhā́rayā  mr̥jyámāno manīṣíbhiḥ  índo rucā́bhí gā́ ihi

translation.text: Flow onward with a stream for food, made beautiful by sapient men: Indu with sheen approach the milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नो वरि॑वस्कृ॒ध्यूर्जं॒ जना॑य गिर्वणः हरे॑ सृजा॒न आ॒शिर॑म्
verses.transliteration: punānó várivas kr̥dhi-  ū́rjaṃ jánāya girvaṇaḥ  háre sr̥jāná āśíram

translation.text: While thou art cleansed, Song-Lover, bring comfort and vigour to the folk, Poured, Tawny One! on milk and curds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒नो दे॒ववी॑तय॒ इन्द्र॑स्य याहि निष्कृ॒तम् द्यु॒ता॒नो वा॒जिभि॑र्य॒तः
verses.transliteration: punānó devávītaye-  índrasya yāhi niṣkr̥tám  dyutānó vājíbhir yatáḥ

translation.text: Purified for the feast of Gods, go thou to Indra's special place, Resplendent, guided by the strong.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र हि॑न्वा॒नास॒ इन्द॒वोऽच्छा॑ समु॒द्रमा॒शवः॑ धि॒या जू॒ता अ॑सृक्षत
verses.transliteration: prá hinvānā́sa índavaḥ-  -áchā samudrám āśávaḥ  dhiyā́ jūtā́ asr̥kṣata

translation.text: Accelerated by the hymn, the rapid drops of Soma juice Have flowed, urged onward, to the lake.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒र्मृ॒जा॒नास॑ आ॒यवो॒ वृथा॑ समु॒द्रमिन्द॑वः अग्म॑न्नृ॒तस्य॒ योनि॒मा
verses.transliteration: marmr̥jānā́sa āyávo  vŕ̥thā samudrám índavaḥ  ágmann r̥tásya yónim ā́

translation.text: Easily have the living drops, made beautiful, approached the lake, Yea, to the place of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ णो याह्यस्म॒युर्विश्वा॒ वसू॒न्योज॑सा पा॒हि नः॒ शर्म॑ वी॒रव॑त्
verses.transliteration: pári ṇo yāhy asmayúr  víśvā vásūny ójasā  pāhí naḥ śárma vīrávat

translation.text: Compass about, our faithful Friend, all our possessions with thy might: Guard, hero like, our sheltering home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मिमा॑ति॒ वह्नि॒रेत॑शः प॒दं यु॑जा॒न ऋक्व॑भिः प्र यत्स॑मु॒द्र आहि॑तः
verses.transliteration: mímāti váhnir étaśaḥ  padáṃ yujāná ŕ̥kvabhiḥ  prá yát samudrá ā́hitaḥ

translation.text: Loud neighs the Courser Etaṣa, with singers, harnessed for the place, Guided for travel to the lake.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यद्योनिं॑ हिर॒ण्यय॑मा॒शुर्ऋ॒तस्य॒ सीद॑ति जहा॒त्यप्र॑चेतसः
verses.transliteration: ā́ yád yóniṃ hiraṇyáyaṃ  āśúr r̥tásya sī́dati  jáhāty ápracetasaḥ

translation.text: What time the Swift One resteth in the golden place of sacrifice, He leaves the foolish far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि वे॒ना अ॑नूष॒तेय॑क्षन्ति॒ प्रचे॑तसः मज्ज॒न्त्यवि॑चेतसः
verses.transliteration: abhí venā́ anūṣata-  -íyakṣanti prácetasaḥ  májjanty ávicetasaḥ

translation.text: The friends have sung in unison, the prudent wish to sacrifice: Down sink the unintelligent.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑येन्दो म॒रुत्व॑ते॒ पव॑स्व॒ मधु॑मत्तमः ऋ॒तस्य॒ योनि॑मा॒सद॑म्
verses.transliteration: índrāyendo marútvate  pávasva mádhumattamaḥ  r̥tásya yónim āsádam

translation.text: For Indra girt by Maruts, flow, thou Indu, very rich in sweets, To sit in place of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॒ विप्रा॑ वचो॒विदः॒ परि॑ ष्कृण्वन्ति वे॒धसः॑ सं त्वा॑ मृजन्त्या॒यवः॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā víprā vacovídaḥ  pári ṣkr̥ṇvanti vedhásaḥ  sáṃ tvā mr̥janty āyávaḥ

translation.text: Controlling priests and sages skilled in holy song adorn thee well: The living make thee beautiful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: रसं॑ ते मि॒त्रो अ॑र्य॒मा पिब॑न्ति॒ वरु॑णः कवे पव॑मानस्य म॒रुतः॑
verses.transliteration: rásaṃ te mitró aryamā́  píbanti váruṇaḥ kave  pávamānasya marútaḥ

translation.text: Aryaman, Mitra, Varuṇa drink Pavamâna's juice, yea, thine: O Sage, the Maruts drink thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म विप॒श्चितं॑ पुना॒नो वाच॑मिष्यसि इन्दो॑ स॒हस्र॑भर्णसम्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma vipaścítaṃ  punānó vā́cam iṣyasi  índo sahásrabharṇasam

translation.text: O Soma, Indu, thou while thou art purified urgest onward speech. Thousandfold, with the lore of hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒तो स॒हस्र॑भर्णसं॒ वाचं॑ सोम मख॒स्युव॑म् पु॒ना॒न इ॑न्द॒वा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: utó sahásrabharṇasaṃ  vā́caṃ soma makhasyúvam  punāná indav ā́ bhara

translation.text: Yea, Soma, Indu, while thou art purified do thou bring to us Speech thousandfold that longs for war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒ना॒न इ॑न्दवेषां॒ पुरु॑हूत॒ जना॑नाम् प्रि॒यः स॑मु॒द्रमा वि॑श
verses.transliteration: punāná indav eṣām  púruhūta jánānām  priyáḥ samudrám ā́ viśa

translation.text: O Indu, Much-invoked, while thou art purifying, as the Friend. Of these men enter thou the lake.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दवि॑द्युतत्या रु॒चा प॑रि॒ष्टोभ॑न्त्या कृ॒पा सोमाः॑ शु॒क्रा गवा॑शिरः
verses.transliteration: dávidyutatyā rucā́  pariṣṭóbhantyā kr̥pā́  sómāḥ śukrā́ gávāśiraḥ

translation.text: Bright are these Somas blent with milk, with light that flashes brilliantly. And form that utters loud acclaim.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हि॒न्वा॒नो हे॒तृभि॑र्य॒त आ वाजं॑ वा॒ज्य॑क्रमीत् सीद॑न्तो व॒नुषो॑ यथा
verses.transliteration: hinvānó hetŕ̥bhir yatáḥ-  ā́ vā́jaṃ vājy àkramīt  sī́danto vanúṣo yathā

translation.text: Led by his drivers, and sent forth, the Strong Steed hath come nigh for spoil, Like warriors when they stand arrayed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒धक्सो॑म स्व॒स्तये॑ संजग्मा॒नो दि॒वः क॒विः पव॑स्व॒ सूर्यो॑ दृ॒शे
verses.transliteration: r̥dhák soma svastáye  saṃjagmānó diváḥ kavíḥ  pávasva sū́ryo dr̥śé

translation.text: Specially, Soma, coming as a Sage from heaven to prosper us, Flow like the Sun for us to see.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हि॒न्वन्ति॒ सूर॒मुस्र॑यः॒ स्वसा॑रो जा॒मय॒स्पति॑म् म॒हामिन्दुं॑ मही॒युवः॑
verses.transliteration: hinvánti sū́ram úsrayaḥ  svásāro jāmáyas pátim  mahā́m índum mahīyúvaḥ

translation.text: THE, glittering maids send Sura forth, the glorious sisters, close-allied, Send Indu forth, their mighty Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पव॑मान रु॒चारु॑चा दे॒वो दे॒वेभ्य॒स्परि॑ विश्वा॒ वसू॒न्या वि॑श
verses.transliteration: pávamāna rucā́-rucā  devó devébhyas pári  víśvā vásūny ā́ viśa

translation.text: Pervade, O Pavamâna, all our treasures with repeated light, God, coming hither from the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वमान सुष्टु॒तिं वृ॒ष्टिं दे॒वेभ्यो॒ दुवः॑ इ॒षे प॑वस्व सं॒यत॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavamāna suṣṭutíṃ  vr̥ṣṭíṃ devébhyo dúvaḥ  iṣé pavasva saṃyátam

translation.text: Pour on us, Pavamâna, rain, as service and rain praise for Gods: Pour all to be our nourishment.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॒ ह्यसि॑ भा॒नुना॑ द्यु॒मन्तं॑ त्वा हवामहे पव॑मान स्वा॒ध्यः॑
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā hy ási bhānúnā  dyumántaṃ tvā havāmahe  pávamāna svādhyàḥ

translation.text: Thou art a Steer by lustre: we, O Pavamâna, faithfully Call upon thee the Splendid One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प॑वस्व सु॒वीर्यं॒ मन्द॑मानः स्वायुध इ॒हो ष्वि॑न्द॒वा ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: ā́ pavasva suvī́ryam  mándamānaḥ svāyudha  ihó ṣv ìndav ā́ gahi

translation.text: Do thou, rejoicing, nobly-armed! pour upon us heroic strength: O Indu, come thou bitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्भिः प॑रिषि॒च्यसे॑ मृ॒ज्यमा॑नो॒ गभ॑स्त्योः द्रुणा॑ स॒धस्थ॑मश्नुषे
verses.transliteration: yád adbhíḥ pariṣicyáse  mr̥jyámāno gábhastyoḥ  drúṇā sadhástham aśnuṣe

translation.text: When thou art cleansed with both the hands and dipped in waters, with the wood. Thou comest to the gathering-place.
